description.hltext_display: 高級時計370万円相当強奪 東京・新宿区
description.content:
東京・新宿区の時計店に拳銃のようなものを持った男が押し入り、高級腕時計約370万円相当を奪って逃げました。
21日午後8時過ぎ、新宿区西新宿の時計店「サテンドール西新宿店」に男が押し入り、店長の男性（30）に「銭を出せ」と言って拳銃のようなものを突きつけました。店長が展示してあった高級腕時計のロレックス8本、約370万円相当を渡したところ、男はそれを奪って逃走しました。男は40歳くらい、身長約175センチで、ベージュのニット帽をかぶっていたということです。

description.hltext_display: 'True Grit'
description.author: KENNETH TURAN - Los Angeles Times
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- No one is the same after encountering feisty, fearless and plain-spoken Mattie Ross, age 14, from near Dardanelle in Yell County, Ark. Not the other characters in the Charles Portis novel she dominates, and certainly not the filmmaking Coen brothers, Ethan and Joel.
The Coens corralled stars Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin and Barry Pepper and newcomer Hailee Steinfeld and came away with "True Grit," one of their most broadly entertaining films yet. Mattie has a habit of turning people around, she really does.
That bleak but completely delightful Portis novel, in which a much older Mattie remembers the frontier West of the 1870s, has been charming and disconcerting people since it was published in 1968. The key reason is the vim and vigor of Mattie's irrepressible narrative voice, which more than one critic has compared favorably to Huck Finn's. Yes, it's that good. The sentence that starts the book as well as the Coens' superior film introduces us to the story and that singular narrator: "People do not give it credence that a fourteen-year-old girl could leave home and go off in the wintertime to avenge her father's blood but it did not seem so strange then, although I will say it did not happen every day."
That kind of a story has always attracted Hollywood, and in 1969 the veteran Henry Hathaway directed a version written by Marguerite Roberts that softened the book's ending. It featured Kim Darby as Mattie, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper in villainous supporting roles and John Wayne as one-eyed Rooster Cogburn, the U.S. marshal Mattie turns to in her quest for vengeance, a role flamboyant enough to finally win Wayne the best actor Oscar.
The Coens, not known for softening anything, have restored the original's bleak, elegiac conclusion and as writer-directors have come up with a version that shares events with the first film but is much closer in tone to the book - think of the original crossed with Clint Eastwood's "Unforgiven." Clearly recognizing a kindred spirit in Portis, sharing his love for eccentric characters and odd language, they worked hard, and successfully, at serving the buoyant novel as well as being true to their own black comic brio.
In this they had the help of their own formidable filmmaking skills and those of their experienced collaborators. Production designer Jess Gonchor and costume designer Mary Zophres have combined to create the sense of the West as a harsh, hardscrabble place, made up of wide open but unwelcoming spaces and towns without pity.
If Lucien Ballard, cinematographer on the John Wayne picture, showed us a world that was lush and green, as sharply shot by Coen regular Roger Deakins, this West is visually arid, an unsettling Big Empty where only bitterness and bile thrive.
This setting is matched stride for stride by the cast, with casting director Jo Edna Boldin nailing even the smallest speaking parts. The big names in the cast all do excellent work, but the biggest surprise is all but unknown Steinfeld. Mattie is the film's essential role, and though Steinfeld is but 14 and without major feature experience (Kim Darby was 21 when she played in the original), she nails it, handling the highly stylized language like she was born speaking it.
Perhaps being 14 has helped Steinfeld, helped her to intuitively connect with Mattie's no-nonsense stubbornness, her drop-dead determination not to be pushed around when she's in the right. Introduced in Fort Smith, Ark., distraught at the recent murder of her father, shot in cold blood by the miscreant Tom Chaney (Brolin), this is a young person in search of true grit who discovers it, among other places, in herself.
Determined to see Chaney dead and learning that he has fled to the Indian territories, where only U.S. marshals can make arrests, Mattie seeks advice on the best man for the job. When she's told that "the meanest one" is Rooster Cogburn, someone who is "a pitiless man, double-tough, and fear don't enter into his thinking," she doesn't care that "he loves to pull a cork." This is the man for her.
Rooster, for his part, doesn't know what to make of Mattie or her non-negotiable demand that she be taken along on the search for her father's killer. As played by Bridges, this is a primitive, Paleolithic Cogburn, shrewdness and cunning shining through his one remaining eye. He tries, as the dour stockman Col. Stonehill (a wonderful Dakin Matthews) had tried earlier, to out-talk Mattie, but it is to no avail. Plus the cash money she offers - "I'm giving you the children's rate," he insists when she tries to negotiate a still lower rate - counts for a lot.
A third wheel gets added to this party soon enough, when a Texas Ranger named LaBoeuf, who is after Chaney for another crime, joins their party. A bit of a bragger and more than a bit stuck on himself, LaBoeuf is beautifully realized by Damon as someone whose Sharps carbine is envied but whose presence irritates all and sundry.
It wouldn't be fair to recount the adventures these three experience except to say they are as thrilling as any reader of the dime novels that likely inspired Portis would expect. Carter Burwell's music, with its frequent referencing of the vintage hymn "Leaning on the Everlasting Arm," is a key part of the experience. When Iris DeMent's impeccable version of the hymn is heard on the soundtrack as the final credits roll, it's the perfect touch to end a film whose aim is always true.
TRUE GRIT
MPAA rating: PG-13 for some intense sequences of western violence including disturbing images
Running time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
Playing: In general release

description.hltext_display: Satisfacción por prórroga de Cicig
description.content:
El embajador de Guatemala en las Naciones Unidas, Gert Rosenthal, celebró el apoyo de la Asamblea General de ese organismo a la labor que efectúa la Comisión Internacional contra la Impunidad en Guatemala (Cicig) y a la petición de su país de ampliar su mandato dos años más.
“Fortalece nuestra lucha contra la impunidad en Guatemala y también coloca a la Organización de las Naciones Unidas (ONU) en la frontera de la cooperación internacional para combatir el crimen transnacional a través de mecanismos novedosos”, expuso el diplomático a una agencia de noticias internacional.
La resolución adoptada el lunes último por unanimidad por los 192 países miembros de la ONU toma nota de los cambios en la dirección de la Cicig, que ahora está bajo las órdenes del fiscal costarricense Francisco Dall’Anese, así como del deseo de Guatemala porque su mandato se amplíe hasta el 2 de septiembre del 2013.
También insta a las autoridades guatemaltecas a seguir proporcionando el apoyo necesario para “consolidar los logros de la Comisión y superar los retos que afronta” y redoblar los esfuerzos para reforzar las instituciones que respaldan el estado de Derecho en el país centroamericano.
Congreso y Fiscalía
Según el presidente del Congreso, Roberto Alejos, la ampliación del mandato de la Cicig para el próximo año será uno de los temas centrales del primer trimestre de ese organismo.
Hubo un compromiso de apoyo de todas las bancadas con el nuevo comisionado.
Según Claudia Paz y Paz, fiscal general, ahora se debe fortalecer el trabajo entre ambas instituciones, y por ello se inició la ampliación de una agencia más en la Fiscalía Especial.
Representantes de ambas entidades han efectuado reuniones donde se han tratado temas como el traslado de capacidades, mejoras en la investigación, entre otros asuntos.

description.hltext_display: Newmark Security 6-month Profit Down - Quick Facts
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Newmark Security plc (NWT.L) Wednesday posted decline in profit for the six months ended 31 October 2010, reflecting difficult trading environment and also lower revenue and higher finance costs.
Profit attributable to equity holders of the parent and profit for the year from continuing operations dropped to GBP 0.35 million from GBP 0.75 million year ago.
Total earnings per share also declined to 0.08 pence from 0.17 pence last year. Earnings per share from continuing operations also totaled 0.08 pence during the period.
Profit before tax amounted to GBP 0.36 million compared to profit of GBP 0.88 million prior year.
Revenue slipped to GBP 6.08 million from GBP 6.99 million last year.
Commenting on the results, Maurice Dwek, Chairman of Newmark Security plc, said, "Trading in the current environment continues to be difficult but the Board anticipates an easing of current market constraints resulting in a more positive second half of the financial year. In the longer term, the Group has many exciting developments including the Cash in Transit protection case, the SATEON access control system, the potential new market in the US for OEM products and the Wavetec distribution agreement in the U.K. and . These developments will provide Newmark not only with a strong portfolio of products but also valuable revenue streams going forward."

description.hltext_display: Guidelines for evaluating pulmonary arterial hypertension
description.content:
Pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) can be difficult to diagnose because the symptoms are nonspecific and the physical findings are usually subtle (Table). In 2004, the American College of Chest Physicians (ACCP) published clinical practice guidelines for the diagnosis and management of PAH.1 Highlights of the ACCP's recommendations for patient assessment include the following:
•Doppler echocardiography is indicated for patients in whom PAH is clinically suspected. This study is recommended to estimate pulmonary artery pressures (although it is not as precise as right heart catheterization) and to evaluate for left ventricular systolic or diastol- ic dysfunction, left-sided chamber enlargement, and valvular heart disease.
•Right heart catheterization is needed to confirm PAH and determine its severity and to establish the specific cause. It is also recommended to guide therapy.
•A workup for connective-tissue disease and HIV infection is appropriate for patients who have unexplained PAH.
•Ventilation-perfusion lung scanning is warranted to rule out chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension. Normal results exclude the diagnosis.
•An assessment of sleep-disordered breathing is recommended for patients with PAH.
Additional studies that can be important in the workup include chest radiography, electrocardiography, and pulmonary function testing. Chest radiographic findings that are consistent with PAH include enlarged main and hilar pulmonary arterial shadows with concomitant attenuation of peripheral pulmonary vascular markings. Chest radiography is also important in the evaluation of associated problems, such as interstitial lung disease.
An algorithm for patient assessment is presented in the Figure.

description.hltext_display: Lagen gäller också för hjältar
description.content:
På ett gods utanför London sitter Julian Assange och firar jul i väntan på domstolsbeslut om han ska utlämnas till Sverige för att förhöras. I media får han enorm uppmärksamhet och från vänster till höger kallas han antingen frihetshjälte och förrädare. Med sina öppna avslöjanden om korruption, maktmissbruk och pinsamheter har Assange gjort Wikileaks till en internetbaserad maktbas utan stöd från internationellt kapital eller makthavare. Det har gjort honom avskydd av dem som skyddar makten och en hjälte och auktoritet för öppenhetsförespråkare, framför allt hos vänstern. Men nu sitter han alltså på ett gods i England i väntan på beslut om utvisning för förhör om sexuellt ofredande och våldtäkt, vilket två kvinnor i Stockholm påstår. Den internationella upprördheten är stor mot dessa anklagelser. Ingen vill acceptera att det kan rymmas en hjälte och en sexbrottsling i samma person. Man vill inte tro att han tagit sig friheter och varit respektlös mot kvinnor. I stället misstänks kvinnorna för att gå CIA:s ärenden genom att dra Assanges namn i smutsen. Ingenstans bland alla världens vänsterröster hörs det självklara kravet att en kvinna som anklagar någon för våldtäkt ska tas på allvar. En kvinna som blivit ofredad har rätt att få sin sak prövad. En effekt av jämställdheten iSverige är att allmänheten har en modernare syn på skuldfrågan i sexbrott. En kvinna anses inte längre automatiskt medskyldig för att hon haft kort kjol, varit lite berusad eller gjort något annat som tidigare tolkats som att visa sig "tillgänglig". Men ändå har kvinnor svårt att vara öppna om upplevelser av oönskade inviter, om tafsande chefer eller i värsta fall hångel som gått från frivilligt mys till övergrepp utan samtycke. Sånt händer - men man pratar inte om det - för Fina Flickor Gör Inte Sånt. Frilansjournalisten Johanna Koljonen menar att övergrepp som dem Assange anklagas för är vanliga men att ingen vågar prata om det. Hon började mikroblogga om det på Twitter och inom ett par dagar hade tusentals berättelser lagts upp med etiketten #prataomdet. Allt fler berättar om hur de blivit utsatta för ofrivilliga sexuella närmanden och hur de fyllts av skamkänslor. Berättandet visar att det drabbar massor av kvinnor - och kanske män. Men också att det otänkbara faktiskt händer hela tiden - hyggliga män och hjältar beter sig illa mot kvinnor. Inte ens Jesus - tidernas hjälte - satte sig själv på piedestal. Han föddes av en fattig kvinna och levde med fattiga och utstötta. Han åt med syndare och kvinnor av tveksam vandel och den tidens oberörbara. Vi kristna vet vad det vill säga att längta efter en Messias som kommer i makt och härlighet - och upptäcka att han är sonen till en enkel snickare. Vi borde ha lärt oss att ingen människa är oberörbar, ouppnåelig och ofelbar. Med den insikten kan man hysa den djupaste respekt för Assanges arbete mot korruption och maktmissbruk, men ändå kräva att han ska följa samma lagar som vi andra. Inte ens en hjälte får komma undan om han förnedrar kvinnor.
Cecilia Dalman Eek

description.hltext_display: ביקורת ''עניין מרכזי'': הצביעות של ביבי נתניהו מרקיעה לשחקים חדשים
description.content: אין גבול לציניות של ביבי. שנה וחצי בקדנציה השנייה שלו והוא מצליח כמעט מידי שבוע להציב שיאים חדשים של חוסר כישרון, קהות חושים, אטימות מוחלטת ומעל לכל, התרכזות במאמץ היחיד שמעניין אותו: לשרוד עכשיו, להשמיד כל ניסיון לברר את האמת על מחדליו והיערכות בלתי פוסקת לבחירות הבאות. הפעם נתניהו הלך עוד צעד מיותר אחד שרק מבליט את כלומניקיותו המתגלגלת. אנשיו הזדרזו לספר לתקשורת שראש הממשלה, בנימין נתניהו, התקשר לרעייתו של כדורגלן העבר אבי כהן, כדי לעודד אותה ולאחל לו החלמה מהירה. הטלפון הזה היה מתקבל בחיוב אלמלא רצו אנשי הביבים של ביבי לספר עליו לעיצתונאים כדי לצבור הון פוליטי מפוקפק. נתניהו מנסה להצטייר כאיש בעל רגישות אנושית. מי שמכיר אותו אישית אינו יכול שלא לצחוק בבוז גדול. ביבי ורגישות מעולם לא הלכו יחדיו אלא אם מדובר בו עצמו. אפילו את מות אחיו הפך לקרדום פוליטי לחצוב בו אמפתיה. משהופרח הספין הפופוליסטי הנוכחי, קמו - ובצדק - חלק ניכר משפחות 44 הנספים באסון הכרמל, שהוא עצמו ביביהו אחראי לו יותר מכל אדם אחר בשיראל וזועקים גוועלד. אב שכול, פעם ניצב במשטרה: ''אלינו הוא לא התקשר, לשבעה

description.hltext_display: הונם של 50 עשירי ערב צמח ב-18 אחוזים
description.content: הנסיך הסעודי וליד בן טלאל הוא האיש העשיר ביותר בעולם הערבי, כך לפי מגזין עסקי בדובאי. זוהי השנה השביעית ברציפות. הונו של איש העסקים צמח השנה ב-2.4 מיליארד דולר מ-18 מיליארד דולר בשנת 2009 ל-20.4 מיליארד דולר השנה. כללית, הונם של 50 עשירי ערב מגיע לכ-245 מיליארד דולר, עלייה של 18% בהשוואה לשנת 2009. הונם של עשרת העשירים ביותר הגיע לכ-100 מיליארד דולר, עלייה של 16% בהשוואה לשנה שעברה. נתון זה מלמד כי הם לא הושפעו מהמשבר הכלכלי מבחינת שווי הנכסים שלהם. ערב הסעודית שולטת ברשימת העשירים בעולם הערבי- כל 5 המקומות הראשונים מוחזקים על ידי סעודים. עניין מרכזי

description.hltext_display: Vi har rätt att känna obehag och avsky - men låt oss inte bli rädda
description.content:
Efter det misslyckade bombattentatet i Stockholm kan vi alla, med djupt obehag inombords, konstatera att Sverige för första gången i modern tid står inför det faktum att ett terrorangrepp riktats mot vårt eget land och folk och öppna demokratiska samhälle - utfört av en svensk medborgare, uppvuxen här, mitt ibland oss. Redan tidigare under 2000-talet har ett antal andra svenska medborgare deltagit iträning i så kallade jihadistläger, i Mellanöstern, Pakistan, Afghanistan eller Somalia, lett av islamistiska våldsförhärligande terrorgrupper. Deras onda agenda: att mörda oskyldiga civila och rubba vårt demokratiska, frihetliga styrelseskick. Därefter har dessa svenska medborgare utfört oförsvarliga terrordåd - fast då i andra länder än i vårt eget. Detta i sig har varit djupt allvarligt nog och gett en föraning om att en dag kommer de utöva sin blinda ondska i det land de fått leva och växa upp i.Nu har vi för första gången fått uppleva detta våld riktat mot svenska folket självt, på hemmaplan, i vår egen huvudstad, mitt på dess största gågata. Det misslyckade bombattentatet hade kunnat förorsaka många civila människors död och allvarliga skador samt omfattande materiell förödelse. Sveriges regering och riksdag har en skyldighet att nu än mer kraftfullt, målmedvetet och uthålligt, i samarbete med andra länder, öka insatserna för att infiltrera, få fram upplysningar om, avslöja och lagföra våldsinriktad extremism och terrorism i alla dess former. Det som skett är synnerligen allvarligt. Vi har alla rätt att känna det djupaste obehag - och avsky. Men låt oss inte bli rädda, utan alla sluta upp kring statsministerns ord till försvar för vårt frihetliga, öppna land och styrelseskick, för tolerans och respekt för varandra, oavsett bakgrund. I detta ingår allas demokratiska rätt till sitt personliga politiska och livsåskådningsmässiga vägval - så länge detta står upp för ickevåld och utan hot, ömsesidig respekt och alla människors lika, unika och okränkbara värde. Just det som format och fortsatt ska utgöra grunden för vårt land och den västerländska civilisation vi tillhör.
Lennart Sacrédeus (KD), Mora europaparlamentariker i utrikes- och människorättsutskottet 1999-2004 riksdagsledamot 2006-2010

description.hltext_display: יתרון 16 ברבע האחרון לא הספיק לסקרמנטו
description.content: סקרמנטו קינגס הוכיחה הלילה בבית מדוע היא נחשבת לקבוצה הגרועה בליגת ה-NBA. קבוצתו של עמרי כספי הישראלי נוצחה בפעם ה-6 ברציפות והפעם אחרי הארכה לגולדן סטייט 117-109 אחרי הארכה. ברבע האחרון כבר הוליכו הקינגס בפער 16 נקודות (76-92), אך כאמור בסוף נוצחו. כספי סיים עוד ערב מאכזב עם כ-8 דקות על הפרקט ו-2 נקודות בלבד. בנו אודריך קלע 34 נקודות עבור הקינגס. האלופה לוס אנג'לס לייקרס לא נראתה טוב יותר כשהפסידה בבית למילווקי 98-79. בראיינט סיים עם 21 נקודות. תוצאות נוספות: שארלוט 81 אוקלאומה 99 אורלנדו 99 דאלאס 105 שיקגו 121 פילדלפיה 76 ממפיס 94 ניו ג'רזי 101 עניין מרכזי

description.hltext_display: מפולין הגיעה לאלי גוטמן הצעת עבודה מפתה ומיידית
description.content: על פי דיווחים בבירת פולין, מציעה קבוצת פולוניה ורשה לאלי גוטמן להגיע ולאמן מייד את הקבוצה תמורת שכר של 750 אלף יורו נטו לעונה. פולוניה מדורגת במרכז הטבלה ומאמנה הספרדי חוסה מריה באקרו נטש לטובת הצעה מפתה מקבוצת הפאר הפולנית לך פוזנאן. הבעלים של פולוניה ורשה הוא איל נדל''ן מקומי והוא מצהיר כי הוא מעוניין לקדם את המועדון ולפתחו. אלי גוטמן לא יוכל לעזוב מייד את הפועל תל אביב אך הוא מגלה סימנים ברורים לכך שאין בכוונתו להמשיך בקבוצה לעונה רביעית. ובינתיים בהפועל תל אביב נמשכים המאמצים למצוא פשרה בין אלי טביב לאחים הראל כדי שניתן יהיה להמשיך ולנהל את הקבוצה כראוי לאחר עזיבתו של המנהל גבי קצרה. איתי שכטר הודיע שיגיש תביעת בוררות לאחר שהפועל תל אביב הודיעה שתדרוש 5 מיליון יורו תמורת שחרורו למועדון באירופה. שכטר מקבל טיפול רפואי באירופה ומקווה לשוב בקרוב לפעילות מלאה. בן סהר עשוי לעזוב את הפועל תל אביב. קבוצתו הספרדית אספניול טוענת שלא קיבלה את התמורה להשאלתו בעוד שהיא משלמת את שכרו. קבוצת התחתית ההולנדית דה-חראפשחאפ, שבה שיחק בעבר סהר, מעוניינת בשירותיו בניסיון להינצל מירידה. החלוץ הבקיע רק שני שערים בליגה במדי הפועל תל אביב והוא נחשב אכזבת ענק. עניין מרכזי

description.hltext_display: הלילה השחור של הפועל ירושלים
description.content: העונה האירופית של הפועל ירושלים הסתיימה מוקדם מהצפוי. הערב נוצחה הקבוצה של קטש במלחה 84-70 על ידי קאחסול סביליה, שהעפילה לשלב הבא. ירושלים הייתה צריכה ניצחון או הפסד ב-4 נקודות כדי להעפיל לשלב הבא אבל קרסה ברגע האמת. הקבוצה של קטש לא הופיעה לרבע הראשון שהסתיים ביתרון ספרדי מוחץ 11-26. הרבע השני היה כבר טוב יותר אך פער 8-6 הנקודות נשמר עד תחילת הרבע האחרון. אז במצב של 62-54, נעלמה הקבוצה הישראלית לחלוטין והספרדים ברחו ל-54-73. היתר כבר היה גארבץ' טיים. מדובר בכישלון ירושלמי מהדהד. נימברוק הצ'כית עלתה ראשונה מהבית אחרי ניצחון 79-90 על ריגה. בירושלים ניתן לציין רק את ג'ייסון ריץ' שסיים עם 17 נקודות. הסיוט של הנציגה השנייה במפעל גליל/גלבוע בא גם כן לקיצו. האלופה הישראלית הובסה הערב 91-70 ביוון על ידי אריס סלוניקי. קזרנובסקי וגרין סיימו עם 14 כל אחד. ביורוצ'אלנג' התבזתה מכבי חיפה בלטביה מול ונטספילס דניצחה 99-62. חיפה סיימה שנייה למרות הכל והעפילה לשלב הבא. לנדסברג קלע 13 נקודות. גם ברק נתניה בשלב הבא למרות תבוסה 84-60 על ידי טורק טלקום. יונגר קלע 15 עבור הקבוצה מהשרון. עניין מרכזי

description.hltext_display: הכרם קיבלה את זיכיון ההפצה והשיווק של Tullamore Dew
description.content: המותג Tullamore Dew נרכש לפני מספר חודשים בהשקעה של 300 מיליון יורו ע''י חברת וויליאם גרנט'ס, אחת מיצרניות הוויסקי הסקוטי הגדולות והמוערכות בסקוטלנד ומהבודדות שנמצאות עדיין בבעלות המשפחה המייסדת. עבור גרנט'ס, התוספת החדשה לפורטפוליו, מהווה כניסה לתחום הוויסקי האירי וחיזוק אדיר לכוחה. מותגי החברה, גרנט'ס, גלנפידיך, בלויני, הנדריקס ג'ין ועוד, מיוצגים שנים רבות ע''י חב' הכרם. Tullamore Dew הינו מותג הוויסקי האירי השני במכירות בעולם (אחרי ג'יימסון) עם מכירות של 650,000 אלף קרטונים בשנה . ההצלחה הגדולה של המותג מרשימה אף יותר, אם מביאים בחשבון שקטגוריית הוויסקי האירי הינה הקטגוריה הגדולה ביותר בצמיחה מתמדת בעולם המשקאות החריפים בשנים האחרונות. אריאל אפשטיין מנכ''ל הכרם: ''אנו שמחים מאוד על התוספת החשובה והמשמעותית הזו למגוון המותגים שלנו, שתהפוך אותנו לשחקן עוצמתי בקטגוריית הויסקי האירי. טולומור דיו הינו הוויסקי האירי מספר 2 בעולם, ובמדינות מסוימות אף מספר 1. אני מאמין שטולומור דיו בבעלות חברת וויליאם גרנט'ס, ובידיים של הכרם בישראל- יגדיל משמעותית את מכירותיו''. עניין מרכזי

description.content: FRANKFURT (awp international) - Der Sportartikelhersteller Adidas will die Lücke zum Branchenersten Nike nach und nach schliessen. Der Vorsprung Nikes stamme allein aus Amerika, in allen anderen Regionen sei Adidas gl... 0 Punkte 0 Kommentare CASH.ch

description.hltext_display: חמאס עומד מאחורי ההסלמה בגבול הרצועה
לפחות 7 הרוגים ברעידת אדמה באיראן
description.content: לפחות 7 בני אדם נהרגו ברעידת אדמה שאירעה ביום שני בלילה באיראן. רעש האדמה התרחש במחוז כרמאן שבדרום מזרח המדינה. מושל המחוז מסר כי לאור ההרס שהותיר הרעש מספר ההרוגים צפוי לעלות. עוצמת הרעש הייתה 6.5 בסולם ריכטר. בשל העובדה שבאזורים הכפריים הבנייה אינה חזקה, נראה כי ישנם עוד נפגעים. רעשי אדמה אינם דבר חדש באיראן. לפני כשבע שנם נהרגו ונפצעו עשרות אלפי בני אדם ברעש אדמה שהחריב את העיר באם. עניין מרכזי

description.hltext_display: הרופאים באיכילוב: נשאר רק להתפלל
נתניהו הגיש בקשה רשמית אך הבית הלבן לא ישחרר את המרגל ללא תמורה. מקור אמריקני ל''עניין מרכזי'': שום נשיא לא יוכל לעשות עסקה כזו אלא אם תכלול הס
Ett alldeles riktigt beslut
description.content:
Läget i Elfenbenskusten är, försiktigt uttryckt, instabilt efter presidentvalet som slutade med en seger för oppositionskandidaten och en förlorande president som vägrar lämna över makten. Det rapporteras om dödsfall, personskador, försvinnanden och arresteringar i stor mängd. 13personer som Sverige beslutat utvisa till Elfenbenskusten får därför respit tills situationen klarnat. Det är naturligtvis bra för de tretton, som kan andas ut tills vidare. Och det är också ytterligare ett exempel på att Migrationsverket mycket väl kan fatta kollektiva beslut när det behövs. Nu väntar vi på samma klarsyn när det gäller avvisningarna av kristna till Irak, ett annat land med instabilt läge och hot mot liv och lem om man tillhör "fel" minoritet.
Elisabeth Sandlund

description.hltext_display: 津波警報・注意報はすべて解除 父島近海でM7.4
description.content:
小笠原諸島の小笠原村で震度4を観測した地震に伴う津波警報と津波注意報は、22日午前7時20分にすべて解除されました。
午前2時20分ごろ、父島付近でマグニチュード7.4の地震があり、小笠原村で震度4を観測しました。この地震で、小笠原諸島に津波警報が、静岡から西の太平洋岸に津波注意報が出されましたが、午前7時20分に警報・注意報ともにすべて解除されました。これまでに観測された津波は、八丈島八重根で60センチ、父島二見で30センチなどとなっています。小笠原村役場などによると、けが人の情報は入っていないということです。

description.hltext_display: Ingen framtid i mittenträngsel
description.content:
Kristdemokraternas framtidsgrupp sitter inte inne med lösningarna för framtiden. Partiet gör klokt i att inte ta till sig för mycket av vad som står i deras rapport. Framtiden ligger i stället iatt bli ett tydligare alternativ till höger om mitten, inte att trängas i mitten.
Nya Wermlands-Tidningen

description.hltext_display: ברק אובמה מסרבלהעניק חנינה לפולארד
Från ord till handling
description.content:
Bristen på fria medier och fri opinionsbildning är det kanske största demokratiska problemet i Vitryssland idag. Fria medier, särskilt radio och internet, kan understödjas utifrån. Här bör EU spela en aktivare roll. De visumregler som i dag begränsar vitryssars möjlighet att resa bör ses över. En intressant idé vore inreseförbud för diktatorn och hans närmaste krets, men visumfrihet för övriga vitryssar. Det leder till öppenhet och fler kontakter över gränserna. Sverige kan bidra genom att utöka demokratibiståndet till partier, organisationer och fria fackföreningar. Det bygger långsiktig förändring underifrån. EU måste nu gå från ord till handling, inte bara till handlingsprogram.
Aftonbladet

description.hltext_display: אנשיו של בן לאדן אינם נחים לרגע ועתה ינסו להוציא לפועל החדרת חומרים קטלניים למזון המוגש במסעדות ובבתי המלון
ראש הממשלה גילה פופוליזם בזוי כשהזדרז לדווח לתקשורת שטלפן לאשתו של אבי כהן, ולעודדה. ומה עם משפחות 44 הנספים באסון שמחדליו גרמו בכרמל? פחדן ע
description.content: אין גבול לציניות של ביבי. שנה וחצי בקדנציה השנייה שלו והוא מצליח כמעט מידי שבוע להציב שיאים חדשים של חוסר כישרון, קהות חושים, אטימות מוחלטת ומעל לכל, התרכזות במאמץ היחיד שמעניין אותו: לשרוד עכשיו, להשמיד כל ניסיון לברר את האמת על מחדליו והיערכות בלתי פוסקת לבחירות הבאות. הפעם נתניהו הלך עוד צעד מיותר אחד שרק מבליט את כלומניקיותו המתגלגלת. אנשיו הזדרזו לספר לתקשורת שראש הממשלה, בנימין נתניהו, התקשר לרעייתו של כדורגלן העבר אבי כהן, כדי לעודד אותה ולאחל לו החלמה מהירה. הטלפון הזה היה מתקבל בחיוב אלמלא רצו אנשי הביבים של ביבי לספר עליו לעיצתונאים כדי לצבור הון פוליטי מפוקפק. נתניהו מנסה להצטייר כאיש בעל רגישות אנושית. מי שמכיר אותו אישית אינו יכול שלא לצחוק בבוז גדול. ביבי ורגישות מעולם לא הלכו יחדיו אלא אם מדובר בו עצמו. אפילו את מות אחיו הפך לקרדום פוליטי לחצוב בו אמפתיה. משהופרח הספין הפופוליסטי הנוכחי, קמו - ובצדק - חלק ניכר משפחות 44 הנספים באסון הכרמל, שהוא עצמו ביביהו אחראי לו יותר מכל אדם אחר בשיראל וזועקים גוועלד. אב שכול, פעם ניצב במשטרה: ''אלינו הוא לא התקשר, לשבעה

description.hltext_display: Använd julgranen för att lovsjunga Jesus
description.content:
Via Dagenskribenten Carl-Henrik Jaktlunds blogg har det för ett tag sedan pågått en diskussion om julens sanna innehåll. Är julen verkligen så kristen? Är den inte egentligen ett hopkok av alla möjliga religiösa uttryck, såväl soldyrkan och fruktbarhetskulter som kristen tro? Om vi tar just julgranen som exempel så kan vi nog räkna med att Jesus inte föddes under en gran och likväl är julgranen ganska framträdande i vårt julfirande. Det finns många förslag till vad ursprunget till denna sed kan vara. En del menar att granen är en sätt att skrämma onda andar, andra att ursprunget ligger ett påbud från den babyloniske guden Nimrod och till och med att den är menad att likna ett manligt kön. Den som vill och finner nöje i det kan säkerligen googla fram fler förslag. Jag menar att vägen framåt i frågor som denna är att ta ett steg tillbaka. Vi behöver fråga oss vad det egentligen innebär att Gud i Jesus Kristus har blivit människa. För en av den tidiga kyrkans teologer, Irenaeus av Lyon, andligt barnbarn till aposteln Johannes och tillika martyr, så innebar inkarnationen början på återupprättelsen av hela skapelsen. Ett återtagande till Gud. Här kan vi se kopplingen till Efesierbrevets ord om "att sammanfatta allting i Kristus, allt i himlen och på jorden." Allt är ju skapat av Gud genom Kristus och därmed också ämnat för honom. Så oavsett julgranens historia och möjliga symbolvärde så kan inte ett kristet svar vara att avsäga sig julgran, julgröt eller julstrumpa. Vi kan ju inte tolerera att granen, Sveriges vanligaste träd, som symboliskt värde inte pekar på Kristus, vår världs centrum. Nej, verkligen inte! Jag föreslår att vi återtar granen som del i skapelsens lovsång. Antingen kan granen helt enkel vara ett trevligt och färgglatt inslag i vårt firande av Kristi födelses dag. Eller, om den nu ska påminna oss om något så kan den ju påminna oss om att Abraham, Isak och Jakobs Gud som en gång uppenbarat sig in en brinnande buske, symboliserad i granen och dess ljus, för profeten Mose nu har uppenbarat sig till fullo i Kristus Jesus. Den kan även påminna oss om att såsom granens dofter, guld och ljus döljer en trädstam så döljer konungarnas gåvor av guld, rökelse och myrra Jesusbarnets framtida korsväg.,
Joel Appelfedt, Uppsala

description.hltext_display: ביקורת ''עניין מרכזי'':הצביעות של ביבי נתניהו מרקיעה לשחקים חדשים
description.content: אין גבול לציניות של ביבי. שנה וחצי בקדנציה השנייה שלו והוא מצליח כמעט מידי שבוע להציב שיאים חדשים של חוסר כישרון, קהות חושים, אטימות מוחלטת ומעל לכל, התרכזות במאמץ היחיד שמעניין אותו: לשרוד עכשיו, להשמיד כל ניסיון לברר את האמת על מחדליו והיערכות בלתי פוסקת לבחירות הבאות. הפעם נתניהו הלך עוד צעד מיותר אחד שרק מבליט את כלומניקיותו המתגלגלת. אנשיו הזדרזו לספר לתקשורת שראש הממשלה, בנימין נתניהו, התקשר לרעייתו של כדורגלן העבר אבי כהן, כדי לעודד אותה ולאחל לו החלמה מהירה. הטלפון הזה היה מתקבל בחיוב אלמלא רצו אנשי הביבים של ביבי לספר עליו לעיצתונאים כדי לצבור הון פוליטי מפוקפק. נתניהו מנסה להצטייר כאיש בעל רגישות אנושית. מי שמכיר אותו אישית אינו יכול שלא לצחוק בבוז גדול. ביבי ורגישות מעולם לא הלכו יחדיו אלא אם מדובר בו עצמו. אפילו את מות אחיו הפך לקרדום פוליטי לחצוב בו אמפתיה. משהופרח הספין הפופוליסטי הנוכחי, קמו - ובצדק - חלק ניכר משפחות 44 הנספים באסון הכרמל, שהוא עצמו ביביהו אחראי לו יותר מכל אדם אחר בשיראל וזועקים גוועלד. אב שכול, פעם ניצב במשטרה: ''אלינו הוא לא התקשר, לשבעה

description.hltext_display: Årets julklapp till barnen - en vit jul
description.content:
Barnens högtid framför alla andra högtider är julhelgen. Det ordnas och donas som aldrig förr. Och med dofter, smaker och allt det som hör julen till kommer förväntningarna. Det ses fram mot Kalle Anka, en och annan köttbulle, men framför allt de efterlängtade julklapparna.De vuxna laddar de med. Det ska tvättas, städas och lagas mat i det oändliga. Godsakerna ska svämma över. Det är nu det tudelade inträffar. Barnens högtid framför alla andra högtider ska firas med riktigt mycket alkohol. För sällan dricker svensken så mycket alkohol som till jul. Äggtoddyn ska värmas, likaså glöggen. Till julkorven ska det drickas julöl och till kaffet bjuds det på årets julklappswhisky. Och så börjar det - om och om och om igen. På barnens högtid.Vart fjärde barn har enligt undersökningar som gjorts upplevt obehag under julen på grund av de vuxnas drickande och berusning. Forskningen visar att barn uppfattar det mycket negativt att vuxna dricker, och blir påverkade på så sätt att de upplevs vara förändrade. Vuxna som blir fnissiga, högljudda, överdrivet sentimentala eller i värsta fall stökiga och våldsamma. Förändringar som avviker från det normala och som barn omedelbart märker men har svårt att förstå. Det gnager av oro och ångest hos 28,3 procent av de svenska barnen på barnens högtid.Årets julklapps sägs vara en iPad. Men årets barnjulklapp är i år, liksom alla andra år, en riktigt härlig vit jul. Det kan de få vara värda - på barnens högtid. God jul till er alla.
Lars-Axel Nordell (KD) ordförande Riksdagens nykterhetsgrupp

description.hltext_display: Vetenskap och tro i hyllning till skapelsen
description.content:
I dagarna kring när Nobelpriset delas ut riktas stor uppmärksamhet mot viktiga naturvetenskapliga landvinningar, och framstående forskare hyllas för sina briljanta upptäckter. Vi är många som fascineras över den storslagna och sinnrika naturen. Vetenskapsmännen själva visar ofta både stor upprymdhet och stor ödmjukhet inför hur skapelsen fungerar. Med förundran konstaterar vi att i den moderna fysiken möts det lilla, partikelfysiken, och det stora, kosmologin, inom samma forskningsområde. När 2006 års Nobelpristagare i fysik, professor George Smoot, för första gången såg den efterlängtade bilden av hur materien fördelar sig efter Big bang utbrast han: "För den troende är detta som att se Guds ansikte".En av de absolut första forskarna som för omkring 80 år sedan formade tanken om Big bang var den belgiske professorn Georges Lemaitre. Han var även ordinerad präst i Katolska kyrkan. Även om han ofta föreläste i vetenskapliga sammanhang iförd sin prästdräkt, så var han noga med att hålla isär de båda professionerna, tro och vetenskap. Han protesterade livligt mot att påven Pius XII, som hade ordinerat honom, alltför tidigt förklarade Big bang som en sanning därför att den bäst gick att förena med en biblisk skapelsesyn. Samtidigt var Lemaitre väl medveten om att vetenskapen har en gräns där filosofi, religion och tro får ta vid.Evolutionsteorins fader Charles Darwin var enligt egen utsago inte ateist. När det gäller tron på en personlig Gud var han, som de flesta av oss, vacklande, men i hans "Liv och Brev del 1" skriver Darwin bland annat: "En annan källa till tron på Guds existens, en tro som inte är en följd av känslor utan av rationellt tänkande, förefaller mig vara av långt större vikt. Det är den utomordentliga svårigheten, eller rättare sagt omöjligheten, som är förbunden med att föreställa sig denna vidunderliga och förunderliga värld, med människan och hennes möjlighet att se långt tillbaka och långt framåt i tiden, som resultatet av slumpens tillfällighet eller nödvändighet."Sveriges kanske främste naturforskare, Carl von Linné, uttryckte hur hans vetenskapliga studier ledde honom till stor förundran: "Jag såg (gripen av vördnad) den oändlige allvetande och allsmäktige Guden på ryggen, då han gick fram och jag hisnade!" Vi är inte helt säkra på hur det ska tolkas men det ligger nära till hands att tänka att han menade att det finns ett annat sätt att möta Gud på, mer personligt, ansikte mot ansikte. Även han insåg att det finns en gräns för vetenskapen när det gäller fullständig förståelse av hela tillvaron. Vid denna gräns skulle vetenskap och tro kunna mötas för att tillsammans bättre kunna få ett helhetsperspektiv och gemensamt kunna förundras över och hylla skapelsen och skaparen.Detta är en önskan som även den välkände kosmologen Stephen Hawking uttrycker i avslutningen av sin bästsäljare Kosmos - en kort historik: "Om vi emellertid upptäcker en fullständig teori, bör dess allmänna principer med tiden bli begripliga för vem som helst, inte blott för ett litet fåtal naturvetare. Då kan vi alla - filosofer, naturvetenskapsmän och andra - delta i diskussionen om hur det kommer sig att vi och universum existerar. Om vi finner svaret på den frågan, då har det mänskliga förnuftet firat sin slutliga triumf - ty då känner vi Guds tankar".
Ivar Gustafsson, docent i Matematik Samuel Brohede, fil dr i Miljövetenskap Tuve Skånberg, teol dr i kyrkohistoria, direktor - Artikelförfattarna är Fellows vid Claphaminstitutet

description.hltext_display: Gonzalo Romero se lesiona y es duda ...
description.content:
Aunque Gonzalo aseguró que no le gusta enfrentar a clubes, sino a selección de futbol, tiene la ilusión de viajar a Los Ángeles y enfrentar al América, de México.
Esta tarde se realizará una revisión más para determinar cuanto tiempo será su recuperación.
"Es complicado, porque me duele mucho y tengo la rodilla inflamada. Desde la final esty así, pero espero poder jugar ante el América", expresó Romero.

description.hltext_display: Baluch leader arrested in Pakistan with arms, ammunition
US Poised To Approve Nuclear Arms Pact With Russia
description.author: DESMOND BUTLER
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

description.hltext_display: 東金道で車3台が事故 ワゴン車横転、4人死傷
description.content:
22日朝、千葉県の東金道路で車3台が絡む事故があり、男性1人が死亡し、3人がけがをしました。
消防や日本道路交通情報センターなどによると、午前6時20分ごろ、千葉市若葉区の東金道路下りの中野インターと山田インターの間で、トラック2台とワゴン車の合わせて3台が絡む事故があり、ワゴン車が横転しました。この事故で、車の外に投げ出されたとみられる男性が死亡し、30代から50代の男女3人がけがをして病院に搬送されました。警察が事故当時の状況を詳しく調べています。東金道路は、事故の影響で下りの高田−山田インター間で通行止めとなっていて、復旧には時間がかかる見通しです。

description.hltext_display: Police: Man stole drugs, fled pharmacy
description.content:
isement
Police arrested a 32-year-old Santa Fe man they say robbed a south Santa Fe pharmacy Tuesday morning.
Artemus Roberts-Kruempel, according to Santa Fe police, walked into the Medicap Pharmacy, 2801 Rodeo Road, around 9 a.m. Tuesday when the Rodeo Plaza business opened. Detective Sgt. Louis Carlos says Roberts-Kruempel "implied he had a gun" and a store employee immediately called police dispatchers.
After stealing medication and leaving the store, dispatchers asked all area law enforcement to be on the lookout for a maroon truck Roberts-Kruempel was seen driving. Carlos said a Santa Fe County Sheriff's deputy spotted Roberts-Kruempel on N.M. 14 about 9 minutes after the robbery and tried pulling him over. While the chase did not reach high speeds, according to Carlos, Roberts-Kruempel would not pull over for nearly 10 minutes.
When he did pull over, near the National Guard Armory on the East Interstate 25 Frontage Road around 9:25 a.m., numerous sheriff's department and New Mexico State Police units were on the scene.
Investigators say Roberts-Kruempel walked into the business at 9 a.m., said he had a gun and asked for unspecified hydrocodone products.
Hydrocodone is an opiate that, in combination with other ingredients, is sold as a pain reliever or cough suppressant.
Carlos said a pharmacy employee indicated he would need a prescription for hydrocodone products, "and he basically told her he didn't need any prescription and walked right behind the counter to get them himself."
An employee had called police dispatchers and left the line open while dispatchers could hear the employee telling Roberts-Kruempel he couldn't be behind the counter.
Roberts-Kruempel took unspecified drugs and drove away.
When he was arrested, Carlos said Roberts-Kruempel "had ingested some of the stolen drugs," so he was taken to Christus St. Vincent Regional Medical Center for a medical check before being booked into jail on one felony charge of robbery.
While the arrest was made in Santa Fe County, city police were on scene helping with the inventory taken from Roberts-Kruempel's vehicle to see the quantity and type of medication taken.
Police had no update on the drugs stolen as of Tuesday night. Jail records reflect he was booked into the facility at 3:12 p.m. after his medical check.
Online court records do not reflect a criminal history for Roberts-Kruempel.
Contact Geoff Grammer at 986-3076 or ggrammer@sfnewmexican.com. Read his blog at SantaFeCrime.com.

description.hltext_display: Bulgarian-born artist to paint Pawlenty portrait
description.content:
ST. PAUL - Gov. Tim Pawlenty has picked an artist to paint the official portrait that will hang in the halls of the Minnesota Capitol.
Pawlenty on Tuesday said he had selected Bulgarian-born Ross R. Rossin to capture his image as part of a tradition covering all past Minnesota governors. The portrait will go up sometime next year.
Rossin has brushed political portraits before, including those of former Presidents George H.W. Bush and George W. Bush and of Georgia Gov. Sonny Perdue.
Rossin became a citizen of the United States this year after almost a decade of living in the country. He calls Atlanta home.
Pawlenty said the artist's life story and quality of work won him the job.
A Pawlenty spokesman says the $25,200 cost will come from the governor's office budget.

event_or_fact.property: the artist's life story and quality of work won him the job
the $25,200 cost will come from the governor's office budget
he had selected Bulgarian-born Ross R. Rossin to capture his image as part of a tradition covering all past Minnesota governors

description.hltext_display: Woori Fin aims to halve NPLs next yr - chairman
description.content:
SEOUL, Dec 22 - Woori Finance Holdings Co Ltd 053000.KS aims to cut its non-performing loans more than by half next year to clean up its assets and strengthen risk management, Chairman Lee Pal-seung said on Wednesday. "By implementing a large-scale cutback plan on the non-performing loans of each affiliate and improving the group's credit culture, we expect to lower the group's 2011 NPLs by more than half," Lee said at a company event for 2011 management strategy. Woori's master plan for next year comes after South Korea halted the country's biggest-ever financial sector privatisation of Woori, aiming to end its costly bailout of the financial sector in the wake of the 1997-98 Asian financial crisis. [ID:nTOE6BG02O] Woori's NPL ratio at the end of September rose to 3.7 percent from 1.7 percent a year earlier.
The government suspended a public auction of its $6 billion-plus stake in Woori, citing market uncertainties, as two strong candidates -- groups led by Woori employees and customers -- pulled out of bidding.
Financial Services Commission Chairman Chin Dong-soo, promised to quickly come up with an alternative. [ID:nTOE6BL03C]
Lee told reporters that the best, most practical model for privatising Woori was to divest the stake to multiple investors.
Woori had sought an alliance with financial investors as it wants to avoid being merged with another company. However, two Woori consortiums withdrew their bid citing the hefty premium demanded by the government, a senior Woori official said earlier.

event_or_fact.property: to quickly come up with an alternative

Woori Fin aims to halve NPLs next yr - chairman SEOUL, Dec 22 - Woori Finance Holdings Co Ltd 053000.KS aims to cut its non-performing loans more than by half next year to clean up its assets and strengthen risk management
By implementing a large-scale cutback plan on the non-performing loans of each affiliate and improving the group's credit culture, we expect to lower the group's 2011 NPLs by more than half

description.hltext_display: Autoridades incautan buzones de los ...
description.content:
El decomiso se logró en el tercer día del estado de Sitio en esa región, y expertos en seguridad señalan que se corroboró lo que por meses se mencionaba sobre el aumento de la presencia de narcotraficantes, en especial de integrantes del llamado grupo los Zetas.
Después de que las fuerzas de seguridad efectuaran 21 allanamientos en varias comunidades del referido departamento, se logró el decomiso de buzones supuestamente propiedad de los Zetas, que operaban en ese territorio.
Hasta anoche se habían contabilizado por lo menos 220 fusiles. El dato fue confirmado por el presidente Álvaro Colom, quien en rueda de prensa aseguró que desde que empezó la operación a la fecha se ha incautado esa cantidad de armas, y municiones.
Rony López, fiscal contra el Crimen Organizado y encargado de la operación, explicó que aún no cuentan con el dato exacto del arsenal, debido a que todo el equipo de escena del crimen aún trabaja en ello.
Las armas se encontraron en varios vehículos, en viviendas y enterradas en los patios de varias propiedades que fueron abandonadas por los supuestos narcotraficantes.
Además, el número de detenidos asciende a 14 y los automotores suman nueve y un camión.
El gobernante aseguró que los Zetas que se han asentado en Alta Verapaz no podrán salir de esa región, debido a que en las carreteras hay retenes policíacos.
Añadió: “Se está investigando el origen de una avioneta, ya que hay un empresario que la reclama, y se tiene sospecha de otras dos avionetas que aparentemente no tienen permiso para volar en el país”.
Las aeronaves se encontraron en un allanamiento en los hangares del aeropuerto de Cobán.
También se incautaron por lo menos Q500 mil, de los cuales Q300 mil estaban en una de las avionetas.
Hallan cuerpos
Entre los hallazgos también figura el cadáver de Francisco Leonel González Paz, de 55 años, quien fue secuestrado el sábado último y por quien los delincuentes solicitaban un rescate de Q200 mil.
La víctima fue localizada en la finca Chischujá, Santa Cruz Verapaz. Las autoridades aún buscan el cuerpo de otra persona que habría sido secuestrada por ese grupo armado.
Colom afirmó que se hallaron “dos cuerpos enterrados en un como buzón”, y en esa casa también se encontraron más de cinco mil tolvas con balas.
Extraoficialmente trascendió que se habían encontrado tres cuerpos más en otra finca.
Todos los allanamientos fueron avalados por el juez de Primera Instancia Penal de Turno de la capital, según López para garantizar la institucionalidad.
“En los operativos encontramos casas abandonadas, pero los delincuentes dejaron vestimenta como de las fuerzas de seguridad, entre ellas chalecos, gorros e insignias, con lo que consideramos intentaban burlar a las autoridades”, aseguró Colom.
Información
Por la mañana, en la colonia Carlos V, fueron encontrados en sacos más de 150 fusiles AK-47, más de mil tolvas, una gran cantidad de municiones y chalecos antibalas.
Los fiscales han obtenido información en el área acerca de que desde hace varias semanas un grupo de supuestos zetas habría ingresado en el territorio nacional con tal de mantener el control de las operaciones del narcotráfico.
Las primeras pesquisas demuestran que estos son apoyados por un grupo nacional que les ha brindado logística y conocimientos de la operación.
En el operativo participan 40 fiscales, 25 peritos de la escena del crimen de diferentes departamentos, 250 soldados y similar número de policías.
También trascendió ayer que en Honduras se ordenó reforzar la seguridad en la frontera, para evitar el ingreso de narcotraficantes que huyan de Guatemala.

description.hltext_display: いわき市海岸で貨物船座礁 北日本あすまで大荒れ
description.content:
強風で大荒れとなっている福島県いわき市の海岸で、貨物船が座礁しました。
22日午前10時前、パナマ船籍の貨物船「SEA ACE」2976トンが座礁しました。海上保安庁によると、15人の船員が船内に取り残されているということです。この貨物船は、宮城県の気仙沼から千葉県へ向かう途中でした。今のところ、油漏れなどはないということです。当時、海上は秒速20メートル以上の強風で荒れていて、風に流されたとみられています。
一方、北日本では、23日にかけて大荒れとなりそうです。予想される最大風速は、海上で25メートル、陸上で20メートル、波の高さは最大8メートルとなっています。暴風・高波に警戒が必要です。

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank agrees to pay $550 million to resolve federal tax shelter fraud investigation
description.content:
NEW YORK, N.Y. - Deutsche Bank admitted criminal wrongdoing and agreed to pay more than US$550 million in connection with its participation in tax shelters that enabled the rich to temporarily avoid paying hundreds of millions of dollars in U.S. taxes, authorities announced Tuesday.
Federal prosecutors and the Justice Department's tax division announced the deal, saying a nonprosecution agreement requires the bank to continue co-operating and to submit to the appointment of an independent expert who will review its compliance measures and ensure it does not help people dodge taxes in the future.
Authorities said the US$553,633,153 payment by the bank will include that amount of taxes and interest that the Internal Revenue Service was unable to collect from taxpayers from 1996 to 2002 because of the misconduct. It also includes a civil penalty of more than $149 million.
In a statement, Deutsche Bank said it was pleased that the investigation had been resolved.
"Since 2002, the bank has significantly strengthened its policies and procedures as part of an ongoing effort to ensure strict adherence to the law and the highest standards of ethical conduct," it said. The bank said the payment had already been accounted for and would not have any impact on current net income.
Bank spokesman John Gallagher said the company had no additional comment.
U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara said in a news release that the bank provided a detailed statement of facts describing its wrongful conduct.
The nonprosecution agreement bars the bank from involvement with any prepackaged tax products of the type the bank had previously offered, according to the release.
In court papers, the Department of Justice agreed not to criminally prosecute Deutsche Bank for any crimes related to its participation in a broad conspiracy to defraud the Internal Revenue Service.
Authorities said the scheme enabled wealthy U.S. citizens from 1996 through 2005 to evade about $5.9 billion in individual income taxes on capital gains and ordinary income. The court papers said they dodged taxes by claiming $29.3 billion in bogus tax benefits that enabled them to claim losses that did not really exist.
The government said Deutsche Bank participated in about 15 different tax shelters, working 1,300 deals involving more than 2,100 customers.
Some tax shelters were supported by an opinion letter in which accounting giant KPMG and a law firm represented that the customers' tax position would "more likely than not" withstand IRS challenge, the government said.
KPMG LLP reached its own deal with the government admitting its role in the tax-shelter scheme. The firm avoided criminal prosecution by co-operating with authorities and was fined $456 million, including $128 million in forfeited fees from sales of the shelters.

event_or_fact.property: the bank provided a detailed statement of facts describing its wrongful conduct.
the company had no additional comment

description.hltext_display: 伊春劫：伊春劫：生死航班
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
伊春劫
而在惊魂未定之余，空难中几十人的幸存，也让我们感受到劫后重逢的庆幸与安慰。
如同一位民航从业者对《中国新闻周刊》记者所言，“心中一直紧绷的飞行安全的那根弦，砰的一下断了。”
死者之灵需要告慰，生者之心需要抚慰；质疑需要反馈，问题需要答案。让我们耐心等待事故调查结果。
与此同时，民航体系中存在的问题由不得半点等待，包括安全隐患、事故调查机制、以及赔偿责任等等。相信有关方面正在作出足够的排查、检讨和反思。
生死航班
这是一次普通的短途旅行。人们在盘算着飞机落地之后要做的事情……此时，灾难蹑手蹑脚靠近
本刊记者/杨时 刘炎迅 (微博)(发自伊春)
田红辗转了一路，到达伊春时已经是8月25日早上8点。她想进机场，但伊春机场早已封闭。“我就想找我的孩子。”田红说。但是航空公司的人只让她到宾馆休息、等消息。
宾馆服务员问她，“你女儿叫什么名字？”“卢璐。”她说。田红走进房间，上网。女儿卢璐??航班乘务长和女婿周宾浩??乘务员的名字就排在遇难者名单的后三分之一处。
此时，像田红一样，所有接到消息的人们都陆续从全国各地赶往这个边陲小城。救援工作已在惊恐忙乱中持续超过12小时。
医院
赶来的家属们被当地政府安排在城内几个相距不远的宾馆内。在此之前，这座被森林环绕的小城市从未见过如此慌张的大批人群。当地接待者都站在宾馆大堂，直面着家属们的哭闹、沉默和叹息。
田红决定不能在这待下去，她想见女儿。航空公司答应她可以，然后又反悔。她追问原因。“已经辨认不出来了。”对方说。
她坚持去了伊春第一医院。生还者最初大多送到这里，门口停满了灯光闪烁的救护车，车门都敞开着待命。这里没有卢璐，注定的。航空公司的人说，“遇难名单核对了很多次，不会错。”她知道，这也只是安慰了。
田红开始在医院的各个病房寻找女儿的同事，她听说机组还有人生还。廉世坚就躺在病床上，浑身插满管子，在急救。作为机组成员中的安全员，他与田红认识。“对不起，对不起，对不起。”这是廉世坚看到田红后的第一句话。声音嘶哑、低沉，边说边咳。医生说，他被浓烟和高温灼伤了。
廉世坚来自单亲家庭，母亲生病，他没让人们通知家里。在慌乱的寻亲家属中间，廉世坚自己躺在那里。“别说对不起。能出来一个是一个。你妈妈没来，我代你妈妈抱抱你。”田红说。她想起卢璐刚入行不久，全家人看到电视上播放海难纪实片，船长疏散了旅客最后才弃船逃生。卢璐随口说，“其实我们也差不多。”
一语成谶。
此时，刚刚抵达伊春的其他遇难者家属有些仍在机场外大声痛哭，无法自制。伊春当地四家主要医院全部投入救治。当天市民献血量达到平日的五倍。出事航班所属河南航空公司管理层、民航总局官员以及保险公司已经抵达伊春。国务院副总理张德江带领民航、交通、安监等部门到达当地。25日当晚，15名重伤者搭乘南航?Z6268飞机从伊春飞往哈尔滨，继续接受救治。伊春当地组织了100余名医疗专家，要求每一名伤者都有一名专职医护人员负责看护。但是，当地的医疗水平和药品供应无法满足当前需求，卫生部派出专家赶往伊春。
隔着慌乱的人群和大批的医生，机长齐全军就躺在廉世坚对面的病房。眼睛肿得和鼻子一样高，头上到处是缝针，但神志还清醒。他使劲握了一下田红的手，没有说话。“我看了他的眼睛就不想再问了。谁都不想飞机出事的。”一天之后，田红坐在酒店房间对记者低声地说。
田红在医院寻找女儿的时候，她的亲家周立春刚刚得知空难的消息，立即从出差地湖北赶回湘潭老家，次日下午一点飞往哈尔滨。他的儿子周宾浩与田红的女儿卢璐同为机组空乘人员，新婚半年。
一家五口辗转到伊春时已经是27日凌晨3点。周立春和妻子张芝香一直待在宾馆，见不到儿子。有人为他们做了DNA取样。他们听说，过24小时就有比对结果。在宾馆，张芝香一直念着，没能把一张报纸带来。儿子周宾浩当兵时曾在一家贵族学校担任教官，被报纸报道。那是他最后一张照片。
25日，救援工作已经全面结束。黑匣子已经找到，并送往北京解码。这些陆续赶来的家属和调查组一样，他们想知道，前一天晚上到底发生了什么。
当晚
到处都是喊救命的声音。
刘瑞金用钥匙打开机场巡场道的门，人们从里边涌出来。刘瑞金冲着他们喊，“快，继续往外跑。”作为伊春市林都机场的副总经理，8月24日由刘瑞金值班。他冲到飞机旁边的时候，飞机火光熊熊，时不时“砰砰”响。飞机底下站着四五个人。“你们趴下，救援人员马上到了。”刘瑞金喊。“我最担心的是飞机次生爆炸再造成伤亡。”事发两天后，刘瑞金对《中国新闻周刊》记者说。
惊慌的人们全都死死抓住刘瑞金的胳膊不放。他很着急，“你们放心，救援人员肯定到。我还得去救别的人。”他对逃生者说。一个四十多岁的男人找他要矿泉水，说他非常渴。刘瑞金判断这个人有内伤，不能喝水，拒绝了。那个男人就自己趴到路边的水沟去喝，刘瑞金把他拉开，又喊了两个人把他拖走。
此时，机场地面保障部特种车驾驶员王德江正抱着一个十岁左右的小男孩往外跑。男孩口鼻淌血，无法说话。另外三名轻伤的成年人跟在王德江身后。他们乘坐机场巡场车直接去往伊春第一医院。逆着他们的方向，大批急救车和消防车从市中心奔向林都机场。
在车上，男孩仍然昏迷不醒。车尾的轻伤者有人给家人打电话。不到20分钟，到达医院，下车时，男孩醒了。王德江问他，你姓啥？他说，“姓董。”
冲到现场的医护人员对一些自己逃生的轻伤者进行简单包扎。然后，他们被陆续扶到路边。机场地面保障部机务员郭继伟发现齐全军时，他就坐在路边，在距离机头五十米的地方。郭继伟首先看到的是制服，然后看到了他肩膀上的“四道杠”，再然后是胸前的胸牌。
“你是齐机长吗？”郭继伟问齐全军。点头。
“其他机组呢？”郭继伟再问。摇头。从被发现开始，作为机长的齐全军再没对任何人说过话。
“当时他头上都是血。开始还能撑着坐着，几分钟之后就只能躺着了。”郭继伟对《中国新闻周刊》记者回忆。
生还的机长被发现时，灭火工作还在继续。从伊春市里赶来的消防队到达之前，机场消防部门已经用光了两车灭火泡沫和两车水。火势逐渐被控制。
而在两小时前，机场还十分安静，一如以往。
这个被树林包围的机场，看上去更像一个别墅区。颜色鲜亮的候机楼面积还比不上一个大城市的长途车站。售票处后方就连接着安检通道，再往后就是停机坪。
8月24日，机场副总刘瑞金值班的时候，如果说有什么事不同往常，那就是他有任务“要迎接领导”。和他一起在机场迎接的还有伊春市市长王爱文。他们等待的领导是人力资源和社会保障部的官员，由副部长孙宝树带队。一行人计划在伊春市召开“全国部分省市人力资源和社会保障事业发展‘十二五’规划座谈会”。
21点20分左右，飞机广播通知乘客飞机开始下降。十几分钟后，广播再次提醒乘客即将着陆。此时，林都机场副总经理刘瑞金看到了飞机的灯光。飞机对准跑道准备着陆。请示塔台，塔台同意降落。“一切都很正常。”刘瑞金对《中国新闻周刊》记者回忆。
他再一抬头，发现灯光消失了。
此时，飞机里一片混乱。飞机不停地颠簸，行李从架子上滑落，人们惊慌失措。渐渐有烟从飞机后方涌出。
刘瑞金给塔台打了一个电话询问情况。塔台工作人员说，“已经与飞机失去联系。”“估计出事了。你赶紧启动伊春机场一级应急救援预案。”刘瑞金说。同时，他坐上机场的车。市长王爱文也上了自己的车，同时奔向事发地。火光和爆炸声证实了他们的想法，逃生的人们从破损的飞机的洞里逃出来。
飞机断裂成两截。
登机
45分钟之前，飞机还在哈尔滨太平机场。预计20点45分起飞的航班推迟了6分钟后顺利飞向天空。
这一天，8月24日，是机组乘务员卢璐的30岁生日。母亲田红在此之前已经到达哈尔滨，她和邻居??也是卢璐的干妈??一起旅游。田红问女儿“生日打算怎么过？”卢璐说，“24号这天要飞晚班去伊春，不如提前到23号。23日飞早班，下午2点多就下班了，然后晚上可以好好聚会。”
23日这天，卢璐和自己机组成员五人以及另外一个航班的副驾驶一起在哈尔滨的饭店庆祝生日。母亲和干妈也在。吃过饭，卢璐准备去机场。上楼化妆时，母亲和干妈都去看。“真好看，像花儿一样。”母亲回忆说。女婿周宾浩也在准备去往机场，他已经给老人买了去往漠河的火车票，嘱咐他们好好玩。还说，“第二天有飞行任务，就不能送二老了。”比卢璐小六岁的周宾浩刚与她结婚半年。
他们有自己的计划。从9月2日开始，他们可以休息一段，那时他们再一起好好陪伴家人。
第二天，24日19点15分。在哈尔滨机场停靠的卢璐给母亲田红打了一个电话，告诉她自己已经飞了第一段。接下来的飞行当中就有去往伊春的一个航班。电话里，卢璐问母亲，“火车到哪了？到漠河一定要小心吃饭、住店啥的。”母亲田红还有些嗔怪，“你今天怎么这么罗嗦啊。”
与此同时，从哈尔滨经停去往伊春的旅客董辉也在给妻子发短信。“老婆，我在哈尔滨了啊。”董辉发过去。“这么快啊。”妻子回复。然后，董辉再次登机，手机关闭。董辉27岁，在广西一家轧钢厂工作，深得老板器重，所以此次被派往伊春参加一个会议。10天后，他将成为父亲。
人们在哈尔滨机场停靠时，大多都在用手机消磨时间或者联系工作。和董辉一样，胡昌年也在登机前给自己的下属发了三条短信。作为成都市劳动和社会保障局的局长，他被“人保部”点名参加伊春会议，介绍“成都经验”。三条短信中，他嘱咐下属在30日之前，要上报哪些材料。
这是一次普通的短途旅行。人们仍在盘算着飞机落地之后要做的事，仍然计划在公务、商界的打拼，计划与家人未来的旅行。在哈尔滨机场等待登机时，人们各怀心思。有人去开会，有人去洽谈生意 在他们的头脑中，生活会一直继续下去，年轻人惦念着婚约和女友，中年人惦念着老人和孩子。
没有人能预料自己给家人、朋友和同事发去的短信会成为最不像遗言的遗言。遇难者吴慎重的儿子一直记得，当天他和父亲一起吃了早餐，“豆浆、麦糊烧。”也没人知道，那是他们在一起的最后一餐。
20点40分左右，旅客们陆续从哈尔滨机场起身走上一架编号为VD8387的小飞机。一切如常，人们系好安全带，关闭手机电源，收起小桌板，和同行的朋友开始最后一次聊天。飞机顺利升空。
乘务员卢璐开始为乘客进行最后一次服务。
那一天是8月24日。农历七月十五。中元节。 ★
(实习生陈俊宇对本文亦有贡献)

description.hltext_display: Snowbound German airport sends in the clowns
description.content:
With travellers frazzled by hundreds of flight cancellations, Germany's busiest airport has hired clowns to help them and their children pass the hours, a spokeswoman said Monday. "Four clowns are performing in the terminal halls," the spokeswoman for Frankfurt's international airport told AFP.
"We came up with the idea for the kids, who are finding the delays particularly trying."
The clowns, outfitted in brightly coloured costumes and some parading on stilts, started working over the weekend, when heavy snowfall led to hundreds of flights being scrapped amid chaos in the European air traffic network.
Fights broke out at the airport among stressed-out holiday travellers late Friday, according to press reports, leading police to send in reinforcements.
More than 1,000 stranded passengers had to spend the night from Sunday to Monday at the airport, where camp beds were set up in the terminals.
On Sunday about half of Frankfurt's scheduled 1,329 flights were grounded, mainly because other airports around Europe were closed due to extreme winter weather.
Over 340 flights were axed by the early afternoon on Monday.

description.hltext_display: 海上保安庁 保安官を停職処分、長官を減俸処分へ
description.content:
尖閣諸島沖の衝突映像が流出した事件で、海上保安庁は、22日午後にも43歳の海上保安官に処分を出す方針です。また、長官も異例の減給処分となる見通しです。
これまで海上保安庁は、イージス艦の情報漏えい事件など他省庁の事例と比較しながら処分の検討を進めてきました。関係者の一人は「これで世間が納得してくれるのかはまったく読めない」と語っています。
馬淵国土交通大臣：「（保安官らの）処分の話は捜査継続中なので、現時点で申し上げることはない」
流出した映像は職員であれば誰でも閲覧できる状態で、「機密性はそれほど高くなく、ずさんな情報管理体制も背景にあった」と判断し、免職の次に重い「停職」とする方針を固めました。保安官はすでに辞表を提出していて、処分後に退職するとみられています。また、保安官の上司や流出のきっかけとなった海上保安大学校の担当者らについても一斉処分するとともに、馬淵大臣は、鈴木長官を減給処分として、自らも給与を一部返納するなど決着を図る考えです。海保の長官に対する懲戒処分は初めてとなります。一方、警視庁は、22日午後にも保安官を国家公務員法違反の疑いで書類送検する方針で、年明けには東京地検が不起訴処分にする見通しです。

description.hltext_display: Ejrcito patrulla calles de ...
description.content:
Rudy Tejeda, comandante de la 5ta. Brigada Militar, informó que los soldados patrullarán durante las 24 horas en zonas comerciales, los mercados Central, Minerva y La Terminal, en las zonas 1, 2 y 5, respectivamente.
Este plan incluye identificación de personas en zonas consideradas rojas por la incidencia delictiva: robos a comercios, asaltos a transeúntes y compradores; así como hechos contra la vida, robo de vehículos y motocicletas, entre otros.
Piden que sea permanente
Pobladores coinciden en que la presencia de soldados les brinda tranquilidad, pues muchos desconfían de la Policía Nacional Civil (PNC) porque se teme que algunos agentes sean parte de las bandas criminales, y con los operativos combinados se puede minimizar su campo de acción.
El vecino Fernando Mérida indicó que con el Ejército hay cierto grado de credibilidad, y que se sienten protegidos cuando los ven caminar por las calles.
Agregó que no todo es malo en la PNC, pues los buenos agentes hacen su esfuerzo con recursos limitados; por lo anterior, es necesario que a estos operativos se sume el esfuerzo de los pobladores, por medio de las comisiones comunitarias de seguridad enmarcadas en la Ley de Consejos de Desarrollo.
Claudia Hernández, ama de casa, refirió que tienen confianza al salir de compras cuando hay presencia de soldados, porque estos ahuyentan a los carteristas. “Como vecinos, pedimos que la presencia de los militares sea permanente, porque la PNC ya no puede controlar los índices delictivos y el crimen nos tiene de rodillas”, declaró.
El subcomisario Carmelino Hidalgo, jefe de la Comisaría 43 de Huehuetenango, indicó que los operativos se han extendido a algunos municipios como La Democracia, San Pedro Soloma y Nentón.
Piden extender operativos
Algunos alcaldes consultados indicaron que la militarización debe hacerse en todo el departamento, no solo en algunas regiones.
Julio Ambrosio, jefe edil de San Pedro Necta, resaltó que grupos delictivos actúan en los pueblos con escasa presencia de la PNC, por lo que es urgente que el Ejército apoye en acciones concretas como patrullajes combinados, sobre todo en la carretera Interamericana, que se ha convertido en un riesgo por las constantes balaceras.
En otros departamentos
Tejeda contó que los operativos se extienden a Quetzaltenango, San Marcos, Totonicapán y Quiché, donde también apoyan a la PNC.
Agregó que en conjunto con el Ejército mexicano se llevan a cabo operativos en ambos lados de la zona fronteriza, en el punto ciego conocido como Güila, La Democracia, en búsqueda de armas, drogas y traficantes de personas que operan en ese punto, que es considerado uno de los más utilizados por los criminales.
Añadió que cien soldados patrullan el lado guatemalteco, y un contingente similar en México. “Esperamos tener resultados positivos, y lo importante es que los esfuerzos binacionales han dado fruto”, comentó Tejeda.

description.hltext_display: Target Sale Looks Past Christmas
description.content:
Christmas hasn't arrived yet, but Target has already announced a sale for the days after the holiday.
A series of sale items going into effect Dec. 26 includes a Vizio 32" LED TV, a Nikon Coolpix S3000 12-megapixel digital camera, several video game titles and more than 100 DVD and Blu-ray movies that are discounted by more than 50 percent.
"Most holiday GiftCards are redeemed in our electronics department so we are gearing up for great deals on some of our guests' favorite products such as video games, TVs and cameras," Nik Nayar, vice president, merchandising at Target, said as part of the announcement.
Target is closed on Christmas Day but the sales start the day after.

event_or_fact.property: Most holiday GiftCards are redeemed in our electronics department so we are gearing up for great deals on some of our guests' favorite products such as video games, TVs and cameras

description.hltext_display: No policy change on Kashmir: U.S.
description.content: Asserting that there was ?no change? in its policy on Kashmir, the United States has said the issue ultimately lies in the hands of India and Pakistan to have a ?significant dialogue? in resolving the dispute. ?The issue of Kashmir has come up on a regular basis in our discussions with India and with Pakistan,? State Department spokesman P.J.Crowley told reporters at his daily news conference. ?There?s no mystery here. No policy change. Our answer to officials of both the countries is generally the same, that ultimately it?s Pakistan and India that have to have a significant dialogue and resolve the issue of Kashmir,? he said.

description.hltext_display: MCB Finance Sees FY10 Earnings-before-tax Profit In Line With Market View
description.content:
(RTTNews) - MCB Finance Group plc (MCRB.L) said it expects earnings-before-tax profit for the 12 months to 31 December 2010, in line with market expectations, including a profitable second half.
Since announcing its first half 2010 results in early September, the MCB Finance' performance has remained in line with market view, with continued attractive credit performance, strong lending volume growth, and enhanced profitability.
The company has managed to increase lending volumes meaningfully when compared to the first half of 2010 and the second half of 2009. Since September the group has maintained a visible marketing presence in all markets, resulting in a growing number of site visits by both new and returning customers, and attractive conversion rates. Lending volume and quality have been backed by further improvements to the company's credit scoring and extension processes.
Moving ahead, in general, the board has a positive outlook for the company's 2011 performance.

description.hltext_display: Pawlenty heads into political holding pattern
description.content:
ST. PAUL — Gov. Tim Pawlenty’s office walls, desk and shelves are already bare. He bought a used Ford Escape to get around once a state trooper-driven SUV motors on without him. And the Minnesota Republican’s staff is eagerly distributing bullet-pointed brag sheets covering his eight years in charge.
After 20 years in city and state government, Pawlenty moves soon into a political holding pattern. He leaves office in about two weeks, a step that might actually heighten his exposure.
He hits the road in January for a book tour and plans to announce by the end of March if whether he’ll seek the Republican nomination for president. Despite taking all the steps of a presidential candidate, Pawlenty insists he’s genuinely undecided as he weighs the burden on his wife and two daughters, other career options and the likelihood of success.
With no big decisions left to make as governor, Pawlenty’s record is all but cast and one he plans to vigorously defend, judging by a series of exit interviews this week. He chafes at suggestions Minnesota’s quality of life has suffered and that he didn’t do enough to rid the state of persistent budget shortfalls.
In an interview Tuesday with The Associated Press and other media outlets, Pawlenty said he believes history will show his tenure marked “the time that Minnesota finally came to terms with its excesses and got itself on a more sustainable and responsible path.”
Pawlenty said his legacy is one of tamping down spending growth and resisting legislative efforts to raise taxes rather than a single identifiable initiative or building. “This stuff doesn’t change overnight,” he said. “You don’t take a state that for most of its history has been one of the most liberal places in the country and turn it into a mainstream state in four or eight years.”
While Republicans controlled the Minnesota House during Pawlenty’s first term, there was always a Democratic counterbalance in the Senate. Democrats led both chambers throughout Pawlenty’s second term.
The political environment meant several marquee initiatives stalled soon after he put them forward: a constitutional amendment to cap state spending, new state powers to fight illegal immigration and hefty bonuses for “super teachers” who take on the toughest classroom assignments and give up usual job security.
That’s not to say Pawlenty will leave office with a blank slate of accomplishments.
He oversaw a rewrite of the state’s academic standards to implement more defined school benchmarks, he championed a merit-pay program for teachers, he won tax breaks for businesses that relocate to or expand in distressed towns and he signed noteworthy legislation favored by anti-abortion interests and pro-gun groups. He briefly pushed to reinstate the death penalty, but that drive went nowhere.
Pawlenty and legislative Democrats often pushed each other to the brink — and beyond. In 2005, there was a partial government shutdown before a budget agreement was reached. Four years later, Pawlenty stretched the bounds of executive authority to make deep budget cuts on his own that were ultimately overturned by the courts.
Early in his tenure, Pawlenty wasn’t shy about making waves on things frowned on by GOP leaders. Most notably, he pressed ahead on an initiative allowing state residents to buy prescription drugs from Canada despite opposition from then-President George W. Bush’s administration.
But as Pawlenty’s political stock rose — he was a vice presidential contender in 2008 and has been on lists of White House hopefuls since — allies and foes alike noticed the governor straying from party positions less often and saw his stances harden.
“He was always conservative, but I don’t know of anything in the last two years he bucked the party on. That’s not always good,” said former Senate Minority Leader Dick Day, a Republican who wants to see Pawlenty run for president.
When Pawlenty sought the job in 2002, there was some concern among fiscal conservatives about Pawlenty’s resolve. David Strom, who formerly led the Taxpayers League of Minnesota, said Pawlenty quickly erased those doubts, holding to his no-new-taxes pledge even when greeted with a $4.5 billion shortfall.
“When Pawlenty went into office (conservatives) thought they were getting a moderate status quo politician from Eagan. That’s not what people got,” Strom said. “With Pawlenty, what they got was a new, more moderate face to conservatism that people could identify with.”
Strom added, “He could have gotten away with modest tax increases, but he didn’t go there.”
Pawlenty didn’t quite put government on a starvation diet. He tried unsuccessfully to get the state a share of casino profits by partnering with hard-luck Indian tribes. He embraced a 75-cent-per-pack charge on cigarettes so long as it was labeled a “health impact fee” instead of a tax. A host of user fees, fines and surcharges also rose on his watch.
After the deadly interstate bridge collapse in Minneapolis, Pawlenty opened the door to a gas tax hike, but later retreated. The Legislature enacted one through a veto override, the only time he was trumped.
With the help of temporary budget cuts, federal stimulus money and payment delays, Minnesota’s general fund spending for the current budget is smaller than the one before. On average, spending grew less than 1 percent per two-year budget since 2003.
Pawlenty’s successor, Democratic Gov.-elect Mark Dayton, inherits a $6.2 billion deficit though as costs rise, spending commitments snap back, IOUs come due and stimulus dollars go away. Pawlenty said he doesn’t consider that problem very daunting if one-time cuts he pursued are made permanent and spending is otherwise restrained.
“You can bring this thing down dramatically and approach eliminating it without even breaking a sweat,” he said.
For years, Democrats tried to plug the gap with higher taxes. Pawlenty piled up record-setting vetoes.
Pawlenty was eager to cut deals in two areas: agriculture and assistance to military veterans. Democratic state Rep. Al Juhnke credited the governor on both fronts, especially his outfront push to double the ethanol in gasoline sold in Minnesota by 2015.
Juhnke suspects politics played into Pawlenty’s dealings on ethanol.
“Tim Pawlenty is not politically naive. Tim Pawlenty is headed into a presidential race, most likely. The first state he stops in is Iowa, where biofuels are huge,” Juhnke said. “Don’t for one minute doubt that Tim Pawlenty hasn’t had that in the back of his mind.”
Pawlenty makes his first trip as an ex-governor to that presidential proving ground at the end of January.

he believes history will show his tenure marked ?the time that Minnesota finally came to terms with its excesses and got itself on a more sustainable and responsible path.? Pawlenty said his legacy is one of tamping down spending growth and resisting legi

description.hltext_display: 1週間は余震による津波に注意必要 父島近海M7.4
description.content:
22日未明、小笠原諸島で震度4を観測した地震について、気象庁は、今後、1週間ほどは余震によって数十センチの津波が起きる可能性があるとして注意を呼びかけています。
午前2時20分ごろ、父島付近でマグニチュード7.4の地震があり、小笠原村で震度4を観測しました。この地震で、小笠原諸島に津波警報が、静岡から西の太平洋岸に津波注意報が出され、八丈島八重根で60センチ、父島二見で30センチなどの津波を観測しました。津波警報と注意報は午前7時20分にすべて解除されました。小笠原村役場などによると、けが人の情報は入っていないということです。
横山博文地震津波監視課長：「数十センチくらいの津波を発生させるような余震が起こる可能性がある」
気象庁では、今後、数日から1週間は余震による津波に注意するよう呼びかけています。

description.hltext_display: Ukraine reporter's bunny costume sparks parliament scandal
description.content:
A journalist for national Ukrainian television sparked a scandal Tuesday by turning up at work in parliament dressed as a bunny in protest at the sometimes farcical behaviour of MPs. Dressed head-to-toe as a white bunny with two huge ears comically sprouting from his head, Roman Vintoniv somehow managed to keep a straight face as he conducted lobby interviews with besuited lawmakers.
He said his action was a protest against the sometimes comic behaviour of lawmakers in the Verkhovna Rada who last week exchanged blows in a bloody punch-up that wounded several lawmakers.
"If the Verkhovna Rada is turning into a circus, then this needs to be officially acknowledged and people need to dress appropriately," Vintoniv told the influential news website Ukrainska Pravda.
Ukrainska Pravda said the parliament press service tried to have him expelled on the grounds that his external appearance was not in line with the rules.
But his colleagues then pointed out that the parliament has no dress code and he was able to carry out his work, carrying out interviews with some MPs, video footage posted on the Internet showed.
However some of his normal contacts refused to talk to him, Ukrainska Pravda said.
Friday's brawl -- which saw punches thrown and chairs hurled -- was one of the worst for years in the Rada and started after opposition deputies blockaded themselves inside the chamber.
Kiev prosecutors Tuesday said they had opened a criminal inquiry into the fighting, which came amid a legal probe against former prime minister and opposition leader Yulia Tymoshenko.
Ukrainians regularly express exasperation over their notoriously fractious parliament, suspecting that many lawmakers act in the interests of local oligarchs rather than ordinary citizens.

event_or_fact.property: his action was a protest against the sometimes comic behaviour of lawmakers in the Verkhovna Rada who last week exchanged blows in a bloody punch-up that wounded several lawmakers
