description.hltext_display: 背着单反逛世博
description.content:
博办在家门口，上海人民得天独厚坐享其成，同事朋友也就隔三差五地去为7000万作贡献。自己当然不能落后，只是更喜欢一个人逛，自由自在。
一个人的好处是随意，想好去哪个馆，立马过去，看看排队长龙，当即改变主意，喜欢的场馆，流连忘返几回，不喜欢的，护照上敲个图章，到此一游了。临机应变中，节省了不少时间，角角落落，大大小小，十余处进进出出园区，也就逐渐把大多数国家馆扫荡了下来。一个人的不便之处要拍个照什么的，总是劳驾陌生朋友，当然也要察言观色，尽量挑个放心的高手。而真正的高手们往往或发烧或骨灰，时间宝贵，160元的代价总得物尽其用。所以自己将卡片换成单反，扛上三角架，塞进闪光灯，按上遥控器，自娱自乐。
游客来自五湖四海，大家拖儿带女扶老携幼，基本都是小巧DC留下纪念。我这一套行头，这种架势，显然有点惹眼。这套家伙随身而行，几乎被人确认为我是专业摄影师或是媒体记者。排在队伍里常在有游客问，你是来创作的，那家报社的，一定发表过不少作品？我摇头，我说记者是可以有VIP通道的...
不过背上了这套沉重的家伙，我的摄影水平被提高了。被邀请摁快门也就变得稀松平常了。有的是像我一样的独行客，有的是举家合影，有的是情侣相依....这样的好事做得太多，举不胜举。我乐于助人而且热情空前，往往几张连拍，让他们满意为止。说是那天晚上十点多了，在世博轴下，看到两位女人围着两只轮椅转悠。原来是两位来自东北的姐妹，带着她们的父母——只能坐在轮椅上的一对耄耋老人，帮助父母圆世博梦的。姐妹让我帮他们拍个合影，她们反复提醒我，要等那背景变成红色,这样有点喜气....我为他们拍了很多。老爷爷精神尚好，想我不停说谢谢谢谢，老太太显然苍老了许多，只是用那呆滞的眼睛看着我。我跟他们说了声再见，几步后回首，只见那魔幻的图形不断交换的色彩映在他们的脸上....
背上专业的家伙，我的技术也被提高了。那天在尼泊尔馆正琢磨那雕工精致繁杂的门框，一对情侣捧着个D80过来。
——对不起问一下先生，我们拍的照片曝光怎么老是不对啊？
——我看看，我看看....
我想我只是三脚猫，谁知道什么原因啊。扛着大家伙，也就再“被”一下了。拿来一看，原来他们把模式调在S,速度奇快。我建议，你们不要S了，不要A了，更不要M了，就弄在P吧。他们试了一下，果然好了....
由此在斯里兰卡馆，一位哥们过来咨询，闪光灯不亮了，前面还是好的...
——电有吗？
——有的。
我装模作样拿来看了一下设置模式，试了一下，还是不亮。把闪光灯退下，重新装上。试了一下，好了！原来这位哥们没有用力推进热靴，应该是触点没有对准...
还在斯里兰卡，在出售徽章柜台边买了个小徽章。站着的那位小黑盯着我的家伙仔细看着，滴滴嘟嘟说了一大串，我只得pardon pardon几下，终于明白他以为我是在media company职员了，我如实相告，我在一家chemical company谋生，这个家伙只是自己的hobby而已。
如果这届世博会推举几个热门词的话，那么“排队”一定忝列其中。9月去张家界，游人如织，乘索道队伍奇长，有人长叹，排到什么时候啊...我说，这么一列队伍，不算什么，我是排过世博的....大凡在世博会排过几次超长队伍的，应该算是见过世面的，跑哪儿也不怕排队的。话说那天在阿联酋馆排队，队伍也是超长。队伍的末端贴有友情提醒，大约需要三小时。于是，加入蛇阵，蜿蜒缠绵，磨磨蹭蹭。队伍愈长，背着的家伙就觉得愈重。为了暂缓肩膀压力，于是把相机架上三角架，支在地上，慢慢挪吧...却说有数位猛男，排队至一折弯处，想来是冒出越位邪念，东张西望着寻找作案机会，结果一猛男扫描到了我的单反行头和我的眼神，而且断定了我的身份。——算了算了，记者在，记者在。
逛世博拍照片无数，不过好事也做了不少，且算自己是编外志愿者吧。

description.hltext_display: Rugby - CE - Ellissalde : «Chapeau aux joueurs»
description.content:
Jean-Baptiste Elissalde (entraîneur des avants de Toulouse) : «On s'était préparés pour samedi soir et ça a traîné, c'était � peine croyable. Il faut tirer un coup de chapeau aux joueurs qui ne se sont pas démobilisés et remercier le public qui a pu venir. Dans cette poule on se doutait dès le coup de sifflet du match aller face aux Wasps que tout allait se jouer sur cette dernière rencontre. Il faudra faire avant un bon résultat contre Newport et malgré notre application je ne vois pas les Wasps perdre � Glasgow, donc tout se jouera chez eux lors du dernier match.»Vincent Clerc (ailier de Toulouse) : «On avait envie de bien faire après cette longue attente de ce match deux fois décalé. Ca a fait monter la pression et il y avait pas mal d'envie de bien faire. On avait surtout envie de retrouver le niveau que l'on avait fin octobre et début novembre, et je pense après ce match que l'on tend vers cela. Dans cette poule on est � la lutte avec les Wasps et tout se jouera sûrement dans les dernières minutes du dernier match en Angleterre. Mais avant, il était capital de réussir un match plein. Mon essai, c'est un cadeau de Yannick Jauzion qui avait envie de me faire un cadeau de Noël avant l'heure en me faisant marquer ce 31e.»Louis Picamoles (3e ligne de Toulouse) : «On savait que contre cette équipe même si on prenait le large au tableau d'affichage elle n'allait rien lâcher. Elle l'a encore prouvé ce soir lorsque le score était acquis et qu'elle a continué � jouer et � nous poser des problèmes. On a su garder le rythme même quand le bonus a été acquis, c'est le point positif. Ce n'était pas évident de préparer ce match avec les reports. Mais on a su garder la concentration et ce qui fait plaisir c'est que le stade était quand même plein malgré ce décalage. Maintenant une victoire � la maison sera primordiale avant d'aller chez les Wasps disputer la première place et un quart de finale � la maison. Mais on en est loin encore, ce serait une erreur de brûler les étapes, � nous de savoir bien replonger dans le Top 14 qui nous attend avant cela.»
Maxime Médard (ailier de Toulouse) : «On a attendu quelques jours de plus pour jouer, c'était un peu long et stressant mais finalement on décroche le bonus, c'est une bonne issue � tout ça. Ils nous attendaient sur l'extérieur et comme au match aller on a percé devant avec notre pack qui a fait un gros match.»Sean Laneen (manageur général de Glasgow) : «C'est déj� suffisamment difficile contre le champion d'Europe en titre � 15 contre 15, alors avec deux cartons jaunes dans la partie c'était devenu impossible malgré un bon début de deuxième mi-temps de notre part. Malgré la défaite je me félicite de l'état d'esprit de l'équipe qui est restée soudée dans les moments difficiles. J'ai beaucoup de respect pour cette équipe de Toulouse, c'est toujours un plaisir de l'affronter et de venir dans ce lieu emblématique du rugby en France. Quand nos bagages n'étaient pas � notre descente d'avion et quand on a vu qu'ils ne pouvaient pas arriver il a fallu prendre une décision et la respecter. Je ne pense pas qu'il y ait beaucoup d'équipes qui prennent leurs équipements en bagage � main. Je remercie Toulouse qui a essayé de trouver toutes les solutions et qui a su être patient.» (AFP)

description.hltext_display: 渝遂高速因雾数十辆车连环相撞5死6伤(组图)
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
今晨的一场大雾引发渝遂高速公路数十辆车连环相撞，图为事故现场一片狼藉。 吴峤 摄 华龙网发一辆大货车被撞得面目全非。 吴峤 摄 华龙网发消防官兵和医务人员抢救伤员。 吴峤 摄 华龙网发一名被困伤员被成功救出。 吴峤 摄 华龙网 华龙网12月22日15时讯(数字记者庞可、通讯员吴峤) 今日凌晨，一场大雾突袭山城重庆，渝遂高速公路能见度足20米。早上8时许，渝遂高速往重庆方向青木关路段发生多起连环相撞车祸，2公里长的路上，几十辆大货车、客车及小轿车相继撞在一起。截止目前，事故共造成5人死亡、6人受伤(2人重伤、4人轻伤)。
今晨8时左右，渝遂高速璧山站外，车辆已排起长龙，渝遂高速璧山站关闭。在车祸现场，二十多辆车发生碰撞，造成渝遂高速沙区青木关境内往主城方向交通瘫痪。
由于车辆拥堵，消防车无法到达救援现场。璧山消防官兵携带液压工具组、撬杠、绝缘钳等救援工具跑步赶往事故现场。随后，高速公路执法部门和120急救车也在现场展开救援。
截止目前，此次事故共造成5人死亡、6人受伤(2人重伤、4人轻伤)，事故原因正在调查之中。

description.hltext_display: 17% of iPad Homes Have Second Tablet
description.content:
Get the Flash Player to see this rotator.
Seventeen percent of Apple iPad owners say there’s more than one tablet device in their home, according to research from YouGov. Thirty-seven percent of iPad owners told the research firm that their significant other uses their iPad as well, and 14% said they purchased another iPad for their child.

description.hltext_display: ナベヅルから鳥インフル検出 周辺の養鶏場を検査
description.content:
鹿児島県の出水平野には、絶滅が心配されている「ナベヅル」が飛来しています。しかし、21日までに鳥インフルエンザの陽性反応が出て、1羽からは「H5N1型」が検出されました。この出水平野には世界のナベヅルの約9割が集まるため、感染の拡大が心配されています。
鳥インフルエンザに感染しているのが確認されたナベヅルの1羽は、今月18日に出水平野の飛来地で衰弱していたところを保護され、その後、死亡しました。
環境省鳥獣保険医管理員・年神浩正さん：「けいれん状態のような形をしていた」
鹿児島県が簡易検査を行ったところ、鳥インフルエンザの陽性反応が出たため、その検体を鳥取大学に送り、詳しい検査をした結果、鳥インフルエンザウイルス「H5N1亜型」が検出されました。鹿児島県は21日付で対策本部を設置し、このナベヅルが保護された現場から半径10キロを監視区域に設定し、区域内の養鶏農場を対象に22日朝から立ち入り検査を行っています。この出水地方は鹿児島県内でも有数の養鶏の産地でもあり、養鶏農家は対応に追われています。
赤鶏農業協同組合・中本英雄さん：「防疫態勢は最高レベルでやっている。それを徹底してやるしかない」
出水平野のツルは国の特別天然記念物に指定されていて、今シーズンもシベリアなどから約1万3000羽のツルが飛来していて、その9割がナベヅルです。地元の出水市では、飛来地にあるツル観察センターの閉館や進入道路の規制についても検討しています。

description.hltext_display: License To Thrill
description.content:
Bond Is Back
Blood Stone Picks Up After Quantam of Solace
GiN Senior Reviewer
Check out all of our past reviews.
A top secret project fallen into the hands of a menacing enemy, a mission so delicate that public exposure would be considered an astronomical catastrophe, a myriad of death-defying feats and obstacles, a daring trip around the globe, one of the baddest secret agents the world has ever known, and of course the girl. One way or another he always gets the girl. That’s right Bond is back and he’s doing it big in his newest action-packed espionage thriller “Bloodstone 007” for 360 and various platforms.
The Mission: The UK’s top secret biochemical project has fallen into the wrong hands. (How many times have we heard a line like this before? Lol.) As always there are the usual suspects but we all know that in the world of international conspiracy things aren’t always what they seem to be on the surface. Charged with the responsibility of recovering stolen goods and dealing swift justice to the alleged assailants, the secret service deploys their best agent in the business: that would be you. That is Bond…James Bond actually. What follows next is one serious action-packed adventure filled with mystery, intrigue, suspense, close quarters combat, sophisticated weapons of destruction, beautiful girls and a string of dead bodies along the way before Bond finds himself at the bottom of the situation.
Visually, the game isn’t a knockout in terms of graphics but for the most part it’s a pretty polished title. The opening epilogue kicks things off really well packing tons of great eye candy and spectacular flare to sort of set the mood for Bonds next adventure and deliver a solid presentation. From there James will travel all around the globe to all types of exotic locales including Siberia, Bangkok, Athens, Monte Carlo, Russia, Thailand and even Istanbul.
Sporting solid audio as well as visuals no Bond game would be complete without the infamous Bond track. Bloodstone mixes up a short list of other cool songs to compliment all the action and suspense helping to keep the theme of the game from going stale. Though the plot leaves a little for the wanting the voice-overs of the game are good utilizing the main players from the “Casino Royale” cast, Judi Dench starring as “M” and Daniel Craig as “James” himself. Also worthy of notability, the weapons and their various sound effects are done very well adding a little extra joy to your game play experience every time you find a new gun to play with.
Bloodstone is variably improved over its former predecessor “Quantam of Solace” which received pretty good reviews overall. This time round players will play through a more original storyline as well as see a little more in terms of action in Bonds newest venture.
Taking a little more than a few pages out of the “Splinter Cell: Conviction” handbook, Bloodstone utilizes a lot of “duck and cover” tactics and mixes it all up with some very cool stealth attacks. The controls feel really good allowing players to move from cover to cover with ease as well as aim and shoot down enemies before they get a shot off. With a little strategy and/or patience players can move in close and take down enemies “ninja-style,” hardly making a sound and in some cases quickly ducking back into cover. The concept becomes easily adoptable as players quickly get used to the controls and it’s not long before they’re moving and looking the secret agent part, leaving them with a real sense of accomplishment.
Once you nail down the basics then you can really take advantage of the games “Focus Aim” feature. For every takedown Bond pulls off his Focus meter increases allowing him to pull off deadly accurate kill shots. The meter can be filled with a maximum of three kill shots and when Bond has more than one Focus Aim he can chain these shots all together at once and drop multiple enemies within seconds. This is arguably one of the hottest features of the game allowing players to sort of personalize their own combat tactics chain-linking takedowns and focus attacks together achieving the style of game play they desire.
On the other hand, some might argue that the superb “high-speed sequences” are the greatest feature of the game. Wanting to give fans the authentic Bond experience of recent big screen films, developer Bizzare Creations has implemented a series of chase sequences that take place across land and sea. The sequences prove not only to be a real adrenaline rush but quite challenging as players will have to utilize speed, wits, and handbrakes to maneuver around collapsing bridges, on-coming traffic, crumbling landscapes, helicopter gunships and also fend off sharpshooters zooming around in nearby transport vehicles. The chases are fully satisfying, helping to put the final touches on a solid game play engine.
Besides high-speed chases, guns, and martial arts Bond also has a unique “Smartphone” at his disposal. The Smartphone allows him to hack terminals and cameras, track enemies, download intel, locate important objects and identify mission objectives. During missions players will need to keep an eye out for the “AR Node Proximity Indicator” which will appear on screen when Bond comes in close range with a hack-able source. Once in range all players need to do is hit the “Up” button on the D-pad to commence hacking. The game challenges players to unlock deeper intel from the story’s plot as well as build a full folio of information resulting in achievements and trophies.
Though Bloodstone certainly has a lot of good things going for it, it does have its annoying hang ups. For starters the exciting single-player levels are a bit short-lived and can be finished about 4 to 6 hours even though it does have significant replay value. To make matters worse, the multiplayer mode of the game is very lack luster and quite frankly little to no fun at all. It’s very disappointing that you can’t take down opposing players the way you do in the single player mode. It also would have been nice if a multiplayer high-speed chase mode, “good guys vs. bad guys,” could have been implemented, but perhaps that would have been asking too much.
None the less, I would not write this game off by any means, especially if you happen to be a big Bond fan. The game sports great visuals, a very solid and entertaining single player experience, and a decent amount of replay value. If you’re a Bond fanatic and also enjoyed playing “Quantam of Solace” then you’re mostly likely going to want to make Bloodstone a part of your personal gaming library.
Living up to the big-screen films, this game has some real playability racking up a solid 4 out of 5 GiN gems.
Editor’s Note: Game reviewed on an Xbox 360 console.
Returnto our home page to see all of today's news and reviews.
Jevon Jenkins enjoys all types of games, especially those where the programmer's imagination is evident. He can be reached at : malc2127@hotmail.com.

description.hltext_display: 検察官役弁護士が聴取要請 小沢氏元秘書側は拒否
description.content:
民主党・小沢元代表の政治資金をめぐる事件で、強制起訴へ向けた手続きを進めている指定弁護士が、小沢氏の元秘書らに対して事情聴取を要請したことが分かりました。
検察審査会が小沢氏を「起訴すべき」と議決したことを受けて、検察官役となる指定弁護士3人は、補充捜査の一環として関係者から事情聴取を行うなど、強制起訴に向けた手続きを進めています。指定弁護士は、起訴された元秘書の石川知裕被告ら3人についても、小沢氏との共謀の有無を確認するために21日に事情聴取を要請したことを明らかにしました。石川被告の弁護人は「刑事被告人の立場であり、裁判も控えている」として要請を拒否したということです。指定弁護士は、来年早々にも小沢氏を強制起訴する見通しです。

description.hltext_display: 选择比努力更重要
description.content:
在传统教育模式下，我们试着接纳过来人辛酸的教训。做梦，成为人生的主旋律。爱幻想，使伤痛随着时间而淡忘。信念和志向，仅是瞬间绽放的烟花。浪漫过后，却无法真正弥补内心的空洞。 肆无忌惮追寻世外仙境，躲避是非的世俗。希望在田野里，浑浑噩噩。面临抉择时，却以独善其身的姿态自傲。接受不了沉痛的打击，便开始随波逐流。不敢承诺，不敢言志，深怕无法兑现触伤柔弱的心。
简单重复，坚持学习，塑造自我独立的人格魅力。我照做，深信不再质疑。不管明天如何，定要过好今天。鼓足勇气，迈出步伐，走进玫琳凯的工作室。一个仅属于美丽女人的世界，因女友盛情邀约前去听讲。不免有些尴尬，却不维诺。周身尽是靓丽的美女，鲜有男嘉宾的出席惹来不少注视的目光。静静地处在一旁，了解未知领域的智慧和宝典。
大屏幕上正在播放公司简介：美丽不只一面，心动不止一刻。玫琳凯是家化妆品公司，全球直销企业之一，由玫琳凯.艾施女士创办于1963年，总部位于美国德克萨斯州达拉斯市...爱美是女人的天性，懵懂的我一下子记不得那么多。随后，美丽的女主人上台先致热烈的欢迎词。感谢玫琳凯提供这个事业的平台，感谢那些喜欢并支持玫琳凯的客户，感谢曾给予引导并帮助过的前辈，感谢一路辛勤付出的伙伴... 信念第一，家庭第二，事业第三。 每当有人站起讲出美丽的宣言，赞美的掌声络绎不绝。跳着奇旋的踏浪舞，使得这间小小的工作室充满了活力和温馨。
授人玫瑰，手有余香。玫瑰家族不仅散发着女性着迷的魅力，且能使女人拥有一份增值性的事业。没有任何一款产品的介绍，请人上台分享与玫琳凯的亲密接触。 那些傲人成绩的背后，隐藏着许多不为人知的故事。印象最深的是一位背井离乡的女人，她曾做过超市营业员、缝纫工、服务员等各种职位来上海谋生。起初到玫琳凯，做兼职被礼品店的老板娘嘲笑道：你这个样子，也配做化妆品。失落的一段时间后，为自己打气重新出发。刻苦努力，认真坚持，手下现拥有许多美容顾问，成为玫琳凯的资深督导。现在的她很自信，很美丽...虽然是平凡的，真实的经历，却打动着那颗无意的心。在场有60后，70后，80后...涵盖了整个年龄层不同职业的女性。从不自信、猜忌多疑到忘我的投入，深深爱上玫琳凯的事迹。
聚精会神地专注着，被眼前的精彩忘乎所以。请新来的嘉宾上台，有人拍了我肩膀一下。起身，走上前去。女主人示意用一句话分享，谈一下自己。我有幸站在台前，简单地做自我介绍。“一份感动，一份真诚，让我有机会了解玫琳凯，认识这么多美貌与智慧兼备的女士们。谢谢！”又引来一阵又一阵热烈的掌声，以示欢迎。不时的提醒自己，要集人所长弥补所短。两小时的分享课程完毕，脑中挥之不去的话： 。

description.hltext_display: Merrion Pharma Collaborates With Novo Nordisk
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Merrion Pharmaceuticals Plc Wednesday said that it signed a Collaboration and Option agreement with Novo Nordisk (NVO). The agreement will evaluate the ability of Merrion's patented GIPET technology to boost the oral bioavailability of an undisclosed proprietary compound.
As part of the agreement Merrion granted Novo Nordisk a warrant to acquire ordinary shares of up to â¬1.50 million in Merrion at closing share price of â¬3.00. The warrant will be exercisable for 20 business days commencing on the day following the signing of a license agreement.
Merrion can also request Novo Nordisk to acquire up to â¬500,000 worth of shares in Merrion at closing share price of â¬3.00 exercisable for 20 business days commencing on the day following the signing of a license agreement.
Following the feasibility studies, Novo Nordisk will have the option to enter into a further licensing agreement for Merrion's GIPET technology. The financial terms of a possible future licensing agreement have been pre-agreed.
Commenting on the announcement, John Lynch, CEO, Merrion Pharmaceuticals said, "we are very pleased to be entering into another agreement with Novo Nordisk with our unique GIPET technology. This agreement further strengthens the between the two companies following the license agreements for oral GLP-1 and Insulin respectively. This, along with the other recently announced agreements with Rebel and a top 10 pharma company, means that Merrion has an additional 6 compounds in its preclinical pipeline."

description.hltext_display: Crean ratón que canta
description.content:
Científicos japoneses anunciaron ayer la creación de un ratón que canta como un pájaro, una “evolución” producto de la ingeniería genética, con la que esperan arrojar luz sobre los orígenes del lenguaje humano.
Anterior Siguiente
Un equipo de investigadores de la Universidad de Osaka creó este animal, luego de haber experimentado con ratones genéticamente modificados, propensos a las mutaciones.
“Un día encontramos un ratón que cantaba como un pájaro”, refirió el científico Arikuni Uchimura, aunque aclaró que el ratón cantarín nació por casualidad, pero ese rasgo se transmitirá a futuras generaciones.

description.hltext_display: 携帯サイトでポイント交換 運営会社を脱税で告発
description.content:
携帯電話サイトの運営会社が、約5000万円を脱税したとして刑事告発されました。
告発されたのは、渋谷区の「ツミキプロモーション」と佐藤裕隆社長（35）ら取締役2人です。関係者によると、ツミキプロモーションは、貯めたポイントを換金できる携帯サイトを運営していて、サイトの広告費やイベントの制作費などとして架空の経費を計上し、2年間に約1億8000万円の所得を隠していました。東京国税局は、法人税約5000万円を脱税した疑いで告発しました。ツミキプロモーションは修正申告する方針で、「今後は注意して参りたい」としています。

description.hltext_display: Man gets 3½ years for St. Paul bat attack
description.content:
ST. PAUL - A 21-year-old man was sentenced Monday to 3½ years in prison for the baseball bat attack of a good Samaritan in St. Paul.
Ahmed Farah Hirsi pleaded guilty in November to aiding and abetting second-degree assault. Edwin Daniel, 40, suffered a severe head injury during the May 25 assault.
He drove an airport shuttle for a St. Paul hotel and regularly visited a SuperAmerica. A few days before the assault, he defended a female clerk who was being harassed by a group of men.
The same men allegedly went after Daniel, with several wielding baseball bats.
Hirsi was among four charged and the last to be sentenced. The St. Paul Pioneer Press reports that police are seeking a fifth man, but none of his co-defendants has disclosed his identity.

description.hltext_display: Newcomers crowd field for school board
description.content:
10 enter races for 3 seats in Feb. 1 election
Robert Nott | The New Mexican
Comments
Print | Font Size:
advertisement
Ten candidates filed for three positions Tuesday on the Santa Fe Public Schools Board of Education.
Two current members — Richard Polese in District 2 and Angélica Ruiz in District 4 — are not running again, meaning there will be at least two newcomers on the board. Incumbent Mary Ellen Gonzales is facing three opponents in District 1.
The election is Feb. 1, and new board members take office March 1.
The big challenges facing the board include a budget deficit that could reach $9 million or more, the closing of Acequia Madre Elementary School and consolidation of its students at Atalaya Elementary School, and a districtwide rezoning plan that could involve another closure and a new school.
District 1
STEVEN CARRILLO
Steven Carrillo showed up at the Santa Fe County Clerk's Office first, around 9 a.m., to declare his intent to run against Gonzales. Carrillo, a substitute teacher, a former union organizer and the father of a Wood Gormley Elementary School fifth-grader, said that, if elected, he will work to build parent and teacher participation for any decisions the board makes.
"I'm a dad," he said. "Ultimately, I want there to be great schools in Santa Fe." He's one of several candidates who would like to change the start time of board meetings from 4:30 to 6 p.m. in an effort to attract more parents and community members.
CARL LUFF
Carl Luff, president of Raymond James Financial Services, a local brokerage firm, appeared shortly after Carrillo to file his candidacy, also in District 1. Luff is a certified public accountant and the father of three adult daughters. He has also served as treasurer for the board of directors for Partners in Education and has volunteered on both the school district's Citizens Review Committee and its audit committee.
Luff said he's been studying the district's budget and realizes the board faces serious money challenges as the state grapples with a still-unknown financial shortfall. He believes the district is being transparent with its financial figures, but said it could do a better job formatting the budget so the average citizen can read and understand it. He wants to create stronger board subcommittees that include parents and teachers to increase community involvement.
MARY ELLEN GONZALES
Gonzales declared her candidacy around noon Tuesday. She's been on the board since 2003 and serves as its vice president. She's been emphasizing her experience and the benefit of maintaining some stability on the board, as well as the need to address student-achievement scores. Though school-board candidates are not required by state law to reveal who makes contributions to their campaigns, Gonzales said she plans to set up an online accounting of donations for transparency's sake. (When asked, most of the other candidates in all the districts said they are willing to do the same.)
ALEXIS LOTERO
Alexis Lotero also entered the District 1 race Tuesday afternoon. She could not be reached for comment.
District 2
GLENN WIKLE
Polese's seat attracted four candidates. Glenn Wikle has been an outspoken critic of some of the board's decisions regarding the closure and consolidation of small schools. He has two children in local schools: a 10th-grader at Santa Fe High and an 11th-grader at Monte del Sol Charter School. Another child in his care is a fourth-grader at Acequia Madre.
Wikle showed up a little past 9 Tuesday morning. He said the budget will be the No. 1 issue this spring, and he's already looking for creative ways to bring in revenue or cut without hurting the classroom.
MELISSA COLEMAN
Melissa Coleman, the mother of two Atalaya Elementary School third-graders, has a background in fundraising and is co-owner (with her husband, Scott) of La Puerta Originals. She's also filing for District 2.
"I feel I can bring some positive and creative ideas for helping to get alternative types of funding for the public schools," Coleman said. "Cuts will be a reality, but we have to look at positive solutions to how we can adequately fund our public schools."
While Coleman personally opposes the Acequia Madre/Atalaya consolidation, she said there are much bigger issues for the board to deal with in the immediate future.
DONADO COVIELLO
Donado "Cove" Coviello — an artist, activist, retired business owner and former substitute teacher — also threw his hat in the ring for District 2. He was honest about his intentions.
"I got in the race because I didn't want anybody to run unopposed," Coviello said, acknowledging there's a chance he will withdraw come Dec. 28 — the cutoff date for candidates to change their minds and pull out of the race — if he's satisfied with the quality of the other candidates. He's anxious to hear what their views are on various issues, and said he's against the idea of small-school closures and consolidation.
"This job is a hard job, and you better want to do what's right for the community," he said.
CLAIRE BROUILLETTE
Claire Brouillette also put in a bid for District 2, but said she didn't want to talk to the press until it is determined that she is a legal candidate. It seems she moved from one address within District 2 to another several years ago but failed to change the address on her voter-registration form. This could disqualify her, she said — a point confirmed by Denise Lamb, Santa Fe County elections director.
District 4
LINDA TRUJILLO
In District 4, two candidates came forth. Linda Trujillo, a former Head Start teacher and the mother of adult children, is running. Like the other candidates, she said the budget is the biggest concern now. But she emphasized, "The big issue is really the education of our kids. My first question as a board member will always be, 'Is this decision going to benefit the kids and improve the quality of their education?' "
JASON BERNARD ROMERO
Her opponent is Jason Bernard Romero. The father of an Acequia Madre student and a state employee, he said he entered the race to make sure someone was running to represent District 4. Upon encountering Trujillo in the County Clerk's Office, he agreed to meet with her again one-on-one to discuss their positions. He said there is a slight chance he will withdraw by next week if he feels she is qualified. Transparency is his big issue, he said.
Lamb said two other people showed up to declare their candidacy, but they were turned away as they did not meet the voter-registration requirements for the position.
The new board will choose a successor to Polese as board president as well as the new vice president and secretary. Normally, those jobs are rotated among the members with the longest tenure.
Meanwhile, incumbent Andrea B. Bermudez was the only person to declare her candidacy for the one open governing-board position at Santa Fe Community College — a term of six years. This is the first time Santa Fe residents can vote in board elections for both Santa Fe Public Schools and Santa Fe Community College on the same day. According to the college and the County Clerk's Office, the cost of separate board elections usually totals about $85,000. This move will cut that expense in half.
Qualified electors have until Jan. 4 to register to vote at the Office of the County Clerk, 102 Grant Ave.
Contact Robert Nott at 986-3021 or rnott@sfnewmexican.com.

description.hltext_display: 内蒙古自治区经济增长速度连续八年全国第一
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
中国网12月22日讯 十一届全国人大常委会第十八次会议于12月20日至25日在人民大会堂举行。本次会议定22日下午第二次全体会议听取国务院的3个报告，即关于加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展工作情况的报告、关于深化医药卫生体制改革工作情况的报告、关于加快服务业工作的报告。中国网对会议进行了实时报道。
国家民族事务委员会主任杨晶表示：“十一五”以来，民族地区的地区生产总值、财政收入每年均以两位数的速度增长，高于全国平均增速，综合经济实力大幅提升。
2009年，民族8省区地区生产总值达到34619亿元，年均增长13.1％；人均地区生产总值达到18014元，占全国的比重比2005年提高了5.1个百分点。城镇居民人均可支配收入14070元、农民人均纯收入3931元，分别比2005年提高5328元和1654元。内蒙古自治区经济增长速度自2002年以来连续八年保持全国第一，地区生产总值在全国排名由第24位上升到第15位。

description.hltext_display: 'Somewhere'
description.author: KENNETH TURAN - Los Angeles Times
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- "Somewhere" is a kind of road movie of the soul, a delicate, meditative look at a particular state of mind in a particular time and place. The latest from writer-director Sofia Coppola, it's a film in which doing less on screen is more and doing more is less, and if that sounds kind of Delphic, that suits the situation precisely.
Slight but often seductive and so deliberately not in a hurry it periodically threatens to dissolve right in front of our eyes, "Somewhere" is more successful in creating ambience and visual imagery than it is in telling its story of a movie star bonding with his 11-year-old daughter.
In fact Coppola credits a conversation she had with masterful cinematographer Harris Savides (best known for his dreamy work with Gus Van Sant) with inspiring the project. They talked about collaborating in telling a story with maximum simplicity - "I wanted the whole thing to be understated and subtle," the director says - and that's been accomplished here. Savides' striking visuals turn out to be the film's major strength. "Somewhere" was not only shot primarily in Los Angeles, it feels like the city the way few films do, not only because of familiar locations such as a Big 5 sporting goods store, Sunset Plaza and the 101 Freeway heading north, but because the place's air of impermanence and particular quality of light have made it onto the screen. Even the film's title has an L.A. connection: Coppola says it was inspired by the use of type in artist Ed Ruscha's paintings.
Like Coppola's previous "Lost in Translation," "Somewhere" deals with themes of adult dislocation and free-floating ennui, and like that film it is set largely in a hotel, this time Los Angeles' clubby Chateau Marmont, the Sunset Boulevard establishment that functions as a de facto home away from home for movie business types.
Before we meet the hotel, we meet the man who stays there, Johnny Marco, and before that we meet his car, a jet-black Ferrari that's shown for several minutes speeding around an empty track at an empty desert location. Clearly, this is not a life that is going anywhere special at the moment.
When Marco (played by Stephen Dorff) gets out of the car, what he's wearing - the standard L.A. hipster uniform of black T-shirt, jeans, hiking books and sunglasses - marks him as the person we gradually learn he is: a louche movie star, kind of a combination of Johnny Depp and Steve McQueen, who is essentially killing time between projects.
Staying at the Chateau, Johnny breaks his arm in a moment of celebrity inebriation, and that puts a further crimp in a life of privileged boredom. Johnny serves as a poster boy for the excesses of celebrity, from pills to parties to the pouty women who seek his amatory attention, but the reality is that nothing involves him, nothing makes him happy, nothing keeps him fully awake, even during sex. The truth that Johnny is not a particularly interesting person is a drawback that never goes away.
What "Somewhere" is especially good at is detailing the unreal minutiae of movie star lives, something Coppola certainly is familiar with. Johnny has to attend a media junket at the Four Seasons Hotel, where real journalists playing journalists ask him deeply inane questions. He experiences the ministrations of an unconventional masseur as well as pole-dancing identical twins Bambi and Cindy (played by Playboy models Kristina and Karissa Shannon). And, in the film's most surreal scene, Johnny goes to a special effects house where his entire head is slathered in a kind of white goo to create a rubber mask depicting him as an old man.
The conventional dramatic focus of "Somewhere" kicks in when Johnny returns to his room to find his daughter Cleo (Elle Fanning) waiting by the door. Johnny clearly is not a major presence in Cleo's life, but arbitrary complications mean that the two are going to spend more time with each other than they're used to.
Although the filmmaker, the daughter of director Francis Ford Coppola, has been firm in rejecting the notion that "Somewhere" is autobiographical, it is also clear, as she said in one interview, that this story is "informed by familiarity," and that knowledge helps give this particular situation added piquancy.
But for several reasons, not the least of which are obviousness and over-familiarity, this part of the film - the story of a celebrity living in a world short on meaningful connections who discovers that children are what matters in life - does not really have enough drama to sustain our interest.
This difficulty is heightened by the fact that, unexpectedly in a film that has been so beautifully reticent for so long, "Somewhere" ends with specific voicing of emotions in a way that feels forced and unconvincing. Better to have followed the example of "Lost in Translation," in which Bill Murray whispers something to Scarlett Johansson that only she can hear.
Still, though it loses its nerve in places, "Somewhere" has success with what it sets out to do. It's a quiet experiment, a minimalist tone poem that does more with less than we're used to seeing.
SOMEWHERE
MPAA rating: R for sexual content, nudity and language
Running time: 1 hour, 37 minutes

description.hltext_display: 「ごめんなさいと言いたい」東金女児殺害の被告
description.content:
千葉県東金市で5歳の女の子を殺害した罪などに問われている男の裁判で、被告の男は「ごめんなさいと言いたいです」と述べました。
勝木諒被告（23）は2008年9月、東金市の保育園児・成田幸満ちゃんを自宅の浴槽でおぼれさせて殺害した罪などに問われています。22日の裁判で、「何のための裁判なのか」という弁護側の質問に対し、勝木被告は「謝るためです。ただただ、ごめんなさいと言いたいです」と述べました。しかし、勝木被告は質問されると数分間黙り込む場面も多く見られました。また、「どういう罪で逮捕されたのですか」と聞かれ、「内容は分かりますが」と述べ、その後の言葉を詰まらせました。

description.hltext_display: Second person killed in house fire identified
description.content:
MINNEAPOLIS - The Hennepin County Medical Examiner's office has identified the second woman killed in a Minneapolis house fire.
Family members had already identified one of the victims in the Dec. 12 fire as 78-year-old Mary Frances. The medical examiner identified the other victim Tuesday as 45-year-old Shelley Bryant.
Fire officials say the first truck to respond to the fire got stuck in the snow. The cause of the fire is under investigation.

description.hltext_display: Assange se queja de filtración
description.content:
Julian Assange, el fundador de WikiLeaks, se quejó de que alguien filtró a la Prensa un informe de la Policía sueca sobre los delitos sexuales que se le imputan en ese país.
Assange lamentó la difusión del documento en el periódico The Guardian, en los cuales se plasma intimidades en torno a las acusaciones contra él. “La filtración del informe de la Policía a The Guardian evidentemente tuvo el propósito de socavar mi opción de salir bajo fianza”, manifestó Assange, quien impugnó en tribunales de Londres la solicitud de extradición que presentó el Gobierno sueco.

description.hltext_display: Maison de ferme en grande tenue
description.content:
Entre les mains de ses propriétaires actuels, la belle d'autrefois s'est transformée peu à peu en refuge accueillant en toute saison.
POUR EN SAVOIR PLUS
Il aura d'abord fallu l'amour inconditionnel d'un antiquaire pour redonner vie à cette vieille maison des Cantons-de-l'Est. Entre les mains de ses propriétaires actuels, la belle d'autrefois s'est transformée peu à peu en refuge accueillant en toute saison.
Chaque pièce sert de galerie à de beaux objets issus du passé d'ici et d'ailleurs... comme des liens ténus entre les vieux pays et le Nouveau Monde.
S'ils ont le flair pour dégoter des pièces uniques, les proprios savent également les mettre en scène. Après tout, il faut bien le dire, monsieur Lawrence est aussi décorateur.
Pour voir les photos, cliquez ici.
La maison de ferme aux 165 ans bien sonnés coule des jours heureux dans un écrin de nature foisonnante. Une fois l'an, elle revêt sa tenue d'apparat pour raconter Noël, le Noël de monsieur Lawrence l'antiquaire.
À l'approche des Fêtes, la maison aux murs lambrissés s'ouvre avec l'élégance d'une vieille dame raffinée qui mise sur le chic sans prétention. Les propriétaires ont créé un décor festif et empreint de finesse, à des années-lumière du clinquant et du bling bling.
Noël se décline ici par petites touches. Il suffit d'ouvrir l'oeil pour découvrir ces éclats de gaieté.
Tous droits réservés : © Médias Transcontinental S.E.N.C.

description.hltext_display: 日本振興銀行の初公判 前社長は検査妨害を認める
description.content:
経営破たんした日本振興銀行が金融庁の立ち入り検査を妨害したとされる事件で初公判が開かれ、前社長らは「間違いございません」と起訴内容を認めました。
日本振興銀行の前社長・西野達也被告（55）らは、去年6月の立ち入り検査の際、銀行のサーバーから電子メール723通を削除するなどして検査を妨害した銀行法違反の罪に問われています。同じ事件で起訴された前会長・木村剛被告（48）の裁判は別に開かれます。初公判で、西野被告らは「間違いございません」と起訴内容を認めました。検察側は、冒頭陳述で「木村被告が検査の直前に『やばいメールは消しておけよ』と指示した」などと指摘しました。

description.hltext_display: Alasan SBY Tunjuk Ical Jadi Mediator
description.author: Muhammad Saifullah
description.content: JAKARTA - Usulan agar Presiden Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono menunjuk mediator untuk menjembatani komunikasi dengan Sri Sultan HB X sejak lama telah mengemuka. Bahkan nama seperti Taufik Kiemas sudah diusulkan sebagai mediator.Namun belakangan Presiden lebih memilih Aburizal Bakrie alias Ical untuk melakukan tugas tersebut. Lantas kira-kira apa alasan SBY lebih memilih Ical ketimbang orang lain?Pengamat politik dari Universitas Paramadina M Ikhsan Tualeka mengungkapkan bisa jadi SBY sengaja memilik Ical karena posisinya sebagai Ketua Umum Partai Golkar. Secara struktural partai dia adalah atasan Sri Sultan HB X.Ical juga selama ini dipercaya memimpin Setgab karena kemampuannya memecahkan persoalan secara informal, ujarnya kepada okezone di Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010).Pilihan Presiden rupanya tak salah, Ical tak pulang dengan tangan hampa dari Yogyakarta. Dia berhasil menyakinkan Sultan agar bersedia berbicara empat mata dengan SBY.Kemarin pertemuan di antara kedua tokoh politik nasional itu terjadi di Komplek Istana. Meski belum diketahui secara jelas apakah ada deal-deal politik di antara keduanya, diharapkan pertemuan tersebut berkontribusi positif terhadap rampungnya polemik RUU Keistimewaan Yogyakarta.(ful)

description.hltext_display: Amazon Seen Selling 8 Million Kindles This Year
description.content:
Get the Flash Player to see this rotator.
Amazon's sales of the Kindle Ereader are expected to reach 8 million in 2010, Bloomberg News reported Tuesday.
Citing "two people who are aware of the company's sales projections," Bloomberg put the figures at 60 percent higher than analysts predicted prior to the year.
Amazon has never revealed exact sales figures for the Kindle, except for occasionally calling it the company's top-selling product and reporting that it had broken Kindle sales records in a particular month.
The Wi-Fi edition of the Kindle was reportedly sold out Tuesday, but more were available by that night.

description.hltext_display: ICW Desak KPK Segera Tahan Bupati Siak, Riau
description.author: Susi Fatimah
description.content: JAKARTA - Indonesian Corruption Watch (ICW) mendesak Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) segera menangkap Bupati Siak, Provinsi Riau, Arwin AS, dalam kasus dugaan korupsi pemanfaatan hutan di Riau.Menurut peneliti ICW Tama S Langkun Arwin AS belum juga ditahan, meski sejak satu tahun lalu ditetapkan sebagai tersangka. "Biasanya tidak lebih dari tiga sampai enam bulan. Kami minta KPK segera bergegas," desak Tama kepada wartawan di Gedung KPK, Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010).Tama menegaskan, tidak ada lagi alasan bagi KPK untuk tidak memproses kasus yang telah merugikan negara sebesar Rp2,8 Triliun itu. Terlebih pimpinan KPK sudah terpilih dan sudah dilantik Presiden Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, Senin lalu.Aktivis ICW yang sempat menjadi korban penganiayaan oleh orang tidak dikenal ini berharap, KPK tidak seperti kejaksaan yang selalu berlama-lama dalam memproses seseorang yang sudah ditetapkan menjadi tersangka.Diketahui, Arwin AS ditetapkan sebagai tersangka pada September 2009 dalam kasus dugaan korupsi pemanfaatan hutan di Kabupaten Siak, namun hingga kini masih bebas. KPK belum juga melakukan penahanan terhadap yang bersangkutan.Arwin diduga telah menerbitkan Surat Izin Usaha Pemaanfaatan Hasil Hutan Kayu Hutan Tanaman kepada sejumlah pengusaha pada 2001-2003. Arwin dijerat pasal 2 ayat (1), pasal 3, dan atau pasal 5 Undang-Undang Pemberantasan Korupsi.(ded)

description.hltext_display: 乳児放置で栄養失調…重体、母に猶予判決 「育児で立ち直りを期待」
22/12/10 – Biggest back to work programme in decades will be built on payment by results
description.content:
– Biggest back to work programme in decades will be built on payment by results
The Work Programme, Britain's biggest employment programme for decades, will also be the first major move into a system of payment by results for the public sector, announced Employment Minister Chris Grayling today.
It will provide tailored support for hundreds of thousands of long term benefit claimants, built around their needs, forming the key part in the Government's drive to tackle long term unemployment and benefit dependency.
Today private and voluntary sector organisations are being invited to tender for contracts to deliver the Work Programme. They will be given the freedom to be innovative and provide the right help for each individual, rather than having to follow a top down approach dictated by Government.
In return for this freedom they will be paid by results - to help people find jobs and then to keep them – and they’ll only be paid the bulk of their money when they succeed in doing so.
For the first time there will also be much higher payments to help those groups who are furthest from work. The fees for the hardest to help groups – including people who have spent long periods of time on sickness benefits - will be a maximum of £14,000, making it much more likely than ever before that they will get the help they need to get a job. Much of the cost of the programme will be met from the benefit savings generated by getting the long term unemployed into work.
Chris Grayling said:
"When it starts next year, the Work Programme will transform the welfare landscape in Britain. We will provide much better back to work support for hundreds of thousands of people and their families. But in return we will expect them to use that support – and if they refuse they will lose their benefits.
"We have around five million people on out of work benefits in this country – and many of them could and should be working. And yet every time employment levels rise, those people seem to stay stranded on benefits. The Work Programme will change all of that."
Crucial to the success of the Work Programme will be the work done by smaller local, voluntary and community sector organisations which specialise in working with the hardest to help groups. Major organisations wanting to bid for Work Programme contracts have been told that they will only succeed if they put together groups of specialists who can deliver the right mix of expertise for the hardest to help.
It’s also an essential part of the Government’s plan to move 1.6 million people off incapacity benefit by 2014. The Work Programme will provide back to work support for those who are found fit to work by the Work Capability Assessment.
The Minister for Welfare Reform Lord Freud said:
"We are making great progress with our plans for a new Work Programme, which means that from the first half of next year jobseekers will receive the right level of support at the right time, giving them the skills and experience they need to get into work.
"Most importantly our new Work Programme will help people who are most in need of our support, such as those who have been out of work for a long time and young people who are struggling to make the transition between education and work - ensuring the best outcomes for customers, and the best value for money for the taxpayer."
The Work Programme will be backed up by new benefit conditionality, which will be part of the forthcoming Welfare Reform Bill, which will mean people refusing to take up jobs could face losing their benefits for up to three years.
Media Enquiries: 0203 267 5108
Out of hours: 07659 108 883

event_or_fact.property: 22/12/10 ? Biggest back to work programme in decades will be built on payment by results ? Biggest back to work programme in decades will be built on payment by results The Work Programme, Britain's biggest employment programme for decades, will also be t
When it starts next year, the Work Programme will transform the welfare landscape in Britain.

description.hltext_display: אחרי ההפגנה, המסתננים חוששים: 'מסוכן בת"א'
description.content: "פעם ראשונה שאני רואה מצבים כאלה", סיפר אוסקר, שהגיע לארץ מקונגו לפני 16 שנה, בעקבות ההפגנה שבה קראו מאות בני אדם לסילוק המסתננים. סיגי מאריתריאה דווקא אופטימית: "הם לא הפגינו נגדנו, אולי עכשיו הממשלה תעשה דברים בשבילנו". בעוד יומיים תתקיים הפגנה נוספת בת"א - הפעם למענם

description.hltext_display: Penindakan Atas Kekerasan Agama Lemah
description.author: Bagus Santosa
description.content: JAKARTA - Ketua Setara Institute Hendardi mengatakan, polisi sebagai garda terdepan dalam penegakkan hukum harus bertindak tegas dalam masalah kekerasan. "Kekerasan mesti ditindak oleh polisi sebagai garda depan dalam penegakkan hukum," ujarnya usai di Hotel Century Atlet, Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010)Menurut Hendardi, kekerasan atas nama agama yang ditindak selama ini hanya baru dua kasus. "Kasus Monas dan Ciketing. Sebelumnya, itu hampir tidak ada, padahal masih ada ratusan lagi," ungkapnya.Hendardi menyebutkan banyak faktor untuk melakukan tindakan pada kasus seperti ini. "Banyak faktor, tidak hanya skil aparat penegak hukum. Kalau skil, masalah ini kan berulang-ulang dan polanya hampir sama. Jadi saya kira ini adalah kemauan politik," tegasnya.Dia menambahkan untuk kasus di daerah dikarenakan ketidakmauan dari aparat hukum setempat atau pemda dalam menuntaskan kasus kekerasan atas nama agama. "Mereka berkepentingan dalam dukungannya. Banyak kepentingan-kepentingannyalah," jelasnya.Selanjutnya, sambung dia, aparat penegak hukum jangan bergantung pada pengaruh politik. Namun harus bekerja sesuai dengan tindakan hukum.Sebab itu, untuk saat ini Kapolri belum bisa dinilai kinerjanya. "Masalah kekerasan ini mempertegas keraguan bahwa Kapolri baru waktu diangkat saja ada keraguan kepada dia. Keraguan terhadap prestasinya. Sekarang sekian bulan, saya belum dengar prestasi apapun, tidak hanya kekerasan dalam bidang agama, tapi apapun belum ada," ucapnya.Kapolri, sambungnya, memiliki andil dalam penyelesaian masalah kekerasan ini. "Bukan masalah Presiden. Presiden kan perintah politiknya, praktis di lapangan kan urusan Kapolri," tutupnya.(ram)

description.hltext_display: 【低碳生活 环保达人】家中最脏的四个地方
description.content:
第一脏：浴室密封胶每周最少消毒1次。70%家庭的浴室密封胶在重度污染，56%家庭的浴室密封胶看上去白白一条线，清洗中容易漏掉，再加上浴室中空气不流通，其表面往往覆盖着大量细菌。
解决方法：清洁浴室要注意细节，使用消毒产品擦试洗手盆时也要将密封胶一起清洁。
第二脏：冰箱
适当包装冰箱内的食物。有46%家庭的冰箱没能通过细菌检测，44%家庭的冰箱已有霉菌繁殖扩增的迹象。原因是有的家庭把食物直接放入冰箱，没有清洗或用保鲜膜包装，冰箱内部温度过高以及很少清洁冰箱。
解决方法：冰箱中生熟食物别混放，蔬菜应先清洁后用保鲜膜包好存放。定期清洁冰箱内部。
第三脏：厨房抹布
经常更换或定期消毒抹布。每次使用厨房抹布时有可能将细菌传播到自己的手或餐具上，但只有42%的人每天对厨房抹布进行清洁或消毒。
解决方法：抹布储了勤更换，还建议每隔1周浸泡在经过稀释的消毒液中，半小时之后再使用。
第四脏：水壶柄
抓壶柄前腰洗手。烧水的水壶柄奥比电脑键盘更脏，水壶的污染可能来源于食物准备阶段，比如接粗肉类或是没有清洗的蔬菜后，没有洗手而直接抓水壶柄。
解决方法：手上有污垢或是油腻时，应先洗净双手再抓水壶柄等，以防细菌交叉感染。

description.hltext_display: מלחמה בת"א: אורטל נגד חוסמי החניה מהעירייה
Al menos 14 heridos en motín
description.content:
Al menos 14 internos resultaron heridos ayer en un intento de motín con amagos de incendio en la cárcel de Antofagasta, en el norte del Chile, el cual al final se logró controlar, confirmó la Guardia de Prisiones.
Anterior Siguiente
El propósito de estas acciones fue protestar por el incendio que el 8 de noviembre recién pasado causó la muerte de 81 reclusos en la cárcel de San Miguel, en la capital chilena, donde unos 800 internos están en huelga de hambre desde hace una semana, también en señal de protesta.

description.hltext_display: Acer 4736G Laptop Cannot Detect DVD ROM
Greek bond downgrade warning adds pressure on government as it votes on budget
Dayton taps former lawmaker for top state farm post
description.content:
ST. PAUL - For the first time in 15 years, Minnesota farmers will see a new face at the helm of the state Department of Agriculture.
Gov.-elect Mark Dayton on Tuesday named former state Sen. David Frederickson as his commissioner of agriculture. He'll take over in January for Gene Hugoson, who has served in the role under three governors since 1995.
Frederickson has previously led the National Farmers Union and has worked on agriculture issues for U.S. Sen. Amy Klobuchar. The fourth-generation farmer is returning to a state government he was part of as a state senator from 1987-1993. He is 66.
He becomes the second member of Dayton's cabinet. The Democratic governor-elect previously said he would retain current transportation commissioner Tom Sorel.

description.hltext_display: 琵琶精之6
UConn Women Break UCLA's Win Record
description.content:
Huskies Defeat Florida State For 89th Win In A Row
Alexandra Sifferlin, ThreeSixty Journalism Writer
UPDATED: 1:31 am CST December 22, 2010
NEW YORK -- Men's teams. Women's teams. No. 89 belongs to UConn. It beats them all.
The No. 1-ranked Huskies women's basketball team topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62 on Tuesday night. Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark - and would have made Wooden proud - Connecticut blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2½ years.
"I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone," UConn coach Geno Auriemma said afterward. "I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut and that's good enough."
Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn - Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up "89" signs and "89" balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs" - a play on Wooden's nickname, "The Wizard of Westwood."
After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. As fans roared, the players bounced around the court before posing for photos.
It's one more chapter of history for UConn, and perhaps the grandest.
"It's pretty amazing. It really is," said Auriemma, at a rare loss for words.
Asked what he would recall from the incredible run, he mentioned a pair of experienced stars on this team: "I'll probably remember Maya Moore and Tiffany Hayes. And how incredibly difficult it is to play that many games in a row and win 'em all."
Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women's game, the benchmark by which all others are measured. The Huskies already own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
The streak, though, takes it to another level, certainly raising the profile of women's basketball and maybe all of women's athletics.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game.
"My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level - and it wasn't by the men."
John Wooden was 99 when he died last June 4.
There was a festive atmosphere throughout the city, where building lights gleamed blue and white, and it was as electric as any Final Four inside the arena. Charles and UConn men's star Kemba Walker sat behind the Huskies' bench, and football coach Randy Edsall was there, too. Former NFL star Warrick Dunn, meanwhile, was cheering for his alma mater, Florida State.
With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-American had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore's fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.
UConn ripped off the next 16 points, capped by consecutive 3-pointers from Hartley and a pull-up by Moore. Auriemma gave Hartley a kiss at the next timeout, and the tough-to-please coach was still grinning at halftime.
"She doesn't feel any of this," Auriemma said as he left the court. "She's kind of immune to all of this as a freshman. I love kids like that."
With a minute left to play and victory assured, Moore stood up and whirled a towel around her head. The All-American tossed it in the air briefly before sitting down for the final seconds, beaming as she and her teammates on the bench yelled encouragement at the players on the floor.
"All you guys from Florida State, it wasn't easy to be part of all of this," Auriemma said. "I hope you don't feel disrespected by all this. You played a heck of a game."
UConn's rise to prominence began in 1995, when Lobo led the Huskies to their first national championship and unbeaten season. Since then, the best players in the country have made their way to the rural campus in Storrs, 30 miles outside of Hartford.
The excellence and confidence that defines great teams defines this one because Auriemma won't have it any other way. Perfection is expected, not simply a goal, and Auriemma goes to extraordinary lengths to get it.
He goads his players with criticisms of their games - sarcastic remarks that may strike outsiders as harsh but somehow trigger just the right response with gusto. He makes them play games of seven-on-five in practice. He rounds up bigger, stronger male students around campus to serve as practice players. He runs endless drills to hone skills the players thought they had mastered in junior high.
It hardly seems to matter who is on the floor because UConn players don't wear names on the back of their uniforms. The only one that counts is the one on the front.
When UConn - led by Taurasi - won 70 straight games from 2001-03, a record in the women's game, it seemed unfathomable that it would be toppled, like UCLA's 88. But what fans have learned over the years is that nothing this team does should be surprising. The Huskies have beaten 16 top-10 teams during the latest streak - four more than UCLA did during its run - and five of those wins came against the No. 2 team. It's been more than 17 years since UConn lost consecutive games.
"We never talked about the streak," said Charles, last season's national player of the year. "We were playing for each other, what we did at practice, all the hard work we did, and just trying to do it on the court. There wasn't anything about the streak."
The Huskies have won by any average of more than 33 points during the streak and rarely found themselves in trouble. They have trailed for 134 minutes, including only 13 in the second half. They've won back-to-back national championships, and are now one short of Tennessee's record for overall titles by a women's team.
Even before UConn tied UCLA's record, the two programs were linked.
Auriemma acknowledges that his team runs the same offense that Wooden perfected 37 years earlier. But it's not just the Xs and Os. The top block of Wooden's pyramid of success reads: "Competitive Greatness: Perform at your best when your best is required. Your best is required every day."
That's been Auriemma's mantra.
Greg Wooden, who lives in California, said he came East because, "I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support."
He also was aware that "certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak."
But he came knowing "my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this."
The day Notre Dame broke UCLA's streak, John Wooden was asked how long it would be before somebody surpassed it.
"I have no idea how long it will be before somebody else wins that many. I know it takes at least three years," he replied.
Try 36 years, 11 months, and 2 days.

description.hltext_display: Biogen Idec, Elan Submit Applications To Update TYSABRI Labeling - Quick Facts
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Biotechnology company Biogen Idec Inc. (BIIB) said Wednesday that the company along with Elan Corp., plc (ELN) have submitted a supplemental Biologics License Application to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and a Type II Variation to the an Medicines Agency to request review and approval to update the respective TYSABRI Prescribing Information and Summary of Product Characteristics.
The companies are proposing updated product labeling to include anti-JC Virus antibody status as one potential factor to help stratify the risk of progressive multifocal leoencephalopathy, a rare but serious brain infection, in the TYSABRI-treated population.
TYSABRI has been proven to reduce flare-ups and slow physical disability progression. Data from the Phase III AFFIRM trial showed that after two years, TYSABRI treatment led to a 68% relative reduction in the annualized relapse rate when compared with placebo and reduced the relative risk of disability progression by 42-54%.disability progression.

description.hltext_display: 연평도 옛모습 차츰 회복… 주민 “분위기 달라져”
description.content: 북한의 포격 후 1개월이 돼가는 22일 연평도에서는 흐트러졌던 퍼즐들이 하나씩 제자리에 끼워지듯 포격 전 평온했던 모습들이 하나 둘 눈에 띄고 있다.11월23일 이전으로 돌아가기엔 아직 갈 길이 멀지만 일단 주민들은 사격 훈련 후 달라진 마을 분위기를 몸으로 직접 느끼고 있다. 이날 오전 썰물 때를 맞춰 나간 '갯바탕'(굴 어장)에서는 주민 4∼5명이 흩어져 호미를 들고 굴봉을 따고 있었다. 근 1개월 만에 바다에 나간 주민들 얼굴엔 오랜만에 맛보는 일상의 즐거움이 묻어났다.아침 8시께 바다에 나왔다는 김부전(75.여) 할머니는 "어제 들어와서 집 청소하고 오늘은 날이 너무 따뜻해서 밖에 나왔다. 이렇게 하니까 다시 예전으로 돌아온 것 같다"라며 좋아했다.김 할머니는 "사람들이 많이 들어간다고 해서 들어왔는데 역시 여기(연평도)가 제일 좋긴 좋다"며 "앞으로 다시는 안 나갔으면 하는데 북한이 또 포를 쏠까 봐 불안하긴 하다"라고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: Police focus on rider in fatal crash
description.content:
Chief says passenger's blood-alcohol level could be used in criminal case
Geoff Grammer | The New Mexican
Comments
Print | Font Size:
advertisement
A search warrant obtained Tuesday illustrates that Santa Fe police were initially confused about who was driving the wrong-way vehicle in a Dec. 14 crash on Interstate 25 that left one woman dead and two hospitalized.
Blood was drawn from the woman later determined to be the surviving passenger in a 2007 Nissan Altima that was traveling more than 100 mph the wrong way on I-25, causing the crash. But Santa Fe police think the results could still be used in a criminal case.
"She may not have been the driver, but it's apparent both made the conscious decision together to get in a car and drive after they were drinking," Santa Fe Police Chief Aric Wheeler said. "We talk about how drunk-driving fatality statistics are improving around the state because of different measures we're now taking — well, maybe this is next. Maybe it's time we start focusing on passengers in the car, too, and holding them accountable for being part of the crime."
Police have not released the blood-alcohol content of the passenger, 38-year-old Jennifer Michelle Belvin of Oceanside, Calif., who remains hospitalized at Christus St. Vincent Regional Medical Center. Toxicology and autopsy reports are also not yet available for the driver of the car, who died at the scene, 26-year-old Kylene Holmes of El Paso.
The 19-year-old driver of the ambulance hit by the Nissan that Holmes was driving, certified emergency medical technician Vanessa Carrillo, meanwhile, remains hospitalized with severe leg, arm and facial injuries at University Hospital in Albuquerque.
"She's still in a lot of pain," Desiree Carrillo, Vanessa's 21-year-old sister, said Tuesday.
She added that Vanessa Carrillo, who doctors hope can still return to her La Cienega home by Christmas, has had constant visits since the crash from family members and the emergency medical services community around central and Northern New Mexico.
A fund to help the family with expenses remains open at First Community Bank in Santa Fe.
The search warrant for Belvin's blood sample, which was drafted by Officer Daniel Parsons on Dec. 14, the day of the accident, reaffirms previous reports that police first received a call at 1:35 a.m. about two drunken women driving a car that was similar to the one in the accident.
That call, according to the police report, was made by a man named Shanti, whom The New Mexican has confirmed is Shanti Ananda, a doorman at Cowgirl BBQ, where one of the women reportedly signed a credit- or debit-card receipt for two drinks — one for each woman — earlier in the evening.
In the doorman's call to police, Parsons wrote, Ananda "described a silver Nissan car with a license plate of UKL558 leaving the area of Aztec and Sandoval."
The car Holmes was driving had a Texas license plate of BK5L558.
When Parsons arrived on scene, the court document states, "one occupant of the Nissan was dead on arrival. The other occupant was immediately transported to the hospital. Both occupants were female, which also matched the description given by Shanti."
He also wrote that the blood draw from Belvin was necessary because "at this time, it is unknown if Ms. Belvin was driving the Nissan or if she was the passenger."
While Wheeler has left speed estimates of Holmes' Altima to a general "in excess of 100 miles per hour," Parson's search-warrant affidavit states the vehicle was "being operated at approximately 120 mph in a 75 mph speed zone."
Parsons' report also reiterates previous reports of multiple calls coming from I-25 northbound drivers of a wrong-way driver heading south on the interstate before to the crash, which a sheriff's deputy called in at 2:24 a.m.
Police are still trying to determine why Holmes was traveling the wrong way on the interstate, but have said they believe she was heading toward Albuquerque to see family. The suspicion is she and Belvin went the wrong way as far along northbound I-25 as the Pecos/Glorieta exit, which is about 20 miles form the crash scene and the location where motorists first reported seeing a wrong-way driver. Police say she might have realized she was going the wrong way and made a U-turn.
Charges have not been filed against Belvin, and Wheeler said Tuesday night that he does not believe she has given a formal statement to investigators.
Contact Geoff Grammer at 986-3076 or ggrammer@sfnewmexican.com. Read his blog at SantaFeCrime.com.

description.hltext_display: Admite culpa por atentados

description.hltext_display: Two die of asphyxiation in Reddy Labs
description.content:
Two employees of Reddy Labs died after they apparently inhaled toxic gases in the drug manufacturing unit in Bollaram of Medak district, about 60 km from here on Wednesday morning, police said.
Sridhar Reddy (30), a product chemist and his helper Deepak (30) were checking supply of nitrogen into a reactor where a drug Omniprozale was being processed. ?Apparently, Nitrogen got leaked and they fell unconscious after inhaling it? the DSP of Ramachandrapuram, A. Sivaramakrishna said.
Fellow workers who noticed the duo missing at tea time around 2.30 a.m, searched for them.
They were found unconscious and immediately rushed to a private hospital in the nearby Kukatpally locality.
Both of them were declared dead.

description.hltext_display: Tax cuts for rich not fiscally responsible
description.content:
The gap between rich and poor keeps growing.
The demand of the Republicans that the tax cuts for the rich introduced by George Bush be extended unpretentiously demonstrates the partisan and plutocratic nature of our society.
It is the height of delusion and hypocrisy to claim that we are a democracy.
According to the well-known economist Paul Krugman in his article in The New York Times on Dec. 3, “the cost of making the tax cuts permanent would be roughly equal to the expected financial shortfall of Social Security over the next 75 years.” Fiscal responsibility and tax cuts for the rich don’t go together.
Howard N. Stewart
Manchester
Were you interviewed for this story? If so, please fill out our accuracy form

description.hltext_display: •新疆霍城縣︰面包車失控撞樹 � 成三死四傷
description.content:
爭分奪秒緊急救援
天山網訊（記者周曼 通訊員李忠祥 陶希望攝影報道）2010年12月20日17時45分許，位于霍城縣六十三團3連路段S213省道61公里+600m處發生一起嚴重交通事故，當場造成三死四傷。霍城縣消防中隊接警後克服雨雪天氣帶來的不利影響，迅速趕赴事故現場，成功救出被困傷員。
接到報警後，中隊根據現場情況迅速出動1輛搶險救援車、1輛水罐消防車，7名指戰員趕赴事故現場。現場一片狼藉，慘不忍睹，一輛車牌號為新FA8809面包車已面目全非，車體滿是鮮血。經救援官兵現場勘察和詢問圍觀人員了解到，這輛面包車是在轉彎過程中撞入右側林帶，車體嚴重變形凹陷，幾棵碗口粗細小樹被撞斷後正砸在車上，後排座位上的3名乘客當場死亡，司機及副駕駛上的4人被卡在變形的車廂內，如不及時救出被困人員後果將不堪設想。
掌握情況後，現場指揮員果斷下達命令，一方面組織人員對車內被困人員進行心理安撫，通過對話，隨時掌握被困者的情況，以便及時應對；另一方面，破拆救援小組立即利用破拆器材，對嚴重變形的車體進行破拆，盡快就出被困人員。
救援人員首先利用液壓擴張器將凹凸部分撐開，隨後利用金屬切割鋸對車體進行破拆。經過消防官兵的努力，駕駛室被困的4名傷者被成功救出，並及時被120急救車送往醫院進行搶救。
霍城縣位于新疆維吾爾自治區西北部，天山西段，伊犁河谷西北部。南與察布查爾錫伯自治縣相接，西鄰哈薩克斯坦，東與伊寧市、伊寧縣相鄰，北與博樂市、溫泉縣相連。

description.hltext_display: Europe: Fresh snowfall disrupts rail, air traffic
description.content:
Thousands of air travellers remained stranded and train services were severely disrupted as fresh snowfall and sub-zero temperatures worsened Europe's Christmas travel chaos.
For the fifth consecutive night, several hundred stranded passengers slept on camping beds at Germany's [ Images ] largest airport in Frankfurt as the authorities struggled to cope with the tension building up among those still unable to catch a flight.
The airport operator Fraport has been trying to improve the services for stranded passengers and offered them free drinks and snacks after a brawl at Lufthansa's check-in counter last Saturday.
About 570 flights out of 1,300 flights were cancelled on Tuesday and the airport was shut down for more than three hours after unexpectedly heavy snowfall blocked the runways and frustrated efforts to keep aircraft free of ice.
Even after the airport resumed its operations, some of the flights were delayed by more than six hours, airport officials said.
The officials expressed fears that the time is running out for stranded passengers to reach their home or holiday destinations before Christmas.
Even if the airport resumes normal operations on Wednesday, it will take several days to clear the backlog built up during over the past few days and some of the stranded passengers may be still in Frankfurt during Christmas, they said.
About 30 incoming long-distance flights could not land in Frankfurt because of the temporary closure and they were diverted to the country's second largest airport in Munich.
Over 10,000 air travellers were affected by the diversion of flights, according to Munich airport officials.
Snow chaos and flight disruption in Frankfurt also hit a number of domestic flights from Berlin, Hamburg and Munich.
The European air traffic control authority Eurocontrol estimated snow and freezing conditions on Tuesday forced the cancellation of over 1,000 flights across Europe.
Besides the Frankfurt airport, the worst affected by the snow chaos was London's [ Images ] Heathrow airport, where more than half the flights were cancelled until Wednesday.
However, Europe's largest airport reportedly plans to operate two-third of its scheduled flights today after reopening one of its two main runways.
Some flights were cancelled on Tuesday at the airport in Paris, which also was hit hard by the snow chaos, but the overall situation there has improved.
Heavy snow again disrupted the train services of the German railways, which reported several cancellations and long delays.
Railway passengers in Germany are also facing the additional problem of overcrowded trains, as an increasing number of air travellers, who could not get a flight, are resorting to trains.
The German railways announced that it will deploy ten additional long-distance express trains on major north-south and east-west routes from Wednesday to cope with a surge in Christmas holiday travel expected in the coming days.
Hundreds of stranded air travellers in Britain have been trying to get out of the country by means of the ferry services across the English Channel or by taking the Eurostar train linking London with Paris and Brussels.
But many passengers had to wait for several hours to catch the train because the Eurostar is operating only a 'limited service' after it was ordered to reduce its speed out of safety concern, a spokesman said.

event_or_fact.property: the airport was shut down for more than three hours

description.hltext_display: Obama Signing Don't Ask, Don't Tell Repeal
description.author: MARK S. SMITH
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- President Barack Obama is ready to sign a landmark law that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
Obama's signature will fulfill a campaign pledge, cheer his party's liberals and strike a blow for what he sees as basic human rights.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists are expected at Wednesday's signing ceremony that the White House booked an auditorium at the Interior Department.
Pentagon officials caution that activists' elation over the bill could be premature, since service chiefs have to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy. They also have to certify that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge, and draft guidelines to cover a host of practical questions, like how to handle sexual orientation in making barracks assignments.

event_or_fact.property: to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time

description.hltext_display: 教孩子有教养，有气质，有风度
description.content:
从孩子的表现中看自己的教育方式
2、如果您的孩子凡事喜欢抱怨，是因为您总是挑剔他。
3、如果您的孩子喜欢对抗，是因为您对他有敌意和强制。
4、如果您的孩子不够善良，是因为您是一个缺少同情心的人。
5、如果您的孩子胆小、羞怯，是因为他经常被嘲弄、辱骂。
6、如果您的孩子不跟您说心里话，是因为您捉孩子的话儿把，翻老账。
7、如果您的孩子不辨是非，是因为您专制，没有给孩子自主和思考的机会。
8、如果您的孩子很自卑，是因为您对孩子总是失望，不能耐心鼓励。
9、如果您的孩子嫉妒、敏感、怕受伤，是因为他的家庭没有宽容和温暖。
10、如果您的孩子不喜欢自己，是因为您对他缺少接纳、认可和尊重。
11、如果您的孩子不上进，不努力，是因为您对他要求过高他做不到。
12、如果您的孩子很自私，是因为您对他太溺爱，要什么给什么。
13、如果您的孩子不懂父母的苦心，是因为您没有教会他理解别人。
14、如果您的孩子退缩、逃避，是因为遭到了您的轻视和打击。
15、如果你的孩子懒惰和依赖，是因为您替孩子做的事和决定太多了。
16、如果您被孩子控制了，是因为您不敢严厉管教，总是哀求孩子。
17、如果您的孩子撒谎、骗人，是因为您不够宽容，喜欢惩罚孩子。
18、如果您的孩子冷漠，攻击他人，是因为您对他的讽刺和冷眼太多。
19、如果您的孩子有暴力行为，是因为您常用暴力来处理孩子的问题。
20、如果您的孩子意志不坚强，惧怕困难，是因为您没有给他锻炼的机会。
有以上三种状况就说明您的家庭教育处于“亚健康”状态了；
有以上四种状况就要随时注意您的教育方法了；
有以上五种状况就说明您的家庭教育出现严重问题，必须请专家指导了！
教给孩子的作法
1, 别人给倒水时,不要干看着,要用手扶扶,以示礼貌
2,别人对你说话,你起码要能接话,不能人家说了上句,你没了下句,或者一味的说着啊啊啊,是是是.
3,有人盯着你看的时候不要直视对方,假装没注意到.
4,心情不好,再好的护肤品和化妆品也补救不了皮肤.
5,睡眠不好,会使人说话语无伦次,反应迟钝,黑眼圈突出.
6,别人释放“有毒气体”的时候不能嫌恶地躲开或者拿手扇，装作若无其事.
7,被领导训斥的时候,不要低头,要直视领导,表示接受批评,领导的火就会慢慢消退,否则,领导会火上加油. （很多tx觉得这条不是很好。大家看看就好，具体情况还是要具体分析的撒～）
8. 女人一辈子不能手心朝上向男人要钱花.
9. 吃完饭退席时说：“我吃完了，你们慢用。”
10.给人递水递饭一定是双手。
11.坐椅子不要翘起来
12.吃饭要端碗，不要在盘子里挑拣 不要拿筷子敲碗
13. 最后一个进门要记得随手关门
14.送人走要说：“慢走。”
15.洗了手不要随意甩手，水会甩到人家身上很不礼貌
16.递刀具给别人要记得递刀柄那一端
17.不揭别人的短处
18.听别人说话的时候，眼神不要游移。这样显得很没礼貌。
19.帮别人倒茶倒水之后，壶嘴不要对着别人
20.站有站相，坐有坐相。
21.遇到那种往里往外都能开的门，拉而不是推。 (好几位同学都觉得这条比较苛刻....恩,请自动忽略吧...)
22.说道就一定要做到。做不到的就不要承诺。
23.不要贪小便宜不要贪财，钱再多也有花完的时候
24.屋里有人的时候，出门要轻手关门
25.这个世界不相信眼泪.
26.与其花空心思留住男人,不如让男人花空心思留住自己
27.人穷志不短
28.盛饭或端茶给别人时，如果中间隔了人，不要从别人面前经过递，而要从别人后面绕过递
29.自己有本事才是真的本事
30.学会温柔学会聆听
31.去别人家里，不要坐在人家的床上
32.在酒桌上与别人碰杯，自己的杯子一定要低于对方的，特别是对方是长辈或领导,敬酒的时候要站起来，以示恭谨
33.晴带雨伞，饱带干粮---未雨绸缪总是好的。
34. 如果问别人话，别人不回答你，不要死着脸皮不停的问。
35. 吃饭的时候尽量不要发出声音
36. 捡东西或者穿鞋时候要蹲下去，不要弯腰撅屁股---我们是女孩子
37. 别人批评你的时候，即使他是错的，也不要先辨驳，等大家都平静下来再解释
38.做事情要适可而止,无论是狂吃喜欢的食物还是闹脾气
39.到朋友家吃完饭,要主动帮忙洗碗清理桌子-----主人做饭已经很辛苦了,不能事后还让主人清理
40.生活中会遇见各式各样的人,你不可能与每个人都合拍,但是有一点是四海皆准的:你如何对待别人,别人也会如何对待你
41.待客不得不大，持家不得不小
42.把拳头收回来是为了更有力的还击
43.人活在这个世上，首先要学会一个“忍”字
44.任何时候对任何人不要轻易告诉对方你的秘密
45.钱不是靠攒的，会花才会赚
46.学无止境，不仅仅是学书本知识，更要学会怎么待人处事，社会远比你想象的要复杂
47.不要跟同事议论上司或其他同事的是非，你的无心之言很可能成为别人打击你的证据
48.做事情，做好了是你的本分，做的不好就是你失职
49.只有错买，没有错卖。不要只顾着贪小便宜。
50.有时候孤单是正常的，不要害怕，要自己调剂
51.有真正的朋友，但不知你有没有福气遇到。不管有没有遇到，都不要否认它。不要算计别人，尤其不要算计自己喜欢的人。对自己喜欢的人，不要使用手段去得到
52.最勇敢的事情是认清了生活的真相之后依旧热爱生活。不要害怕欺骗，但要知道世界上存在欺骗
53.借钱的时候，心里要有个底，就是要想着这个钱是回不来的。所以借出去的钱永远要在自己能承受的损失范围之内。可以承受的数字以内，即使回不来，也是心里早准备好的。自己不能承受损失的数目，就不能借
54.最好的朋友之间，除非他穷的吃不了饭了，否则最好不要有经济往来。许多可贵的友谊都败坏在钱上。
55.君子可寓意于物，但不可留意于物
56.出门在外能忍则忍，退一步海阔天空
57.擦桌子的时候要往自己的方向抹
58.打电话接电话第一句话一定要是喂，您好；挂电话的时候，对方如果是长辈，或者你的上司，那么就等对方先挂了你再挂。如果你自己就是长辈或上司，那就主动先挂电话，别让电话那边的人等
59.一次不忠 百次不容
60.不随地吐痰扔东西，如果没有垃圾箱，就拎回家扔垃圾筒里
61.多看书对心灵有益,你会看到一个更广阔的世界
62.是你去适应社会,不是社会来适应你
63.不要让别人知道自己的真实想法,要笑在人前笑,要哭一个人躲起来哭
64.走路手不要插在口袋里
65.简单的事情复杂做，复杂的事情简单做
66.机会只留给有准备的人，天上不会掉馅饼
67.不管什么条件下，仔细刷牙，特别是晚上
68.早上一定要吃早餐，没有早餐喝杯水也一定要
69.少说别人是非，把自己管牢
70.你是无价之宝
71.女生，和男孩子出去要自己买单
72.要对自己的行为负责，不要怨天由人，在做之前要想想应不应该，出了事要学会自己解决
73.要想人前显贵，必先人后受罪
74.如果是弹簧门,不管是拉还是推,请先出后进。如果身后有人应主动把门扶好,防止门弹回拍到别人。别人为自己开门一定要说谢谢。
75.有礼貌应该是对所有人,无论是上司,长辈，餐馆服务员或是路边捡垃圾的老者.
76.不要插队。你争取到的，只是等待的那几秒。可是你失去的，却是别人对你素质的肯定。（如果实在有急事，向排在你前面的人说明情况。这时候，大多数人会主动让你站到第一位。）
77.不要追求笑到最后，要看看谁最后笑。
78.倒酒倒满，斟茶斟半。在国内倒酒是要倒满的，以示尊敬，在国外，或者对外宾，尤其是倒红酒，不管给谁到，一定是少于酒杯的一半，三分之一左右
79.晚上从朋友家回来，到家后一定要告诉朋友，你到家了。不管人家关不关心这是礼貌. 如果有朋友晚上回家，发一个短信问有没有到家
80.从外面回来如果家里做好了热饭，不能马上就去吃，要把温度适应一下，最好喝口温水暖暖牙，听说这样可以防止你老年牙疼，掉牙早
81.饭局上，每上一道菜，让领导和长辈先动筷，或是主动将菜转动到他们面前
82.别人睡觉的时候，尽量放低走路、做事或说话的音量。
83.节约是好的，但不要小气
84.伸手不打笑面人
85.不重要的小事上不要斤斤计较，过去的就让它过去吧。
86.说话时请和他人保持距离，不要紧贴别人
87.说话还是多用“您”“请问”这样的敬词，多用“麻烦您”“打扰了”“实在很抱歉”之类表示歉意的词，多用“好吗”“行不行”“您觉得呢”等等探询语气的词。
88.别人讲话时不能打断，听完别人的意见，哪怕不同意也要温和的点头以示尊重
89.公共场合，手机铃声、信息提示音调的轻声一些，最好是震动。讲电话时不要兴致勃勃地提高音量、手舞足蹈，破坏了周围的宁静，让别人都不得不注意到你，那是很失礼的。
90.正在和众人谈论事情的时候，电话响了，要告诉同事：对不起，你们先谈，我接个电话
91.出门拜访别人。主人送你时，一定要说：请留步，不用送了。
92.第一个进电梯时，要摁住按纽，等后面的人都进来。出来时，如果你是下级、是晚辈，如果时间不太急，就等别人出去你再出。
93.别人把她很珍惜的或者很昂贵的东西送你时，最好不要接受。君子之交淡如水，有时，物质会破坏了珍贵的友情。
94.同学请吃饭，一定要再约时间回请。
95.当别人向你寻求帮助而你帮不上忙时表示歉意，再想补偿的办法。比如，“你上网查一下。那上面说不定有...”，永远不要生硬地用一个“不”来拒绝别人，那样会显得你特别冷漠、傲慢。
96.当学弟学妹向你打听你们的学校时，一个新员工向你询问你的单位或者部门时，即使你讨厌这个地方，最好也客观地评价它，不要带自己的主观偏见，把它描述地跟“地狱”一样可怕。实在不愿意，你也可以说：事实不是那样的，待一段时间你就明白了。在学校没什么，到了社会上各种关系非常微妙，你不经意的一句话，就会飘到领导耳朵里。
97.抽烟的朋友在递烟给别人的时候，要递两根，接别人烟时，要接远离自己的那根；
别人给点火时，要双手拢上去，点好后轻碰对方手表示已经点好；
打火机不要连续给三个人点火，必须点第三个人时，熄灭后在打着点
98.夹菜时,若别人先夹,且你所要夹的菜在别人的手的另一侧,就应该等别人先夹好,而不是从下方或上方穿过
99.男女一起走路时（靠右行），要让女生走在自己右边，因为右边比较安全。
100.男女上下楼梯时，男生都要走在下面。（也有tx说，男生应该走在上面）
101.吃饭就餐时，因让女生先就坐。
102.男女生乘电梯时，女生先进，男生要挡着门；出电梯时男生要先出，挡着门，或是先一步按住电梯开门键，让女士先行。
103.离开某个房间或会议室时，男生要先行，先开门。
104.打的时，若是自己拦的车，不能自己抢着坐后排。
105.男女一起时，若女生领着电脑或重物时，男生要主动示意帮忙拎

description.hltext_display: 軍 “연평도에 ‘스파이크’ 미사일 배치 예정”
description.content: 군 당국이 북한의 추가 도발에 대비해 연평도에 정밀타격 미사일인 '스파이크'를 배치하기로 했다.군 소식통은 22일 "정밀타격 능력을 보강하기 위해 연평도에 스파이크를 배치하기로 했다"며 "가능한 이른 시일 내에 전력보강이 이루어질 것"이라고 밝혔다.이스라엘제인 스파이크는 사거리 25km로 적외선 유도를 받아 은닉된 갱도 속 해안포를 정밀타격하는 성능을 갖춘 것으로 평가받고 있다.군은 지난달 23일 북한의 포격 도발 이후 연평도에 K-9 자주포를 추가 배치했고 227㎜ 다연장로켓포와 신형 대포병레이더인 '아서'도 신규 투입했다.(서울=연합뉴스)

description.hltext_display: •新疆2011年普通高� �美術類專業統考1月14日進行
description.content:
天山網訊（記者趙軍報道）2011年1月14日，新疆將對全區範圍內報考美術類專業（指繪畫、造型設計及對美術技能有專業考核要求的美術類專業）的考生組織統考。這是記者今天（12月21日）從自治區招生辦公室獲悉的。
所有報考普通高等學校（含區內和區外）美術類專業的考生憑所在中學的介紹信和二代身份證到當地招辦領取《自治區2011年普通高校藝術類（特長生）專業考試報考證》（以下簡稱《報考證》），持《報考證》和二代身份證才能參加統考。報名截止時間為2010年12月30日，逾期不予補報。
據悉，本次考試設置烏魯木齊、奎屯、喀什三個考點，其中烏魯木齊考點包含烏魯木齊、石河子、昌吉、哈密、吐魯番、巴州，奎屯考點包含伊犁、塔城、阿勒泰、克拉瑪依、奎屯、博州，喀什考點包含喀什、和田、克州、阿克蘇。2011年1月12日—13日，考生須持二代身份證原件和《報考證》原件到考點（現場確認地點）進行報名信息確認，領取《自治區2011年普通高校美術類專業統一考試準考證》。
參加自治區統考並獲得合格證書的考生方可參加美術類專業校考。凡自治區統考涉及到的美術類專業，民辦高校、獨立學院的美術類本科專業及所有高校的美術類高職（專科）專業招生均應直接使用自治區統考成績，學校不再組織校考；其它美術類本科專業可直接使用自治區統考成績，也可在自治區統考合格考生範圍內組織校考。自治區統考未涉及到的專業，由學校組織校考，校考應于2011年春節後舉行，3月底前完成。
美術類專業考生獲得《自治區統考本科專業合格證》的考生方可填報相關藝術院校（專業）美術類本科專業志願和高職（專科）專業志願，獲得《自治區統考高職（專科）專業合格證》的考生方可填報相關藝術院校（專業）美術類高職（專科）專業志願。未獲得《自治區統考本科專業合格證》、《自治區統考高職（專科）專業合格證》的考生不得填報以自治區統考成績作為錄取依據的美術類院校（專業）志願；若填報，該志願無效。
對在統考或校考中被認定為作弊、提供虛假身份證明材料取得資格的考生，取消其當年藝術類及高考報名和錄取資格，並將考生違規事實記入其高考誠信電子檔案；已被錄取進入高等學校學習的，由相關高等學校取消其學籍。
自治區招生辦公室提醒考生︰務必認真了解並嚴格按照學校公布的校考時間、地點和相關要求參加報名、考試，否則由此引起的後果考生自負。
新疆招生網將公示所有報考美術類專業考生的基本信息，考生可登陸新疆招生網（http://www.xjzs.edu.cn 或http:// 202.201.201.6）或撥打當地招生辦公室咨詢電話進行查詢。

description.hltext_display: 〔亚洲橡胶〕TOCOM期胶创纪录高位,但获利了结限制进一步上涨
description.content:
路透东京12月22日电---东京工业品交易所(TOCOM)期胶周三延续涨势,新指� �合约创纪录高点.不过交易商表示,许多投资者等待锁定获利,� 此进一步涨幅受限.2011年6月合约JRUc6盘中升至417日圆,结算价报每公斤413.5日圆.最活跃的5月合约--此前的指� �合约,结算价下跌0.3日圆或0.1%,报412.8日圆.
一交易员称,"市场早盘刚上冲,但对于价� �高企的谨慎情绪散播,导致许多投资者退出观望,并寻求锁定利润的机会."

description.hltext_display: Aprueba ley de neutralidad en Internet
description.content:
Washington.- La Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones (CFC) de EE. UU. aprobó ayer la llamada “ley de neutralidad”, que trata de proporcionar iguales derechos de acceso a Internet a proveedores y consumidores.
La propuesta salió adelante, luego de un año de negociaciones, con los votos del presidente de la CFC, Julius Genachowski, y de los comisarios demócratas Michael J. Copps y Mignon Clyburn.
La ley de “la neutralidad en Internet” busca impedir que los proveedores de servicios se conviertan en guardianes del tráfico de Internet, ralentizando o favoreciendo el acceso a determinadas páginas web en función de si estas pertenecen o no a empresas competidoras.
El presidente de EE. UU., Barack Obama, celebró la nueva norma al señalar que “ayudará a preservar la naturaleza libre y abierta de Internet, a la vez que estimula la innovación, protege las decisiones del consumidor y defiende la libertad de prensa”.
Genachowski expresó que “estas normas aumentarán la confianza en el mercado y estimularán la inversión en todos los extremos de nuestras redes de banda ancha”.
Los republicanos criticaron la medida, ya que a su juicio el aumento de regulación frena la capacidad de inversión de los operadores de Internet para desarrollar redes más veloces.

description.hltext_display: Neuer Stress mit den Banken-Stresstests
description.content:
Vor der nächsten Runde in der EU
Ht. Brüssel ⋅ Stresstests beschliessen ist nicht schwer, Stresstests machen dagegen sehr: Mit dieser Anlehnung an Wilhelm Busch könnte man das Ringen der EU um EU-weite Stresstests für Banken umschreiben. Nach einer Art Vorlauf im letzten Jahr und einem breit angelegten Test bei 91 Banken mit einer detaillierten Veröffentlichung der Resultate im letzten Sommer wurde ein nächster Durchgang beschlossen. Dieser soll Ende Februar 2011 beginnen und im Juni/Juli Resultate liefern. Doch laut Angaben aus EU-Kreisen ist noch immer kein Konsens über Umfang und Parameter gefunden worden; die Gespräche müssen im Januar fortgesetzt werden. Zuständig für die Koordination ist der Ausschuss der Europäischen Bankenaufseher (CEBS) in London, der Anfang 2011 zur neuen EU-Bankenaufsichtsbehörde (EBA) werden wird.
Einen von mehreren Streitpunkten bildet die Berücksichtigung der Liquiditätssituation. Beim letzten Test wurde, vereinfacht ausgedrückt, geprüft, wie das Eigenkapital der Institute auf bestimmte Szenarien (etwa eine schwere Rezession) reagieren würde. Nun drängt vor allem die EU-Kommission darauf, beim nächsten Anlauf wenn immer möglich auch die Auswirkungen auf die Liquidität zu untersuchen. Banken in Staaten wie Spanien und Portugal hätten zwar eine relativ solide Kapitalbasis, hätten aber Schwierigkeiten beim Zugang zu flüssigen Mitteln, heisst es hierzu. Solche Institute sind deshalb auf die – in der Krise temporär eingeführte – unbeschränkte Liquiditätszufuhr der Europäischen Zentralbank angewiesen. Seitens einiger Mitgliedstaaten, darunter Deutschland, gibt es laut den Angaben aber Bedenken zur Ausdehnung der Prüfung auf die Liquidität. Dafür gibt es durchaus valable Argumente, darunter das Fehlen eines EU-weit harmonisierten Konzepts zur Erfassung der Liquidität. Die Verantwortlichen stehen damit erneut vor einem Dilemma: Blenden sie die Liquiditätsfrage aus, wird man sie wieder verdächtigen, etwas verheimlichen zu wollen. Beziehen sie sie ein, werden womöglich Äpfel mit Birnen verglichen.
Copyright © Neue Zürcher Zeitung AG
