description.hltext_display: Autoexploración mamaria salva vidas
description.content:
El Sol de Hidalgo
Pachuca, Hidalgo.- El cáncer de mama se manifiesta con la aparición de un tumor maligno en cualquier parte de la glándula mamaria. Si el cáncer se detecta antes de que se haya extendido a los ganglios u otras partes del cuerpo, la posibilidad de controlarlo es del 90 por ciento, informó Jorge Islas Fuentes, secretario de Salud.
Hay factores de riesgo que predisponen para este padecimiento: el riesgo de cáncer aumenta con la edad, por lo que a mayor edad, mayor riesgo; asimismo, el no tener hijos; quienes tuvieron el primer hijo después de los 30 años; familiares que hayan padecido cáncer de mama (madre, hermanas o primas).
El cáncer de mama es un importante problema de Salud Pública en el mundo, con el tiempo, la mortalidad y el número de casos se han incrementado y ha llegado a ser la primera causa de muerte por cáncer en las mujeres.
Agregó que en Hidalgo ha sido muy importante fortalecer la prevención, por lo cual es de suma importancia que las mujeres realicen la detección temprana a través de la autoexploración, así como acudir a valoración clínica anual por personal de salud y solicitar la mastografía si tiene 40 años o más, en su unidad de salud más cercana.
Sin lugar a dudas, para el gobierno de Miguel Osorio la salud es una prioridad, por ello la Secretaría de Salud realiza acciones preventivas todo el año, y los dos últimos años se intensificó el programa de prevención, detección y atención temprana del cáncer de mama con la campaña de mastografías gratuitas, a través de unidades móviles en todas las regiones del Estado.
Además, se fortaleció la oferta del servicio con la apertura de una unidad más de mastografía en el Hospital Regional Tula-Tepeji.
Islas Fuentes, resaltó que de enero a octubre se realizaron 48 mil 216 exploraciones de mama en las unidades de primer contacto, a mujeres de nuestra entidad, así como mediante la estrategia de unidades de mastografía móviles y en los hospitales se realizaron 32 mil 997 mastografías, el 8 por ciento de las cuales tuvieron un resultado anormal, por lo que fue necesario realizar estudios complementarios, como lo son ultrasonido mamario, biopsia, estudio hisptopatológico, con lo cual se confirmaron 51 casos de cáncer de mama, mujeres que reciben tratamiento médico totalmente gratuito.
Este incremento en la cobertura de detección permitió, además, que se obtuvieran reconocimientos a nivel nacional por el trabajo comprometido de Hidalgo con la salud de la población.
Finalmente, el secretario de Salud indicó que el fortalecimiento de las acciones de promoción a la salud y prevención de las enfermedades favorecen a la construcción de una nueva cultura por la salud y a la disminución de estas enfermedades.

description.hltext_display: Voraz incendio que, todo indica fue intencional, se registró en un sitio habilitado para guardar trigo, en la colonia 20 de Noviembre.
description.content:
Integrantes de Protección Civil Municipal de Pachuca, apoyados por algunos voluntarios, batallaron en serio para sofocar fuerte incendio. Foto: Javier Islas / El Sol de Hidalgo.
El Sol de Hidalgo
Pachuca, Hidalgo.- Voraz incendio que, todo indica fue intencional, se registró en un sitio habilitado para guardar trigo, en la colonia 20 de Noviembre, a espaldas del Centro de Readaptación Social para Adultos, en Pachuca.
Habitantes de ese popular sector se alarmaron, anteayer en la noche, al observar grandes llamas que amenazaban con extenderse, incluso llegar a unas viviendas.
Integrantes de Protección Civil Municipal de la capital, con apoyo de algunos voluntarios, batallaron en serio para sofocar el fuego, el cual también arrasó con yerba seca, en un área de casi 200 metros.
Utilizaron varias pipas con agua, algunas particulares, para apagar el fuerte incendio que pudo ser observado a kilómetros de distancia.
Arturo Lucio Juárez, titular de los socorristas, dio a conocer que, al filo de las 20 horas, recibieron algunas llamadas telefónicas para alertarlos sobre la conflagración.
En sus unidades automotoras, añadió, llegaron al sitio y al ver la magnitud del incendio, no dudaron en solicitar varias pipas con agua.
Los integrantes de PC realizaron arduas y arriesgadas maniobras para atender la emergencia, incluso dos presentaron síntomas de intoxicación y debieron recibir atención médica.
Algunos lugareños se aprestaron a apoyar a los socorristas y, después de más de dos horas, finalmente apagaron el fuego.
Lucio Suárez manifestó que el incendio sucedió en un espacio habilitado para guardar trigo, rodeado de mucha yerba seca.
Refirió que, de acuerdo con las evidencias encontradas en el sitio, lo provocaron.
Finalmente, dijo que una vez sofocado el fuerte incendio, volvió la calma entre asustados habitantes de una parte de la colonia 20 de Noviembre, situada atrás del Cereso de Pachuca.

description.hltext_display: Paper’s support of ‘don’t ask’ repeal disappointing
description.content:
Richard Connor’s Dec. 11 column, “John McCain changes his mind on Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell,” comes after an earlier editorial in the newspaper that exalted Lady Gaga and her support to repeal of DADT.
No doubt, Lady Gaga has the attention of our youth, but does she deserve it? What does she know about the military? She flaunts and exalts her supposed bisexuality. Is that a message for youth to experiment? The editorial support for Lady Gaga was very disappointing.
Then the really big guy of the newspaper praises repeal. Many chiefs said they were worried about repeal in times of war of two campaigns. Most combat soldiers emphatically said “no” to repeal.
McCain said, “The study did not ask the right questions” and that the military felt intimidated. The responses out of 2 million servicemen were not good. In the hearings, many said, “why bother?” (it’s a done deal).
Doesn’t this worry Connor?
What really got me was the fact that if this repeal goes through, and someone is a person of religious moral conviction, his military career can be jeopardized if he exercises his right to question open homosexual conduct.
What a twist: Moral folks being penalized for exhibiting moral conduct in the military. Is open homosexuality compatible with conduct becoming an officer and does it conform to the military code of conduct?
Connor’s lack of addressing these issues is disappointing for a newsperson of his stature. The shame of it is that repeal probably gives impetus to further inroads against traditional marriage and family.

event_or_fact.property: ?The study did not ask the right questions? and that the military felt intimidated

美國最年輕‧40歲華裔任美聯邦法官
description.content: （美國‧芝� 哥21日訊）出身台灣移民家庭的張宜民將出任美國伊利諾伊州北區的聯邦法官，不僅是伊州第一位亞裔聯邦法官，年僅40歲的他，也是全美870多位聯邦法官中最年輕的一位。擔任伊州助理檢察官逾10年的張宜民� 工作表現傑出，獲民主黨參議員德賓推薦，填補伊州聯邦法官退休的空缺，今年4月由美國總統奧巴馬正式提名，但參議院上週六才確認張宜民的任命案。任命案通過後，張宜民表示“深感榮幸”。他� �定明年1月6日� �到，並於稍後的公開儀式宣誓就職。今年7月張宜民曾赴國會參� 聽證，母親鄭玉雀（右）也出席支持。會說華語閩南話定居芝� 哥的張宜民出生於紐約，父母都是台灣移民，育有兩女。他不僅能說華語，還能說一些閩南話；高中時在紐約布朗克斯科學高中，還曾� 成績優異跳級一年。張父張光華透露，兒子年幼時曾嚮往當職棒球員，當他從航空工程系畢業後表示要轉讀法律，家人都很訝異，� 為他在家沉默寡言，沒想到他的志向是當雄辯滔滔的律師。張宜民畢業於密西� �大學航空工程系、西北大學法學院，他曾在芝� 哥知名律師事務所短暫工作，但後來轉任公職，擔任助理檢察官期間，參與過伊州前州長布拉戈耶維奇濫權賣官案件。

description.hltext_display: Carrefour indeniza idosa por escorregão em alface
description.content:
Supermercado não se pronunciou sobre eventual recurso
Um tribunal francês condenou o grupo Carrefour a pagar uma indenização de 20 mil euros (R$ 44,5 mil) a uma septuagenária que escorregou em uma folha de alface no chão de um supermercado e fraturou a perna.
Segundo a imprensa francesa, essa decisão, anunciada na segunda-feira, é algo inédito no país e poderá criar jurisprudência.
Em 2008, uma cliente de um fast-food em Reims que havia escorregado em uma batata frita no chão do restaurante e sofrido rompimento dos ligamentos do joelho não obteve a indenização pleiteada na Justiça.
No caso atual, o Tribunal Correcional de Montpellier, no sul da França, estimou que o hipermercado foi responsável pela queda da cliente, já que o piso "escorregadio de maneira anormal" da loja provocou o acidente, ocorrido em 2006.
A idosa, na época com 72 anos, conseguiu provar na Justiça que o chão da seção de frutas e legumes do hipermercado, situado na região de Hérault, no sul da França, estava sujo, repleto de resíduos de comida.
A senhora, citada pela imprensa francesa apenas como Josiane, sofreu uma dupla fratura do fêmur e teve de ser operada duas vezes.
Ela também precisou fazer fisioterapia durante meses e sofreu uma perda da mobilidade da perna.
"A gravidade dos ferimentos e a reação do supermercado, que se recusou a efetuar uma indenização, nos levou a recorrer à Justiça", disse o advogado da septuagenária, Emmanuel Ludot.
"O supermercado tem a obrigação de limpar corretamente o chão da loja e assegurar a segurança da clientela", afirmou.
O grupo Carrefour declarou que ainda aguardava receber a cópia da sentença do tribunal antes de se pronunciar sobre um eventual recurso.

description.hltext_display: •羊城晚� �︰國足每一戰都該"反� �"
description.content:
國足熱身賽大勝愛沙尼亞後，足協掌門人韋迪終于開了金口，亞洲杯定下了“必須得小組出線”的目標，是之前對任務指標“三緘其口”後的首度表態。別被“亞洲杯是鍛煉隊伍”迷魂了，其實領導心里明鏡似的。“時時勤拂拭，勿使惹塵埃”，這是領導的心態，總得時不時來敲打敲打。國足上下，千萬不能以“本來無一物，何處惹塵埃”來應對。
其實領導定基調也不是壞事。明年1月的亞洲杯，是國足全年屈指可數的大賽事，連在曼聯如日中天的樸智星都要殺回韓國，可見各隊對亞洲杯的重視。對于總是在大賽中“積累經驗，總結教訓”、在友誼賽中才威風八面的國足而言，更沒有“戰略輕視”的資本；否則，亞洲杯為世界杯積累、世界杯為亞洲杯埋單，循環往復，生生不息。
不過，韋迪的表態，未必是正視對手實力的熟慮之言。同組的卡塔爾是新鮮出爐的2022年世界杯舉辦國，正四處展示實力，對亞洲杯更不會馬虎應付；烏茲別克斯坦雖然不很強，在2007年亞洲杯也曾橫掃國足三球；科威特稍顯弱點，國足也沒有必勝的把握。從12月初的“不給國足定指標”到現在的“必須小組出線”的死命令，大轉身的背後據說是為了不給球迷在春節期間“添堵”。
別給全國人民添堵，不是韋迪的首創，而是領導的領導的首創。想一想今年春節前大勝韓國、國慶前大勝博茨瓦納，國足確是心領神會、偶有神來之筆的。而領導在制定短期或遠期目標時，也總是會體恤下情的。我相信，國足在征戰亞洲杯時一定會分外努力，這是球員的天職。只是，小組出線就不給全國人民添堵了嗎？亞運會上國奧被韓國和日本完爆，在未來國足實力的較量上，遠遠落後于日韓，這堵早就添上了。
國足應該踏踏實實面對每一戰、每一分鐘，不論是友誼賽還是亞洲杯。對于領導，有目標要早定，有話要早說，不能朝令夕改。每支球隊在每屆大賽前都會有目標，沒有壓力也就沒有動力，即使是亞洲杯，也是國足彌足珍貴的實戰考驗機會。韋迪不到一個月兩度表態，大相徑庭，添堵也不僅僅是指賽場上吧。男人都喜歡女人的身材像可樂瓶，芙蓉姐姐說︰我的身材也是，不過是2.5升的。唉，原來大家說的不是同一回事。

Como consecuencia del incendio, otros tres vehÃ­culos que estaban estacionados en la calle sufrieron diversos daÃ±os, causados por el efecto de las llamas.Un vehÃ­culo que constaba como sustraÃ­do resultÃ³ calcinado este martes por la noche y las llamas afectaron tambiÃ©n a otros tres vehÃ­culos que estaban estacionados en la zona, segÃºn han confirmado fuentes de la Ertzaintza a Europa Press.

description.hltext_display: 美國‧“可疑氣體”襲聯合國‧人員疏散致2會議展延
description.content: （美國‧紐約21日訊）聯合國安理會與聯合國大會週二� 一股“可疑氣體”而進行人員疏散。聯合國發言人哈克表示，進行疏散是一� �� �防措施。聯合國與紐約保安人員正在追查“可疑氣體”的源� �。聯合國安理會與聯合國大會在週二的原訂會議都� 此而展延，並在過後移至聯國北草坪建築物舉行。聯合國當時正準備召開一� �特別安理會會議，一批來自全球各地的小孩子也來到這裡，準備發表他們的心聲。在發現“可疑氣體”後，這群小孩子被疏散到聯合國總部對面的美國代表團署。

description.hltext_display: Alquileres en Maldonado van de US$ 750 a US$ 60.000
description.content:
El nivel de ocupación de inmuebles en los balnearios fernandinos de cara a la temporada estival 2011 es de entre 70% y 80%
﻿
Los empresarios turísticos auspician una muy buena temporada de verano 2011 en materia de ocupación, incluso mejor que en años anteriores.
Esta temporada, los uruguayos se animan a gastar más si de vacacionar se trata y e so a pesar de los elevados precios de los arrendamientos, que en Maldonado y Punta del Este van de US$ 750 a US$ 60 mil la quincena.
“Esperamos mucha más ocupación que en años anteriores. Hay más nivel de reserva y expectativa mayor, pensando en las condiciones regionales dadas para la temporada”, dijo a Observa el presidente de la Asociación de Inmobiliarias de Punta del Este, Sabas Pereira.
En cuanto a los precios, Pereira comentó que se puede alquilar un apartamento de un dormitorio por US$ 1.000 la quincena, mientras que un apartamento en un edificio cinco estrellas puede costar entre US$ 30 mil y US$ 40 mil el alquiler por quince días.
Por su parte, el presidente de la Cámara Inmobiliaria de Maldonado, Juan Francisco Bistiancic, expresó a Observa que “el nivel de ocupación es muy bueno, sobre todo en la primera quincena (de enero)”, y en los días de las fiestas de fin de año.
El empresario comentó que se puede alquilar un ambiente por US$ 750 la quincena, pero que también hay casas por US$ 3 mil por día. “No hay un límite. La gran fortaleza de Punta del Este es la diversidad de precios, desde la zona de José Ignacio hasta Solís”, aclaró Bistiancic.
Además, indicó que en José Ignacio hay duplex, de dos plantas, que se alquilan por US$ 60 mil el mes y que apartamentos como los de la torre Le Jarden se alquilan por US$ 30 mil el mes.
Tanto Sabat como Bistiancic coincidieron en señalar que los argentinos y los brasileños son los turistas extranjeros que sin dudas llegan en mayor número a los balnearios fernandinos. “El valor de la moneda los favorece”, dijo Sabat que agregó que los europeos llegan, pero su concurrencia es “mínima”.
Sin embargo, Bistiancic advirtió que actualmente “el uruguayo puede pagar (un alquiler elevado). Se han reivindicado con Punta del Este y alquilan casas grandes y pagan bien”.
Además, agregço que “Antes US$ 10 mil por un mes sólo lo podían pagar unos pocos y hoy hay mucha gente del interior que con el campo subieron su nivel de vida”.

description.hltext_display: A spirited Senior Christmas Brunch
Millicom International Cellular Subsidiary In Congo Agrees To Sell 729 Towers
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Telecommunications group Millicom International Cellular SA (MICC) Wednesday said its subsidiary in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Oasis has agreed to sell 729 towers to Helios Towers DRC, a direct subsidiary of Helios Towers Africa. As a result of the transaction, Tigo DRC will receive at least $45 million of cash up front and will retain a significant minority interest in Helios Towers.
Additionally, Tigo DRC and Helios Towers have entered into a long term leasing agreement whereby Helios Towers will provide Tigo DRC with access to wireless communications towers and a build-to-suit agreement to support the company's wireless networks. Helios Towers will seek similar agreements with other operators in DRC. The transaction is expected to create savings in both capital and operating expenditure for Tigo DRC.
First closing of the transaction is expected to take place around third quarter, 2011.

description.hltext_display: HOT 97 Announces Immediate Suspension of DJ Cipha Sounds
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE HOT 97
NEW YORK, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Emmis Communications' HOT 97 today announced a three-part plan to address a recent comment made on-air by DJ Cipha Sounds.
First, the station announced that DJ Cipha Sounds has been suspended indefinitely.
Second, Cipha will immediately undertake sensitivity training focused on the Haitian community and specifically, the challenges the Haitian community has faced in terms of the HIV epidemic.
Finally, HOT 97 announced it will work with local community leaders to utilize the influence of HOT 97 to increase awareness of HIV and community programs to address the HIV epidemic.
"Cipha made an immediate public apology and recognizes his insensitivity and the negative impact his comments have on all Haitians," said Alex Cameron, SVP/Market Manager of Emmis-New York. "The Haitian community is an important part of our listenership whom we respect and value. The suspension is an indication of the importance we place on delivering a product that respects our Haitian audience. It's a very regrettable and unfortunate circumstance for all involved and particularly because we know this is not the nature of this young man who has been an advocate of the Haitian community and a big part of our fundraising efforts for Haiti. He is committed to working with the Haitian community to make a difference and turn this negative incident into an opportunity for increased learning and awareness."
About HOT 97
HOT 97 (WQHT FM) is the world's first all Hip-Hop station and has held the dominant position in New York for over ten years. HOT 97 is best known for its celebrity on air talent, such as Angie Martinez (Grammy nominated artist) and Funkmaster Flex (television host, multiple gold records), as well as being the world's premier source for Hip Hop music culture. For more information on HOT 97, please visit www.hot97.com, HOT 97 on the Web at Myspace.com/hot97official, www.facebook.com/hot97official, or twitter.com/hot97
Emmis Communications – Great Media, Great People, Great Service®
Emmis is an Indianapolis-based diversified media firm with radio broadcasting, television broadcasting and magazine publishing operations. Emmis owns 21 FM and 2 AM domestic radio stations serving the nation's largest markets of New York, Los Angeles and Chicago, as well as St. Louis, Austin, Indianapolis and Terre Haute, Ind. Emmis also owns a radio network, international radio stations, regional and specialty magazines, an interactive business and ancillary businesses in broadcast sales.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: •曹健︰熟悉的鯊魚終于游回來了
description.content:
回看整個夏天和秋天，上海男籃的引援動作雖然說有點兒慢，但是總體結果還算鼓舞人心。自打姚老板接手俱樂部以後，就常听他說一句話︰總需要有人先職業起來。我覺得上海隊是在按這個思路操作。
所謂職業化，在我的粗略理解中無非是兩條︰一、把自身的水平搞上去，把自己的位置擺正；二、在這個基礎上，盡可能純粹地談錢。據我所知，哈里斯、格林和張兆旭之所以選擇了上海，都和俱樂部目前的經營狀態和訓練水平，尤其是教練組的能力有很大關系。如果說薪水是籌碼，那麼這些因素就是在籌碼上面的加權。在引援的過程中，上海隊事實上是得罪人的。譬如說浙江方面對于哈里斯和上海隊達成默契非常不滿，而山東青年隊也抱怨自己培養出來的好苗子被人輕易就挖走了。然而從市場角度來說，上海隊的運作卻沒有任何毛病——符合一切法律程序，再加上適當的價錢，如此而已。
在交換球員的過程中，也有其他球隊從上海隊得到了出色的角色球員，如李根或者羅旭東。這樣看來，樹挪死、人挪活，人員流動理應產生多贏局面。但是上海男籃的開局二連敗就讓人連呼看不懂。看上去確實是的︰哈里斯和格林的資歷都夠看，引入的一班角色球員也不比送走的差。然而一支球隊的真實戰斗力，卻不是在賬面上算出來的。開局艱難，說明大有改進之處。
去年的三名外援，盧卡斯來之能戰、塞勒和阿巴斯的磨合期較長，看上去今年的兩名外援更能夠即時提供火力。問題或許正是出自他們的個人能力，兩個強大的不確定因素的加入，反而打破了原來已經成型的體系。格林的控球很穩健，至少我還沒見過他被斷球，哈里斯的單打和籃板球能力驚人，不愧是NBDL的最有價值球員，可是要讓他們在一個快速傳球、無限跑動的體系中迅速擺正位置，並不容易。鄧華德是鐵了心要讓格林來打控球，由此犧牲了一部分速度，我認為這樣做沒錯——沒有盧卡斯的跑動，速度太快反而平添失誤。以哈里斯為主攻，格林主控，劉煒打純得分後衛，再輔以一群角色球員和內線藍領，這樣的體系有理由強大，前提是必須改變去年的風格。
在調整過程中，上海隊最大的硬傷是內線球員有太多年輕人。張兆旭說︰鄧華德希望他能夠在賽季中練出幾招殺手 ，專門用固定的套路去得分。這件事其實早該辦，但是國家隊集訓給耽誤了。看看跟隨球隊一個夏天的吳洋就知道，夏訓對于年輕運動員來說是多麼重要。上海隊內線的防守強度不成問題，最麻煩的還是張兆旭和季祥兩個攻擊盲點，我們至少希望看到他們能夠貢獻穩定的中距離投籃，一旦他們開發出中投，在高位就會變得可怕，而哈里斯在低位就會變得更可怕。
上海隊的速度，肉眼可見，已經慢下來了。剩下的事情就是在新的風格中安排好每個人的位置。感謝哈里斯的壓哨三分球，賽季初二連敗帶來的困惑至此一掃而光。鄧華德的球隊，不怕你沒技術，就怕你沒士氣。現在士氣有了，好好干吧。

description.hltext_display: Tågproblem i Västsverige
description.author: webmaster@nt.se
description.content:
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet, med -36 grader i Idre, är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt i dag. SMHI har utfärdat en klass 1-varning för att omkring en decimeter snö kan komma fram i Hälsingland under morgonen och förmiddagen.
Trafikverket har satt in extra resurser för att gårdagens snöproblem ska undvikas i dag. Trots det väntas kraftiga förseningar i Västsverige. På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna Halmstad-Göteborg och Halmstad-Malmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.
Även på sträckan Charlottenberg-Laxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.
-Det vi har är efterdyningar av gårdagens stora problem med växelfel, säger Tommy Andersson på SJ:s pressjour.-En del tåg har hamnat på fel plats i omloppet, kan man säga.
Ett 20-tal tåg i Mälardalen kommer att ersättas av buss och en del passagerare har blivit ombokade till andra avgångar.
Flygtrafiken till och från London ska återupptas i nära nog normal omfattning i dag.
-Som det ser ut just nu så har vi ställt in en Londontur från Stockholm i eftermiddag och från Göteborg ställer vi in en tur och retur till London. Resten hoppas vi verkligen att vi ska kunna få i väg, säger SAS informationschef Elisabeth Manzi.
Situationen i London är fortfarande kaosartad, SAS har närmare 6 000 svenskar strandade där.
För att få hem så många som möjligt planerar SAS att byta till större flygplan.
-Men det är svårt att sitta och lova något, det blir en så skör situation när så många är drabbade. Men nu håller vi tummarna, för vi behöver verkligen lätta på trycket.-Självklart är vårt mål att alla ska få fira jul hemma. Vi gör allt för att få hem alla, säger Elisabeth Manzi.
SAS har kallat in extra personal för att svara på frågor och sköta ombokningar för alla de som drabbats, men väntetiderna har varit mycket långa.
-Vi hoppas på förståelse, men de har förstås behövt utrusta sig med en stor portion tålamod.
Snöröjningen på Londonflygplatsen Heathrow har fått mycket hård kritik.
-Jag är inte någon expert på snöröjning men vi kan ju konstatera att de inte har klarat av att leverera det vi köper, nämligen möjligheten att kunna flyga till den flygplatsen. De har uppenbarligen inte klarat att leva upp till de önskvärda nivåerna, säger Elisabeth Manzi.
När det gäller Paris, Amsterdam och Frankfurt är man i stort sett i kapp med strandade passagerare eftersom trafiken har kunnat upprätthållas, om än med förseningar och inställda flyg.
Större text Mindre text

description.hltext_display: 韓國‧最大規模實彈演習‧局勢生變料激怒朝鮮
description.content:
（韓國‧首爾22日訊）就在朝鮮半島局勢剛剛有所緩和之際，韓國周三宣佈，週四將在朝韓邊境附近進行史上最大規模實彈演習，藉此展示韓國的軍事實力。
同時，國防部官員透露，韓國週三開始在朝鮮半島以東海域舉行為期3天的實彈演習。他沒有提供更多細節，但韓聯社稱，此次演習正在韓朝海上邊界以南約100公里處進行，有至少6艘海軍艦艇參與演習。演習人數最多一次� �兵及戰鬥機均將參� 周四的大規模軍演，演習人員也會是和平時期人數最多的一次。韓國週一剛在延坪島進行了實彈� �擊演練，這次新的演習計劃勢將激怒朝鮮。朝鮮本週剛同意聯合國監察員再次入境，以解除國際社會對朝鮮� �武� �目的擔憂。這讓外界推測，朝� �問題六方會談即將重啟，各國也普遍鬆了一口氣，認為朝鮮半島的這� �危機已經解除。針對朝鮮展示國力
當被問及這次最新軍演計劃是否與延坪島事件有關時，韓國一名軍官說：“是的，這將是韓國軍力的展示，針對的是朝鮮� �擊延坪島事件”。他稱，此前韓國舉行過50多次類似軍演，但這次的規模是空前的。他指出，此次軍演將出動36枚K-9自行榴彈� �、F-15戰鬥機和直升機。這次大規模實彈軍事演習將在位於首爾市中心以北50公里內的抱川地區進行。
中國外交部暫未對韓國此次最新演習計劃發表評論。
分析家認為，在近期內，朝鮮不太可能採取像襲擊韓國天安艦一樣的激烈行動，但較有可能以實彈� �擊演習或向西岸進行短程導彈試射回應。

description.hltext_display: HBO to air 'Pee-wee Herman Show'
description.content:
NEW YORK, Dec. 22 (UPI) -- HBO is taping a performance of "The Pee-wee Herman Show" on Broadway with plans to air it next year, The Wrap reported.
The stage comedy will premiere on the pay cable network three decades after actor Paul Reubens introduced the character in an HBO special, The Wrap noted Tuesday.
Reubens played the character onstage, in the films "Pee-wee's Big Adventure" and "Big Top Pee-wee," and on the children's television show "Pee-wee's Playhouse," but he stopped appearing as his alter ego after being arrested for indecent exposure in Florida in 1991.
He revived the child-like character with the too-short trousers and high-pitched voice, and starred in "The Pee-wee Herman Show" at the Nokia Theater in Los Angeles in January and February. The show opened on Broadway in October and is expected to run through Jan. 2.

description.hltext_display: Movimiento fiscaliza votos de diputados
description.content:
El Movimiento Cívico Nacional (MCN) fiscaliza los votos de los diputados y las iniciativas que estos presentan.
Rodrigo Arenas, del MCN, informó que se han puesto como meta “el rescate del Congreso”, por lo que fiscalizan la forma en que los legisladores votan para comisiones de postulación y la aprobación de leyes como las de seguridad y otras.
Al mismo tiempo, según Arenas, el MCN formará parte de una mesa de transparencia que se instalará en el Congreso, en la cual se pretende investigar parte de los negocios a los que se dedican los diputados.
La fiscalización sobre las votaciones de los congresistas se inició desde septiembre, con la asignación del director del Instituto de la Defensa Pública Penal y del contralor general de Cuentas.

description.hltext_display: Immigration counter service to close for Christmas
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR: The Immigration Department will close its service counters at all branches during the Christmas holidays, its director-general Datuk Alias Ahmad said today.
The counters will be closed on Dec 25 and 26 in Penang, Perak, Selangor, Kuala Lumpur and Putrajaya, Negri Sembilan, Malacca, Johor, Kelantan, Terengganu, Sarawak and Sabah, and on Dec 24 and 25 in Kedah, he said in a statement.
Enquiries should be directed at the Operations Room of the Immigration Headquarters in Putrajaya at 03-8880 1555/1556. - BERNAMA

event_or_fact.property: The counters will be closed on Dec 25 and 26 in Penang, Perak, Selangor, Kuala Lumpur and Putrajaya, Negri Sembilan, Malacca, Johor, Kelantan, Terengganu, Sarawak and Sabah, and on Dec 24 and 25 in Kedah

description.hltext_display: The Big Screen: 'TRON: Legacy'
13.Area Rugs And How They Should Be Placed
description.content:
Area rugs have a long and distinguished history, and the technique enjoys popularity continues the original plot. Some of the rugs are woven by hand, and others are created by power looms.
We all know that red means passionate love, and thus give a red rose to someone we love. It is a symbol of energy and life. You can give a unique and romantic home by placing red color in the accessories inside. One of the best accessories on the inside is the red carpet. A red area rug not only adds charm to the decor of your home, but also gives you the comfort of your feet. Since the color red is a very demanding decorated with a wide range of red carpets on the market. They come in different styles and sizes. You can get anything on the carpet that best suits your room theme.
In the world of interior design, you will find just a little more versatile area rug. Whether worn to protect the points and the carpet or floor, providing heat, or accenting the walls and furniture, these portable coatings, which are usually oval, square or rectangular in shape gift for apartment dwellers and owners of house of a similar color and texture options to meet your needs.
Before placing the rug, make sure that you intend to mount the first quarter. Furniture dimensions and locations can greatly affect a carpet of whether or not well coordinated. Also, avoid covering the cables or ducts for cooling or heating and allow sufficient space heaters.
Place a beautiful carpet in the wrong place, could bring balance space badly. Residents to gather character areas, the channel traffic on sidewalks, or highlight key furniture.
Extremely big or small area rug may be disproportionate space and furniture. Make sure you take accurate measurements, not only in space but also on furniture and carpet will fit properly within the allotted space. Use tape to mark the location accuracy. Visit to this newly launched internet site @ http://www.gcrugs.com/ that offers the most common rugs, area rugs, rug, area rug.

description.hltext_display: The almanac
description.content:
the 356th day of 2010 with nine to follow.
The moon is waning. The morning stars are Venus and Mercury. The evening stars are Jupiter, Uranus, Saturn, Mars and Neptune.
Those born on this date are under the sign of Capricorn. They include Nobel Peace Prize laureate Frank Kellogg in 1856; opera composer Giacomo Puccini in 1858; former Philadelphia Athletics' Manager Connie Mack, the "Dean of Baseball," in 1862; former first lady Claudia "Lady Bird" Johnson, wife of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson, in 1912; TV game show host Gene Rayburn in 1917; actors Barbara Billingsley in 1915 and Hector Elizondo in 1936 (age 74); baseball Hall of Fame member Steve Carlton in 1944 (age 66); TV news anchor Diane Sawyer in 1945 (age 65); Robin Gibb (age 61) and twin brother Maurice Gibb in 1949, members of the Bee Gees pop group; and actor Ralph Fiennes in 1962 (age 48).
On this date in history:
In 1785, the American Continental Navy fleet was organized, consisting of two frigates, two brigs and three schooners. Sailors were paid $8 a month.
In 1864, after his Civil War march across Georgia, Union Gen. William T. Sherman sent U.S. President Abraham Lincoln this message: "I beg to present you as a Christmas present the city of Savannah."
In 1894, French Capt. Alfred Dreyfus was convicted of treason by a military court-martial on flimsy evidence in a highly irregular trial and sentenced to life in prison for his alleged crime of passing military secrets to the Germans.
In 1944, ordered to surrender by Nazi troops who had his unit trapped during the Battle of the Bulge, Gen. Anthony McAuliffe of the U.S. 101st Airborne Division replied with one word: "Nuts!"
In 1956, the first gorilla to be born in captivity arrived into the world at the Columbus Zoo in Ohio.
In 1971, the U.N. General Assembly chose Austrian diplomat Kurt Waldheim to lead the United Nations.
In 1972, 5,000 people died when a series of earthquakes left the Nicaraguan capital of Managua in ruins.
In 1984, "subway vigilante" Bernard Goetz shot four would-be hold-up men on a New York City subway. He ended up serving eight months in prison for carrying an illegal weapon but was cleared of assault and attempted murder charges.
In 1986, political dissident and Nobel laureate Andrei Sakharov and his wife, Yelena Bonner, were allowed to return to Moscow after seven years of internal exile.
In 1989, Romanian President Nicolae Ceausescu, the last hard-line communist holdout against East Bloc reforms, fell from power in the face of continuing massive demonstrations.
In 1992, all 158 people aboard a Libyan Boeing 727 died when the jetliner crashed, apparently following an in-flight collision with a military plane.
In 1993, the daughter of Cuban President Fidel Castro was granted political asylum in the United States.
Also in 1993, South Africa's Parliament gave a strong endorsement to an interim constitution that ended centuries of white-minority rule.
In 1994, Italy's Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi resigned after seven months in office, following corruption charges against him.
In 1997, members of a pro-government militia attacked the village of Chenalh, Mexico, killing 45 people, including a number of children.
In 2001, American Airlines passengers and attendants overpowered a man trying to light a match to detonate powerful explosives hidden in his sneakers on a flight from Paris to Miami.
In 2004, 13 U.S. soldiers and nine others were killed in a suicide bomber attack on a U.S. military dining hall near Mosul, Iraq.
In 2005, Wal-Mart was ordered to pay more than 100,000 California employees $172 million for depriving them of breaks to eat.
In 2006, rape charges against three former members of the Duke University lacrosse team were dropped after the alleged victim said she couldn't be sure she had been raped.
In 2007, the U.S. Air Force reported finding major structural flaws in eight models of its F-15 fighter jets, grounding some U.S. air defense capabilities.
Also in 2007, 2 million children in Iraq faced malnutrition, lack of education and threats of disease and violence, the U.N. Children's Fund said in a report.
In 2008, a federal jury in New Jersey convicted five Muslim men of plotting to attack soldiers at Fort Dix, a plot prosecutors say was inspired by al-Qaida. The defendants were acquitted of attempted murder.
Also in 2008, an earthen retraining wall ruptured at a Kingston, Tenn., power plant, allowing 5.4 million cubic yards of coal and sludge to spill from a storage pond, blocking roads and rail lines, polluting 500 acres of land and contaminating the Emory River.
In 2009, Iranian security forces and anti-government protesters clashed in the holy city of Qom at the funeral of a founder of the Islamic revolution 30 years earlier. Grand Ayatollah Hussein Ali Montazeri, who died at 87, became a prominent critic of June's disputed presidential voting that re-elected President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
A thought for the day: James Dewar has been quoted as saying: "Minds are like parachutes. They only function when they are open."

description.hltext_display: 阔别二十二年后的回望（续）
description.content:
22年变化 回望
（接上篇）参观完了车间潘书记说到办公室坐坐吧！我随他走上曾经那么熟悉的楼梯，直接走到最里面的房间，这里原来是美国专家的办公室，专家走了以后这里就成了车间开周会的会议室，现在成了车间办公室，只见主任、书记的大班桌宽敞明亮，电脑、打印机一应俱全，旁边放了一组沙发，潘书记说这就围成了一个小会议室，潘书记从长条桌上取上一本《赞美诗》递给我，我说：“我从卢晓枫主编寄给我的公司文学刊物《世纪花》上已经看到你的赞美诗了。”
虽然如此，但拿到印成铅字的沉甸甸的书还是感到很震撼！一位基层车间的管理者出了书，用诗的语言赞美车间的新人新事，赞美车间里每一个岗位的默默奉献的工人，这本身就是管理工作上的一个创举！
我抄录了《赞美词》 第182期
热天欣喜获赠扇，/雪中送碳暖心坎。/人间真情最珍贵，/包括雨中有送伞。/周四早上下夜班，/突下大雨天气寒。/领班本已出厂门，/想起一事往回转。/见他手机贴耳边，/呼叫同事把话喊。/问及雨伞是否带，/我有备用可解难。/这一场景很简单，/事情虽小有内涵。/止步观察看究竟，/等待会面见答案。/两人想见笑开颜，/那是真情写在脸。/刚才正为伞发愁，/及时获助愁云散。/原来就在通话前，/另有同事已支援。/创建和谐心相印，/点滴小事都体现。/ 赞美江钻股份热处理车间热处理班领班汪志勇与他的同事。2010年8月26日
潘书记说：“写赞美诗我坚持了三年多，已经写了192篇。”我说：“你能写诗不错，我写了三年多博客，深知写文字不容易。”这时一位健壮的中年男人进来了，潘书记说：“这是李海燕。”我说：“我认识，去年在科苑小区我就见到他在外面洗车，就问了你这车是多少钱买的？他说全部算下来，12，3万吧！”潘书记说：“现在咱们厂工人买车的可多了。”正说时迟勇军也来看我，跟他握手以后，潘书记说：“迟勇军也买车了，他女儿去法国留学了。”我说：“去年我回江汉的时候就听说咱们厂一些工人的子弟出国留学了，我就感到很新奇，现在我们厂的子弟出国留学的有几个？”迟勇军说：“算下来有5个，3个法国的，2个美国的。”（注：公司有一千多员工）
潘书记打开电脑还给我演示了PPT，这是他在支部书记会上汇报工作用的，还放了他们参加活动时录的视频。我说：“公司的政工工作运用了信息技术，说明周书记的理念很新呀！”
我问：“现在左邻右舍跟我们还有扯皮的事吗？”潘书记说：“再也没有了，现在生产很顺。”我说：“你们都是引进时的元老了，这些年你们干得很好，来到这里就想给你们说说当年的引进，那时我们引进了美国休斯公司的牙轮钻头制造技术，这是邓小平第一次复出后的事，那时周总理身患重病，邓小平复出担任副总理，带队出席联合国第六届特别会议，会后去休斯敦参观了休斯公司，这才有了我们的引进项目，我来车间时，引进的流水线都基本上搞好了，全厂的引进生产线即将竣工剪彩，但因热处理调试通不过，几千件牙掌积压在热处理，热处理厂房里料筐高高地堆积如山，美国休斯公司两次派来专家调试都没有成功，第一次派来的是他们的工段长瑞比亚，第二次派来的是他们的车间经理格兰斯基，由于热处理不过关，全厂的剪彩时间一拖再拖，在此情况下领导派我来热处理车间主持工作，石油部制造司的于善玮老总找我谈话，说：我们跟格兰斯基商议好了，为了支持你的工作，他同意合同期满了再延长半年在这里工作。我对于总说：我来了就不需要格兰斯基再延长半年了，我会和全车间同志把任务完成好。”
“这样我们把热处理生产线搞通了，全厂在1985年9月18日就在我们热处理车间前的广场上由石油部和管理局的领导剪了彩。生产线刚开通那会儿，各方面都不适应，许多矛盾都集中在热处理方面，比如剥层不合格，我首先要实验室复查，因为按照程序一次不合格必须要复查，甚至加倍复查才能下结论，因为这是休斯规定的严格的检验程序，可是这种程序往往不能严格执行，就造成扯皮和部门之间的矛盾。再比如热后老反映热处理淬火太硬了，车不动，面对返工的要求，我就去热后车间要来他们的刀头拿到实验室去打硬度，原来是进口刀头的硬度只有HRC57，这怎么能车得动呢？由此追溯到一切进口零件免检的规定有漏洞的问题。”我继续说：“所以我问你左邻右舍是否还有扯皮的问题，现在没有了说明我们的工作程序都执行得很好了，引进是非常成功的。”
看看时间不早了，我便起身告辞了，走到门口潘书记指着柜子里的一张照片说：这就是当年我们车间取得“双文明集体”荣誉称号时照的合影，这里还有你呢。”我说：“这是一张很珍贵的老照片，我们全车间经过8年的努力，才夺回了这一荣誉”，我翻拍了这张照片，李海燕把照片的电子版给了我，
他说：“吴主任挺想念车间的，我们大家也很想念你！”我说：“我也很想念大家，如果我再回车间，我会向我批评过的，伤害过的同志道歉，请他们原谅！”
当我走出厂门的时候，看到三位女兵迈着整齐的步伐，走到公司的旗台前，庄严地降下了国旗、公司旗和API旗帜，回望江钻股份，这一个从普通工厂通过引进华丽转身，在短短的20多年里一跃进入了世界前三，亚洲第一，成为了占国内市场份额60%的油用钻头制造商，她的前景将会更辉煌！

description.hltext_display: Un trabajador resulta herido tras caer por el hueco de un ascensor a unos 15 metros en un hotel de Palma
description.content:

Tras recibir la alerta, el 112 ha puesto en marcha de manera inmediata el correspondiente protocolo de ayuda y ha dado aviso de los hechos al Samu, la PolicÃ­a Nacional, la y la PolicÃ­a Local.
Al lugar de los hechos, tambiÃ©n se ha trasladado una UVI MÃ³vil del 061 que, en estos momentos, se encuentra asistiendo al herido.Un trabajador de unos 40 aÃ±os ha resultado herido esta maÃ±ana tras caer por el hueco de un ascensor desde una altura de 15 metros en el , ubicado en la calle , segÃºn han informado a Europa Press fuentes de los del 112 y del 061.

description.hltext_display: Biometric system to track foreigners more effectively
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR: A biometric system to monitor foreigners to be implemented soon will be able to address problems, especially the abuse of visit passes, more effectively, the Dewan Negara was told today.
Deputy Home Minister Datuk Lee Chee Leong said data on foreigners who entered the country legally but got arrested for offences would also be recorded and stored in the system.
"Their biometric data will be stored permanently for the purpose of immigration checks at all entry-exit points," he said when replying to Senator Dayang Madinah Tun Abang Openg.
Lee said the system would also help prevent foreigners from entering the country illegally. - BERNAMA

event_or_fact.property: the system would also help prevent foreigners from entering the country illegally

description.hltext_display: Heute gibt es im Baur Adventskalender ein 14-teiliges Gläser-Set von Flirt!
description.content:
14-teiliges Gläser-Set von Flirt
(fair-NEWS) - Ein hochwertiges Gläser-Set für jeden Anlass, selbstverständlich auch für eine Silvester-Feier.
Genau das Richtige für jede stimmungsvolle Silvesterparty!
Viele haben sicherlich schon Pläne für die Silvesternacht: Wahrscheinlich werden die meisten mit Freunden und Verwandten ins neue Jahr feiern. Denn man sagt ja: wie man ein Jahr einläutet, so verbringt man es auch. Also im besten Fall mit vielen Freunden, Bekannten und Verwandten.
Und damit Sie Ihre Gäste gebührend bewirten können, gibt es heute im Baur Adventskalender ein 14-teiliges Gläser-Set. Dieses besteht aus 6 Longdrink-Gläsern (sehr gut geeignet für Cocktails), 6 Whiskey-Gläsern und 2 Snackschalen.
Die einzige Bedingung, um die schicken Gläser zu bekommen, ist ein Mindestbestellwert von 50EUR.
• Homepage: www.baur.de/adventskalender
• Pressekontakt
BAUR Versand GmbH & Co KG
Dr. Jörg Hoepfner
Bahnhofstraße 10
96224 Burgkunstadt
pressemitteilung@baur.de
• Kontakt
BAUR Versand (GmbH & Co KG)
Bahnhofstraße 10
96224 Burgkunstadt
Deutschland
Telefon: 09572/91-3020
• Unternehmensinfo
Die BAUR Versand GmbH & Co KG wurde 1925 als erstes Schuh-Versandhaus Deutschlands von Dr. Friedrich Baur im oberfränkischen Burgkunstadt gegründet. Erfolgsgrundlagen waren die von ihm initiierte Vertriebsidee der Sammelbestellung und die bereits 1935 eingeführte Ratenzahlung.
Die kontinuierliche Erweiterung des Sortiments hatte eine stetige Vergrößerung des Unternehmens zur Folge. Heute befinden sich in Burgkunstadt die Verwaltung, im benachbarten Altenkunstadt ein Kaufhaus, das Hauptlager, das Frachtumschlagszentrum und in Weismain ein Reservelager sowie ein Logistikzentrum für Drittgeschäfte.
Mit der Beteiligung der otto group an BAUR wurde ab 1997 eine weitere Expansionsphase eingeleitet. 2001 übernahm BAUR das österreichische Versandhaus Universal und zwei Jahre später wurde die BAUR Gruppe um Otto Österreich, einem Versender mit hoher Modekompetenz, erweitert.
Ende der 90er Jahre startete das Unternehmen ins E-Commerce-Zeitalter und heute sind sämtliche Artikel online erhältlich. Über 50 Prozent aller Bestellungen der rund drei Millionen Kunden erfolgen bereits über das Internet und baur.de ist ständig unter den Top Ten der deutschen Internetshops.
Weitere Standbeine schuf die BAUR Gruppe 2003 mit dem Schuhe-Spezialversand I"m walking http://www.imwalking.de bzw. http://schuhe.imwalking.de und 2006 mit BAUR Fulfillment Solutions (BFS). BFS http://www.baur-fs.de/fulfillment.html stellt auch Dritten die Dienstleistungen Call Center, Warehousing, Debitoren-Management und Distribution zur Verfügung.
Als Multichannel-Anbieter ist BAUR neben dem Katalog- und dem Internet-Geschäft auch im stationären Einzelhandel aktiv und betreibt auf 25.000 qm Nordbayerns größtes Kaufhaus. Ein eigener Mode Blog unter http://www.modeblog-baur.de wurde Mitte 2009 ins Leben gerufen, welchem ein Möbel Blog, zu finden unter http://www.moebelblog-baur.de, im Frühjahr 2010 und ein Schuhe Blog unter http://www.schuheblog-baur.de kurze Zeit später folgten.
Im Distanzhandel konzentriert sich BAUR auf das Warenangebot Mode, Schuhe und Möbel. Bei der Auswahl der Produkte und Lieferanten zeigt die Gruppe gesellschaftliche Verantwortung und achtet auf Herkunft, Qualität und Umweltverträglichkeit. Der Umwelt- und Gesundheitsschutz ist unter anderem als Unternehmensziel definiert. So wird beispielsweise das Angebot an schadstoffgeprüften Textilien und FSC-zertifizierten Möbeln stetig erweitert und das betriebliche Umweltmanagement seit 2002 jährlich nach der Norm ISO 14001 zertifiziert.
Derzeit arbeiten für die BAUR Gruppe insgesamt 4.000 Mitarbeiter in Deutschland und Österreich, davon allein 2.800 im oberfränkischen Landkreis Lichtenfels.
Weitere Informationen zu BAUR finden Sie
im Internet unter http://www.baur.de/adventskalender

description.hltext_display: Neue Regelungen für Teilzeitbeschäftige durch die Gesundheitsreform
description.content:
(fair-NEWS) - Mitglied in der PKV auch in Teilzeit
Nach der endgültigen Zustimmung des Bundesrats zur Schwarz-Gelben Gesundheitsreform, wird es im kommenden Jahr für alle Versicherten im Gesundheitssystem zum Teil deutliche Veränderungen geben.
Die neue Sachlage für privat Versicherte in Teilzeit hat das Portal www.studisfy.com zusammengefasst.
Die neue Reform im Gesundheitsbereich enthält eine Reihe von Verbesserungen insbesondere für die Versicherten Mitglieder der privaten Krankenversicherung. So können privat Versicherte, die im Anschluss einer Elternzeit bzw. Pflegezeit, nicht mehr Vollzeit arbeiten und dadurch das Mindesteinkommen der Privaten Krankenversicherung nicht mehr erreichen, seit dem neuen Beschluss zur Gesundheitsreform, von der gesetzlichen Versicherungspflicht befreit werden und weiterhin in der privaten Krankenversicherung bleiben.
Das ist ein außerordentlicher Gewinn für Versicherte in der privaten Krankenversicherung. Früher mussten Versicherte der PKV, sobald sie hinsichtlich der Familie oder wegen der Pflege von einem Verwandten, welche nach der Elternzeit oder Pflegezeit anschließend in Teilzeit tätig waren und daher die Jahresarbeitsentgeltgrenze nicht erreichten, in die gesetzliche Gesundheitsabsicherung wechseln. Eine Abweichende Regelung gab es einzig für den Zeitraum der Elternzeit bzw. Pflegezeit. Dies gehört jetzt der Vergangenheit an. Das neue Gesetz gestattet eine Loslösung von der Pflicht zur Versicherung nach einer Elternzeit beziehungsweise nach der Pflegezeit für Teilzeitbeschäftigte.
Das Gesetz welches die neuen Regelungen beinhaltet wurde Mitte November von der Regierung entschieden und am 17. November 2010 hatte der Bundesrat zugestimmt.
Die Befreiung muss auf dem Wege einer Beantragungen stattfinden und ist gültig für Angestellte, die ihre Arbeitszeit im Rahmen Ihrer Tätigkeit, nach Beendigung einer Elternzeit bzw. Pflegezeit, halbieren oder kürzen, jedoch hochkalkuliert als Vollzeitbeschäftigte dennoch jenseits der Grenze des Mindesteinkommens für die PKV liegen würden. Zuvor muss die Voraussetzung erfüllt sein, dass das Jahresgehalt mindestens 5 Jahre über der Jahresarbeitsentgeltgrenze gelegen hat. Der Erhalt des Elterngeldes wird im Rahmen dessen mit kalkuliert. Die neue Regelung ist Verpflichtend für laufende und für zukünftige Beschäftigungsverhältnisse.
Der zeitliche Rahmen der Versicherungsfreiheit richtet sich nach dem zeitlichen Rahmen, in dem ein PKV-Mitglied vor Beginn der Versicherungsfreiheit aufgrund der Erreichung der Jahresarbeitsentgeltgrenze vorangeschritten ist. Zu dieser Dauer wird ferner der Zeitraum einbezogen, in welchem Elterngeld bezogen wurde.
Ob die Inanspruchnahme der neuen Regel Sinn macht, müssen die Versicherten der PKV aber selbst bewerten. Denn insbesondere nach Beendigung der Elternzeit wird sich die Situation für die Versicherten der PKV deutlich ändern. So müssen beispielsweise in jedem Falle Kinder versichert sein. Während Kinder innerhalb der gesetzlichen Krankenkasse mittels der Familienversicherung jedoch kostenlos mitversichert sind, müssen die Kinder im Rahmen der PKV einzeln kostenpflichtig abgesichert werden.

description.hltext_display: Talk Die große Rabattschlacht von Groupon & Co.
description.content:
Einkaufsclubs und Rabattanbieter boomen - zuletzt scheiterte Google mit einem Milliardengebot für Groupon. Jetzt versucht ein Silicon-Valley-Startup, den Prozess zu automatisieren.
Aaron Patzer blieb hartnäckig. Bei allen großen Silicon-Valley-Risikokapitalfirmen sprach der junge Unternehmer, der gerade sein Studium beendet hatte, vor. Fast alle fanden seine Idee von einer zentralen Web-Seite zum Verwalten von Konto- und Kreditkarteninformationen interessant. „Aber alle hatten Zweifel, ob Kunden wirklich die Zugangsinformationen zu ihrem Bankkonto einem unbekannten Startup anvertrauen würden“, erinnert sich Patzer.
Es war vor allem Patzers Ausdauer zu verdanken, dass er 2006 doch noch eine Million Dollar zum Start der Finanz-Web-Site Mint auftreiben konnte. Der Rest ist Geschichte: Millionen Amerikaner hatten keine Probleme damit, einem unbekannten Startup Zugang zu ihren finanziellen Informationen zu gewähren. Der Dienst war gratis und wesentlich einfacher zu bedienen als die Konkurrenz von der Softwarefirma Quicken. Damit der Wettbewerber nicht noch größer werden konnte, übernahm Quicken Mint im Herbst 2009 für 170 Millionen Dollar.
Der Silicon-Valley-Unternehmer Faisal Qureshi versucht nun ein ähnliches Kunststück. Es geht um sein Startup Offermatic: Wie bei Mint sollen die Nutzer wieder einmal einem unbekannten Startup Zugriff auf ihre Konto- und Kreditkarteninformationen geben. Offermatic wertet dann ihre Transaktionen aus, stellt fest, bei welchen Firmen sie oft einkaufen, und handelt dann Rabatte mit diesen Unternehmen aus. Offermatic-Kunden erhalten dann entweder ein bestimmtes Produkt zum Sonderpreis angeboten oder einen Rabatt für den nächsten Einkauf.
Prämien für Käufer sind in den USA an sich nichts Neues. Alle großen Kreditkartenanbieter offerieren die Rückerstattung von zwischen einem und fünf Prozent des Kaufpreises.
Der Kreditkartenanbieter Discover -beispielsweise erstattet allen Kunden, die über die Weihnachtszeit beim Computerhersteller Dell einkaufen, zehn Prozent der Kaufsumme. Doch für diese Offerten müssen sich Interessenten extra anmelden. Zudem sind viele der bislang bekannten Rabattaktionen nur für Einkäufe über das Internet gültig.
Offermatic ist das erste Internet-Startup, das diesen Prozess zu automatisieren versucht. Wenn das tatsächlich klappt, ist Qureshi ein gemachter Mann. Denn er könnte dann die Transaktionen von allen Kreditkartenanbietern gebündelt auswerten und für seine Kunden noch bessere Sonderrabatte mit Unternehmen vereinbaren.
Schlagworte zum Thema
Freiwillig ausspioniert
Rabattaktionen sind gerade ein Mega-Thema im Internet. Millionen Menschen nutzen Einkaufsclubs wie BuyVIP oder Brands4friends. Der prominenteste Vertreter und das am schnellsten wachsende Unternehmen dieser Gattung jedoch ist Groupon. Das erst 2008 gegründete Unternehmen verkauft Gutscheine für Sonderangebote aller Art, von der Massage bis hin zu einem Drei-Gänge-Menü. Die Idee ist derart erfolgreich, dass Google erst im Dezember ein Übernahmeangebot von mehr als drei Milliarden Dollar für das Unternehmen abgab. Groupon lehnte ab.
Abermillionen Menschen nutzen solche Dienste weltweit. Und Experten erwarten, dass Groupon & Co. im E-Commerce weiter an Einfluss gewinnen werden. Ihr Vorteil: Sie müssen die Gewohnheiten ihrer Kunden nicht ausspionieren, wie etwa Facebook und Google es tun, um anschließend passende Werbeangebote einspielen zu können. Die Kunden von Groupon und Offermatic verraten ihre Vorlieben freiwillig, in der Hoffnung auf Schnäppchen.
Das Geschäft ist eine nahezu sichere Sache. Problematisch könnte es nur werden, wenn die Unternehmen die Lust an den immer neuen Rabatten verlieren. Apple beispielsweise gibt nur in Ausnahmefällen Rabatte. Schon jetzt klagen Groupon-Kunden darüber, dass die Angebote weniger attraktiv seien.
Denn auch die großzügigsten Rabatte helfen nicht, wenn die offerierte Dienstleistung oder das Produkt nicht attraktiv sind.

description.hltext_display: 12.CONCRETE SEALING AND EPOXY FLOORING: MAKING SURFACES LOOK MODERN AND NEW
description.content: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Contact: Chris (Brisbane) 0413 888 450 Grant (Toowoomba) 0412 794 775 Tel.: 07 3379 9944 Website: http://www.cleanandcoat.com.au/ Do you want to have the best quality concrete sealers and epoxy flooring? What makes a good concrete sealer? A concrete sealer can make concrete stronger, reduce cracking and splitting, protect against pitting, crumbling, dusting, resist moisture absorbance that will damage and weaken concrete, stop efflorescence ("white powder") and musty odours. It also protects against salts, acids and stains, and prevents moulds and mildew from forming. Concrete sealers should be used on driveways, basement floors and any exposed concrete that you want to protect. Concrete sealers are needed for projects that require the material to be almost impenetrable, or to boost the value of a home with the type of stunning flooring that unsealed concrete cant provide. If you are an architect looking to protect a bridge deck, seal a concrete industrial warehouse floor; or a just a homeowner who wants that expensive designer decorative-concrete look for their driveway, sidewalk, path or garage floor, then you need a quality concrete sealer who knows what they are doing. A quality concrete sealer resurfaces concrete and other hard-surface based materials with a new look that is essentially solid, rather than porous. With unsealed concrete, after years of wear and tear, the naturally occurring porous holes become small cracks and begin to expand and spread across the surface of the concrete. An experienced concrete sealer will actually use products that also harden and extend the life of your concrete. Concrete sealing is done on patios, porches, steps, sidewalks, driveways, garages, indoor floors, unglazed tile, untreated brick, exposed aggregate and other concrete or masonry surfaces. The penetrating sealer is below the concrete surface so it will give a long life. The penetrating sealer is below the concrete surface so it will give a long life. Also, since the sealer penetrates deeply, UV rays cannot degrade a good quality concrete resurfacing. The best option for sealing outdoor surfaces is film-former sealers that have solvent-based acrylics. When is concrete sealing needed on the driveway or sidewalk?The way to check if your driveway or side walk requires any sealer is to put some water on it. If it soaks into the concrete instead of forming puddles, then you need to seal the concrete. A good concrete sealing is below the concrete surface so it will give concrete a long life. It increases the mass and surface hardness of the treated concrete thereby making it much more resistant to wear and damage. Concrete sealants can increase the strength, and the usefulness, and the longevity of your concrete work for years and years to come. Also, decorative resurfacing of your hard-surfaces (AKA Polished Concrete) can rapidly transform the image of your home from Aussie Brick to Greek Island Perfection or anything in-between adding tens of thousands of dollars to the look and market-value of your home in just a few hours.If you are in Brisbane, Toowoomba or anywhere is South-East Queensland, get in touch with Chris and Grant at Clean and Coat. They have been sealing concrete in Brisbane for 18 years. No one is more experienced or can give you better results. Clean And Coat can increase the strength, usefulness, and longevity of all your hard-surfaces and bring new life to an aged appearance. Clean And Coat are also South East Queenslands recognized authority on epoxy flooring. Epoxy flooring is done to increase the durability of your floors and give your floors a glossy, modern look that is easy to clean and maintain. Epoxy flooring (AKA Seamless Flooring) has a variety of home and commercial uses, it is great for bedrooms, living rooms, garages and workspaces whilst also being ideal for bathrooms because it makes the floor slip-resistant. Adding epoxy flooring also improves the look of your home or office. A modern and utilitarian look can easily be achieved with epoxy floors. For all enquiries, have no hesitation to contact Chris or Grant to know more about all these services and more. Phone them now to get an obligation-free quote on how to improve the value of your home and make your floors new again. Know more about and

description.hltext_display: Sewage stink empties parts of U.N.
description.content:
NEW YORK, Dec. 22 (UPI) -- U.N. officials said two areas of the organization's New York headquarters were evacuated due to a stink believed to have come from a sewer line.
U.N. spokesman Farhan Haq said diplomats were evacuated from the Security Council and General Assembly as a "precautionary measure" due to a "suspicious odor," the New York Post reported Tuesday.
Police said the odor is believed to have come from a burst sewer pipe in the facility's basement.
Among those evacuated were children from several countries brought to the U.N. Security Council to address world leaders during a ceremonial session.

description.hltext_display: Hang Seng Index gains 0.2pc at close (Business) (17 mins ago) Hong Kong stocks edged higher despite a reversal in mainland markets, although a year-end slowdown in trading activity kept turnover at its lowest in more than th...
description.content:
Hong Kong stocks edged higher despite a reversal in mainland markets, although a year-end slowdown in trading activity kept turnover at its lowest in more than three months.
The Hang Seng Index closed up 0.22 percent at 23,045.19.
The China Enterprises Index ended flat as mainland markets reversed course to close lower on the day.
Turnover was HK$54.2 billion.
Li Ka-shing's Cheung Kong (Holdings) (0001) was the biggest boost to the benchmark, rising 3.5 percent after the company said it planned to launch Hong Kong's first yuan-denominated IPO as early as next year.

description.hltext_display: Coro ofrecerá un concierto navideño
description.content:
Integrantes de la Iglesia de Jesucristo de los Santos de los Últimos Días celebrarán mañana la víspera de la Navidad con un programa musical, a partir de las 18 horas, en el Complejo Social de esta ciudad.
Anterior Siguiente
El evento se lleva a cabo desde hace 13 años, y pretende crear espacios de convivencia entre vecinos que se deleitan con melodías propias de la temporada.
Vinicio De León, de la citada iglesia, dijo que los músicos que integran el coro ejecutan instrumentos como piano, violín, viola, violonchelo y flauta transversal, y son dirigidos por los maestros Virginia Durini y Sergio Marroquín.

description.hltext_display: Dübel Drei Manager und Deutschlands bekanntester Arbeitsloser
description.content:
Deutschlands bekanntester Sozialfall wird von drei Managern umgarnt. Wie sich mit Arno Dübel Geld verdienen lässt.
Bild vergrößern Vergoldetes Lächeln: Jedes Foto kostet Geld. Dübel (rechts) und sein Ex-Medienmanager Lindemann Gerrit Meier für WirtschaftsWoche
Das Treffen mit Arno Dübel kostet 300 Euro. Plus Mehrwertsteuer, auf Rechnung und inklusive Fototermin. Aber dafür hat Deutschlands prominentester Arbeitsloser sich diesen Tag ganz frei gehalten. So hatte es sein Medienmanager versprochen.
Der Besucherin mit dem Notizblock bietet Dübel das bequeme grüne Sesselchen im Wohnzimmer an, dann verschwindet er kurz in der Küche, um schließlich Kekse und zart geblümte Tässchen zum Couchtisch zu balancieren. Den Assamtee hat Arno Dübel an diesem Tag schnell noch besorgt. Normalerweise trinkt er Kaffee. Doch schon vor dem Interview hatte er nachfragen lassen, was er dem Gast servieren dürfe. Er will ein guter Dienstleister sein. Schließlich haben die Leute gezahlt.
Schlagworte zum Thema
Casting für Skurriles
Um es gleich zu sagen: Die WirtschaftsWoche legt gemeinhin für Interviews kein Geld auf den Tisch. Aber so sind nun einmal die Regeln bei Arno Dübel. Und auch das gehört in diesem Fall zur Geschichte. Deutschlands bekanntester Arbeitsloser nimmt seinen Auftrag sehr genau. „Was soll ich denn sagen?“, wird er zu Beginn des Gesprächs fragen. „War es das, was Sie hören wollten?“, wird er sich am Ende verabschieden. Als die Wohnungstür ins Schloss fällt, bleibt das schale Gefühl, dass Arno Dübel etwas käuflich sein könnte.
Für Geld macht Arno Dübel viel. Und weil er derzeit etwas klamm ist, macht er sogar sehr viel. Dübel verdient an Interviews und Fernsehauftritten, er lässt T-Shirts mit dem Aufdruck „Ich krich vom Amt“ verkaufen und selbst eingesungene Songs im Internet vermarkten. Vielleicht wird es im Frühjahr sogar ein Dübel-Bier geben. Und man tritt ihm nicht zu nahe, wenn man vermutet, dass er sich das alles unmöglich allein ausgedacht haben kann. Hat er auch nicht. Inzwischen sind es sogar drei Manager, die von sich sagen, dass sie einen Vertrag mit Dübel haben. Die Herren sind sich nicht grün.
Von den 300 Euro für den Interviewtermin etwa gehen nur 100 Euro als Aufwandsentschädigung an Dübel. Den Rest kassiert sein Medienmanager Peter Lindemann. Ihre Geschäftsbeziehung währt 17 Jahre, ihre Freundschaft auch. Manchmal half Lindemann beim Briefwechsel mit dem Amt. Ein Honorar hätte er von einem Sozialfall nie verlangt, sagt er. Aber fast immer, wenn Dübel Journalisten traf, verdiente der Geschäftsmann mit – über eine Vermittlungsgebühr.
Im normalen Leben betreibt Peter Lindemann eine Casting-Agentur. „Ich suche interessante Fälle für Boulevard-Themen“, sagt er. Und niemand füllte diese Kategorie besser aus als Dübel. Er war bei Arabella zu Gast, bei Britt und bei Franklin. Und sein Leben gab einiges her: Er trat als Tier-Messie mit einem Zimmer voller Sittiche auf, als Kassenpatient mit Zahnarztphobie oder in seiner besten Rolle als -Sozialfall mit chronischer Arbeitsallergie.
Den größten Sprung in Sachen Medienpräsenz machte Dübel im Januar, kurz vor dem Hartz-IV-Urteil des Verfassungsgerichtes. Da saß er in der ARD bei Sandra Maischberger und erklärte, die Stütze sei gutes Geld. „Warum soll ich da arbeiten gehen?“ Da wäre er ja blöd. Auf das Gespräch mit der WirtschaftsWoche scheint er anders vorbereitet worden zu sein. Er wolle ja arbeiten, sagt er da. Aber er sei einfach zu krank. Lungenkrebs.
Seite 1 | 2 | 3weiterlesen

description.hltext_display: Country's diversity, multi-culturism must be preserved: Manmohan
description.content:
Noting that the country's diversity and multi-culturism have been nurtured through centuries, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh today said it is a major challenge to preserve them by pursuing the rich legacy of tolerance and brotherhood.
"It is a major challenge for all of us and especially for our intellectuals to ensure that the richness of our diversity and our multi-culturism are preserved and nourished," he said.
Speaking at a function organised by Indian Council of Philosophical Research (ICPR), Mr. Singh said it is the special responsibility of thinkers, intellectuals and philosophers to contribute to the rich legacy of tolerance and brotherhood that the country inherited.
Observing that the country was characterised by enormous diversity, multitude of languages and religions, the Prime Minister said, "We need to preserve this essential unity, this Indianness that has been strengthened and enriched by the various strands of thought that constitute the great Indian philosophical tradition?"
Describing philosophy as mother of all languages, the Prime Minister said it should be pursued not merely as a separate discipline like economics or political science but as a trans-disciplinary subject taught alone with other subjects.
"Again philosophy of law, education, history, politics and science need to be studied for consummate and all round preparation for our students enrolled in those respective fields," he said while expressing hope that ICPR will encourage efforts in that direction.
Mr. Singh felicitate noted philosophers D.P. Chattopadhyaya and Prof. Rajangam Balasubramanian with ICPR's silver jubilee award for distinguished lifetime achievement in philosophy.
Keywords: Manmohan Singh

Country's diversity, multi-culturism must be preserved: Manmohan Noting that the country's diversity and multi-culturism have been nurtured through centuries
It is a major challenge for all of us and especially for our intellectuals to ensure that the richness of our diversity and our multi-culturism are preserved and nourished

description.hltext_display: Mulroney says perimeter deal with U.S. good for Canada, no threat to sovereignty
description.content:
OTTAWA - Former prime minister Brian Mulroney says he believes a new security perimeter arrangement with the U.S. represents no threat to sovereignty but does offer a necessary insurance policy for the Canadian economy.
Mulroney, who negotiated the Free Trade Agreement with the United States, said Tuesday the heightened tension over security as a result of the 9-11 terrorist attacks threatens the free flow of goods across the border, putting at risk a key pillar of the economy.
"I think it's a good idea and I think it's getting closer," he said in an interview with The Canadian Press.
The free trade deal and the subsequent North American Free Trade Agreement that added Mexico to the liberalized trade zone was aimed at removing tariffs from a wide swath of goods exchanged between the three countries.
But none of the leaders who signed NAFTA could have predicted the impact a terrorist attack would have had on trade, Mulroney said.
Trade between Canada and the United States essentially came to a skidding halt after the Sept. 11 attacks and was slowed down considerably in the years that followed as skittish American officials sought to reinforce their borders.
"When we did the Canada-United States free trade agreement and then NAFTA, which has been the driving force of the Canadian economy for the last 15 or 20 years, what it didn't foresee was 9-11 and all the aftershocks of that, the tightening of the border and so on," Mulroney said.
A new perimeter agreement would largely serve to restore the situation to where it stood before 9-11, he said.
Reports have suggested Canada and the U.S. are getting closer to a broad agreement that would see the two countries increase co-operation on security, while seeking to expedite the free flow of commercial goods across the border.
Although the importance of Canada-U.S. trade has diminished somewhat since the recession, the American market still represents 70 per cent of all Canadian exports and Canada remains one of the United States' largest trading partners.
Bilateral trade between the two countries totals about $1.5 billion a day, down from close to $2 billion prior to the recession. About 300,000 people cross the border each day.
Trade Minister Peter Van Loan called the relationship by far the most important for Canada in a recent interview, adding that even a small increase in trade with the U.S. would represent a boon for the economy.
He blamed weak demand in the U.S. for imports for much of the recent decrease in south-bound exports, but added that the thickening border has not helped. It will become a greater impediment once the U.S. economy recovers and Americans start buying more Canadian made goods, including cars, parts, machinery and lumber, he added.
Although there is no agreement or details about what a perimeter deal would look like, concerns are already being raised by some civil society groups, unions and opposition parties about a possible deterioration of Canadian sovereignty.
Analysts say for the U.S. to sign on to easier passage of goods and people across the border, Canada would need to convince Washington it can keep security threats from entering Canada in the first place.
Mulroney said he expects concerns over sovereignty to accelerate if a deal is consummated, but added he is not worried that Canada will be any less independent.
"I've seen this movie before," he said.
"You are talking to a guy who was told in the House of Commons ... that all I wanted was to make Canada the 51st state. I was surrendering sovereignty, that we were going to lose our language, we were going to lose our regional development, we were going to lose our medicare, we were going to lose everything."
More than 20 years after the Canada-U.S. deal and 17 years after Mexico was brought into the arrangement with NAFTA, Mulroney says the worth of the agreements can no longer be seriously questioned.

description.hltext_display: How to choose a web design company
description.content: Web design and development is a complicated and significant process, although, these days there is a twisted, wicked perception of website design. A lot of businesses equate an attractive website to a purposeful and helpful website. The ignorance is harmful and can cause major problems to both business' reputation and revenues because there's more to websites than just meets the eye, which is why it is important to keep certain factors in mind while choosing a website design company. So, what are the most significant key factors to look for while choosing web design services? Some key markers of an adequate and reliable web development company are: 1. Choose a web site design company that offers you W3C validated websites. An attractive website is important but a website that is attractive and user friendly should be given more priority. It is very important for your website to fulfill the demands of both, the users and search engines. Choose a web designing company that is capable of Php and Joomla programming, script installation, script repair or managing all the front end and back end activities. 2. Do not just select a web development company based on the design of their own website, look at the websites they have created for their clients, analyze their portfolio and then determine whether the standard of design and development suits you. Do not take a chance if you did not like the websites they have created. 3. Once you have shortlisted few websites that suit both your budget and work standards, check for the feedbacks of customers. Look what other say about the selected companies, if these agencies list the testimonials then do some checking on the forums about the web design company and if possible contact the clients who gave their testimonials and take direct feedback about the companies to determine if the testimonials are valid. 4. Keep in mind that you get only what you pay for. The better the web design company, the higher it prices will be, though this is extremely important in today's online world. Your website is a public entity hence like all areas of any excellent organization representation and status are very, very important. Although the best thing about the web is that it provides you the choice to design your website as per your choice and creativity. All that matters is how your business is represented to the international online community.

description.hltext_display: IITians plan a tech conclave in Gujarat
description.content: In a bid to give a fillip to technological development in the state, the Government of Gujarat along with 400 strong Pan-IIT Gujarat Alumni Association will be organising 'IIT Conclave: Technology and Development in Gujarat' on January 11, 2011 as a part of the Vibrant Gujarat Global Investors' Summit (VGGIS) 2011.

description.hltext_display: 11.How To Help Preserver Water With Rain Barrels
description.content:
Public awareness has helped to spread the word and make people aware of environmental issues. Every day, more and more small steps to do their part to reduce waste and recycle all types of objects. Part of this process is the recycling and reuse of natural energies of the earth. A rain barrel can provide water for your garden and the car with the melting snow and rainfall. You cannot drink and probably will not be able to replace the current water supply, but you can collect rainwater and recycling at home in several ways.
Re-use of rainwater is an inexpensive way to wash your car, water gardens and many other things. Rainwater can be easily collected and stored for later use in your home during the summer or at any time of year. Although it may be safe for drinking is safe for plants and can save you money.
Some islands, and every home and condominium is a unique water reservoir to collect and store rainwater. Some of these islands, there is no fresh water lakes, rivers in the rainy season. Water stored in tanks like rain barrels under the building. Rainwater is not in itself sufficient to give the islands, so it is collected from groundwater sources, as well. Some islanders have never had water pumped into their homes. There are laws that protect people from sickness and disease, which can carry untreated water.
Rainwater has not been cleaned and can be particularly dangerous for children. There are many uses for rainwater stored in rain barrels, which has not been cleaned. While you will be able to use it as drinking and probably is not practical to establish a sewer system in which they are used on the island. You can make the difference between the water and sewer bills, depending on the amount of water to collect. If the area will be introduced rationing of water, still water the grass with rainwater.
Save time and builds up the rain barrel can keep water away from the homes foundation. Large containers of water are also some safety and maintenance, which should engage all the support. They are easy to install and safe to use in a few easy steps.

description.hltext_display: U.S. Census Bureau Daily Feature for December 22
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
WASHINGTON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Following is the daily "Profile America" feature from the U.S. Census Bureau:
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20090226/CENSUSLOGO)
Profile America - Wednesday, December 22nd. One of the world's most popular word games appeared for the first time this week in 1913, in the Sunday edition of the New York World. That's when the first crossword puzzle, created by journalist Arthur Wynne, was printed. His puzzle was diamond shaped and had no black squares. During the 1920s, other newspapers picked up the new pastime, and within a decade, crossword puzzles were a feature of almost every U.S. newspaper and began to assume their now familiar form. At the time Arthur Wynne's puzzle first appeared, about 29 million Americans read daily newspapers. Now, that figure is about 49 million on both weekdays and Sundays. You can find these and more facts about America from the U.S. Census Bureau, online at www.census.gov.
Sources: Kane's Famous First Facts, 4010
Historical Statistics of the United States: Colonial Times to 1970, p. 810
Statistical Abstract of the United States 2010, t. 1098
Profile America is produced by the Public Information Office of the U.S. Census Bureau. These daily features are available as produced segments, ready to air, on a monthly CD or on the Internet at http://www.census.gov (look for "Multimedia Gallery" by the "Newsroom" button).
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

Ob sich der Einstieg für Privatanleger dort lohnt, zeigt unsere Übersicht. Wir nennen jeweils das Herkunftsland des Staatsfonds mit dem größtem Anteil am jeweiligen Unternehmen sowie eine Einschätzung des Chance-Risiko-Verhältnisses für Aktionäre.

description.hltext_display: 10.Website of Details on Duvet Covers
description.content:
The launch of the website http://organicduvetcover.net can be treated as the one that addresses the need-of-the of hour, wherein; there is increased concern over using only those products that fully conform to eco-friendly norms. This trend encompasses all the spheres, with the one of manufacturing duvet covers being no exception to it. Even as you are reading all these contents, in all likelihood, you too are driven by the need to obtain duvet covers that, along with providing comfort, also successfully address the vital aspect of environmental preservation! Well, this new portal is going to ensure that you gain all the relevant knowledge about the diverse makes of duvet covers, here itself, without necessitating you to be seeking all this information from other online sources.
The site includes information that is nothing short of an education for its visitors. For, it (information) encompasses all the vital facets pertaining to duvet covers such as the various patterns that are available in contemporary markets and the purpose effectively addressed by these makes, among many others. description.hltext_display: Yeye warns of complacency
description.content: Kaizer Chiefs midfielder Reneilwe Letsholonyane has warned his teammates not to underestimate Black Aces. Amakhosi travel to the Puma Rugby Stadium to take on Neil Tovey's charges in their last PSL clash of 2010. Vladimir Vermezovic's troops will back themselves to overcome an Aces outfit who have failed to win in their last five fixtures, but Letsholonyane says Chiefs will take nothing for granted. He told the club's official website: "We experienced enough to know that any team who plays against Chiefs lifts their game and come out giving everything they have. "Aces might have been beaten by Amazulu over the weekend in my view that will only make them more determined to want to win against us, we are under no illusions and know exactly what we will have to do to win this game. "It is going to require another strong team effort from us to win this game." Aces will be minus the services of hotshot Mpho Maleka, who has netted six times this term, as he is sidelined through suspension. Aces players need to be watched However, Letsholonyane doesn't believe that this will hamper Aces' chances. "I have seen Mpho play a couple of times this season and he can be a troublesome player and defenders have found it hard keeping him quiet. "Obviously he is not playing, that won't really mean much to us. They have players who have worked around him who are just as creative and need just one chance to influence the outcome of the game. "One of their most recognised players might not be playing but there are still eleven Aces players we will need to keep under control." Amakhosi have some selection woes of their own with both Itumeleng Khune and Mandla Masango missing the tie through suspension. "It never ideal to be without players who have played regularly. "Through the season we have displayed that we have a strong squad at various times different players have been out. "We are fortunate in that we having a big squad of players and we have players who can fill in." -- www.football360.co.za

description.hltext_display: Compulsion Use of Mobile Application Development for Business Success
description.content: In present business atmosphere the manner in which you conduct your business is highly dependent on the level of mobile application development you do. The market of this mobile application is rising at a very faster pace. Invention of high-end smart phones like Blackberries and iPhones has altered the manner in which people used their mobile handsets.The concept of web 2.0 and web 3.0 has made internet more communicative in nature at professional as well as personal level. People have largely been surfing the internet through their mobile phones, thus the effectiveness of your website on such applications have large effect on a company and its business. Here comes the important role of mobile application development.For instance earlier banking was done at physical level or through internet, but now mobile banking has become equally popular and is used by busy professionals. It gives them access to all financial transactions in fraction of minutes without worrying about visiting a bank or getting access to a pc.Thus large numbers of websites are now making themselves mobile friendly which enable it to convert them into version suitable for mobiles. It has lead to increase in importance of mobile application development. So the site owners now have to make their portals properly optimized and decide how they would like their users to access the website.With more and more inventions been done in the field of technology, laptops and other devices are made are compact to suit the pocket size. This can very well be emphasized by thinking of iPad which is latest invention in this category.The concept of mobile application development targets towards development for handheld instruments like mobile phones, PDAs, enterprise digital assistants, etc. PDA is also known as ‘palmtop computer' which is used for managing of personal information, you can access internet through it. For data capturing EDA is used which is inspired by PDA.In mobile application development the applications are downloaded version of processes procured from various mobile software distribution stores. You can find them already installed in many smart phones or mobile phones too. Different applications like- business applications, healthcare applications, internet applications, entertainment applications and so on are held under mobile application development category.More and more website owners who wish to stay ahead of market competition and want to be available to their customers go for mobile application development. So can contact a good service provider who can make your website is accessible through mobile and smart phones.Copyright © 2010
