description.hltext_display: Sala da beneficio a Rodrigo Lainfiesta
description.content:
La Sala Primera de Apelaciones resolvió dictar una fianza de Q4 millones a favor de Rodrigo Lainfiesta, vinculado con el lavado de dinero de los fondos destinados para la construcción de la cárcel Fraijanes 2.
Anterior Siguiente
La decisión se tomó esta semana y se notificó ayer a todas las partes.
Según el criterio de la Sala, una de las razones por las que se le otorgó ese beneficio es que los delitos por los que se le inculpa son excarcelables y gozan de medida sustitutiva.
También se estipula que Lainfiesta debe presentarse a firmar cada 15 días y se le dicta prohibición de salir del país.
La Sala ordena a la jueza Verónica Galicia que emita una nueva resolución.
Esta decisión se originó después de que la defensa de Lainfiesta apeló un fallo de la jueza décima de Primera Instancia Penal en que le dictaba prisión preventiva.
Jorge Arévalo, abogado defensor de Lainfiesta, dijo que se sienten complacidos con la resolución. “Creo que la Sala hace lo correcto. Este caso no se debió haber ligado en la vía civil, pues es un contrato entre el Estado y un particular”, explicó.
Ahora se debe esperar que la resolución quede en firme y establecer si Lainfiesta tiene los fondos para pagar la fianza.
Fuentes consultadas en el Ministerio Público (MP) aseguraron que no comparten la resolución y que plantearán un amparo para evitar que Lainfiesta pueda salir de prisión, ya que se teme que obstaculice las pesquisas.
Proceso
Las pesquisas para dar con el paradero de Q17.4 millones destinados a la construcción de la cárcel Fraijanes 2 revelaron el traslado de fondos del Estado a por lo menos 15 empresas relacionadas con Lainfiesta y Juan Diego Lainfiesta Cajas.
El MP descubrió el modo de operar de las entidades de papel que orquestaron la defraudación al Estado mediante diversas obras, una de ellas la remodelación de la cárcel Fraijanes 2.
Los movimientos bancarios revelan que después de que se le entregó el dinero a Fundtech, esta lo trasladó a Serdiconstru, cuyos directivos emitieron varios cheques a favor de otras empresas vinculadas.
Finalmente, el dinero terminó en cuentas bancarias de los Lainfiesta.

description.hltext_display: Seulek ariketa militar gehiago egingo ditu bihar Ipar Koreatik gertu
description.content:
Gerra eta artilleria hegazkinek parte hartuko dute eta entrenamendu baterako inoiz erabili duten soldadu kopuru handiena zabalduko dute. Hego Koreako Armadak ariketa militar handiak egingo ditu bihar Gyeonggi probintzian, Ipar Koreako mugatik oso gertu, Yonhap Seuleko albiste-agentziak jakitera eman duenez.
Hego Koreak indar erakustaldia egin nahi du Pyongyangeko Gobernuaren aurrean, azaroaren 23an Ipar Koreak Yeongpyeong irlari eraso egin eta lau hegokorear hil ondoren sortutako tentsioaren erdian.
Ariketak Ipar Koreako mugatik 20 kilometrora izango dira eta horietan parte hartuko dute gerra eta artilleria hegazkinek eta entrenamendu baterako inoiz erabili duten soldadu kopuru handiena zabalduko dute.
Era berean, gaurtik ostiralera arte itsasoan ere ariketak egiten ari dira, bi Koreen arteko mugatik 100 bat kilometrora.
Hego Korea iragan astelehenean hasi zen ariketa militar polemikoak egiten Ipar Korearen mehatxupean. Izan ere, Pyongyangek esan zuen Seulek ariketa militarrak eginez gero erantzun egingo zuela, baina azkenean "probokazio militarrak" ez zuela erantzunik merezi erabaki zuen.
Errusiak eta Txinak ariketa militarrak bertan behera uzteko eskatu zioten Hego Koreako Gobernuari eta enbaxadore errusiarrak NBEren Segurtasun Kontseiluaren premiazko bilera deitu zuen, baina bileran ez zuten akordiorik lortu, kideen arteko desadostasun handiak medio.

description.hltext_display: Bucher: Trendwechsel
description.content:
Der bisherige kurzfristige Trend von Bucher wird nach oben durchbrochen werden. Die Prognose für Bucher für Mittwoch den 29. Dezember ist 142,30 Euro.
© 2010 HappyYuppie.de
Risikohinweis:
HappyYuppie.de bietet Vorhersagen von Kursentwicklungen von Aktien an, welche ausschließlich auf den Kursen dieser Wertpapiere in der Vergangenheit basieren. Diese Nachrichten basieren auf Prognosen, welche automatisch von einem Computerprogramm erstellt werden. Obwohl ein mathematische Modell ein nützliches Hilfsmittel sein kann, um zu versuchen, die Möglichkeit für zukünftige Preisentwicklungen mit Hilfe der vergangenen Performance zu bestimmen, so unterliegen solche Entwicklungen doch einer Vielzahl von verschiedenen Einflüssen. Daher sind zukünftige Kurse von Aktien nicht vorhersehbar. Die Zukunftsprognosen stellen somit keine Empfehlungen für den Kauf, ein Halten oder den Verkauf eines Wertpapiers dar und können sehr stark von einer Einschätzung auf Basis der Fundamentaldaten abweichen. Daher sollten alle Anlageentscheidungen nicht alleine von diesen Computer-Vorhersagen abhängig gemacht werden. Diese sollten vielmehr von verschiedenen anlage- und anlegerspezifischen Kriterien abhängen. Es kann keine Garantie für die Richtigkeit der gemachten Vorhersagen übernommen werden. Auch wenn das System in der Vergangenheit zuverlässige Prognosen gemacht haben sollte, gibt es keine Garantie für die Zuverlässigkeit dieser Angaben in der Zukunft.

description.hltext_display: Brad và Jolie sẽ kết hôn vào lễ tình nhân
description.content:
Cặp đôi vàng của Hollywood Angelina Jolie và Brad Pitt sẽ tổ chức kết hôn vào đúng ngày lễ tình nhân năm tới tại một ngôi đền ở Jodpur (Ấn Độ).
Đây là thông tin được thời báo Hindustan Times của Ấn Độ tiết lộ trong nhiều ngày qua. Theo tờ báo này, ngôi đền có tên Vigya Adhyatm Satsang Kendra nằm ở thành phố Jodhpur, bang Rajasthan, phía Tây Bắc Ấn Độ.
Cặp đôi vàng của Hollywood Angelina Jolie và Brad Pitt sẽ tổ chức kết hôn vào đúng ngày lễ tình nhân năm tới tại một ngôi đền ở Jodpur (Ấn Độ).
Đây là thông tin được thời báo Hindustan Times của Ấn Độ tiết lộ trong nhiều ngày qua. Theo tờ báo này, ngôi đền có tên Vigya Adhyatm Satsang Kendra nằm ở thành phố Jodhpur, bang Rajasthan, phía Tây Bắc Ấn Độ.
Một vài tờ tin tức khác của Ấn Độ cũng chạy dòng chữ nói rằng cặp đôi Brangelina đang có kế hoạch tổ chức đám cưới theo đạo Hindu đúng vào ngày 14/12 năm tới dưới sự chứng giám của linh mục riêng Ram Lal Siyag.
Các báo cũng tiết lộ thêm rằng Siyag đã đưa cho cặp đôi này một bài kinh để họ đọc mỗi buổi sáng và tối đồng thời khuyến khích họ tập các bài tập yoga Siddha. Theo những người giúp việc, việc này đã giúp mối quan hệ của cặp đôi Brangelina trở nên tốt đẹp hơn, ít tranh luận và cãi vã.
Tuy nhiên đến nay cặp đôi vàng của Hollywood vẫn chưa chính thức lên tiếng xác nhận thông tin này.
Trước đó nhiều cặp nghệ sĩ nổi tiếng khác như Katy Perry – Russaell Brand, Liz Hurley - Ảun Nayar cũng đã từng đến Ấn Độ để kết hôn.
Angelina Jolie 35 tuổi hiện là bà mẹ của 6 con (3 con nuôi). Trước khi cặp với Brad Pitt sau bộ phim đình đám Mr&Mrs. Smith vào năm 2005, Angelina đã trải qua 2 cuộc hôn nhân đổ vỡ với 2 vị đạo diễn nổi tiếng của Hollywood là Jonny Lee Milller và Billy Bob Thornton.
Còn Brad Pitt, 46 tuổi, đã ly dị nữ diễn viên Jennifer Aniston từ năm 2005.
Sự kết hợp giữa cặp đôi này nếu là sự thật trong năm tới thì có thể coi là sự kiện đình đám của làng giải trí thế giới. Thậm chí nhiều người còn dự đoán rằng nó có thể thu hút sự quan tâm mạnh mẽ hơn đám cưới của hoàng tử William và Kate.

description.hltext_display: 电子读物使小宝的童年世界更灿烂
description.content:
如今的信息时代，除了书籍还多了电子读物，如电视节目，各式碟片等音像制品应有尽有。电子读物与传统书籍相比，演绎更直接更形象更生动，是开发儿童智力有效教材。女儿和女婿为开发小宝的智力前后买了许多儿童碟片。早期小宝最爱看《天线宝宝》，前期最爱看《猫捉老鼠》这些动画片开拓了小宝的视野同时也丰富了小宝的语言能力，大约在小宝20个月左右，某一天她在说话中突然吐出“然后”这个词。我好奇怪。原来她是从动画片里学来的。少儿节目《画神仙》是小宝每天必看的电视节目，“画神仙”每天教小朋友画画，引导小宝对画画有了兴趣。于是家中的墙壁成了她画画的地方。凡是她能画到的地方都给她涂鸦了。我们也不阻止她，并送她去兴趣班去学习画画，现在她画画已有很大进步。
电视少儿节目有一档《艺术创想》小宝看了后学样把五颜六色的衣服都摊在地上。别看小宝人小想象能力可丰富了，这大多得益于各种电子读物。
当然任何事物都有两面性，电子读物也是把双刃剑，如果电子读物看多了，可能对孩子的视力有影响，所以一定要注意这个“度”

description.hltext_display: Clarus Poll: 2012 Presidential Race
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Clarus Poll
85% Say Nation In Decline, 48% Want Nonpartisan President; What GOP Voters Want In A Nominee
WASHINGTON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- In a year-end nationwide poll conducted by the nonpartisan Clarus Research Group assessing the mood of the country and the next presidential election, a whopping 85 percent of voters say they agree with the statement, "In many ways America is in decline and we need strong, competent leadership to get us back on track."
Nearly half of all voters -- 48 percent -- also say it would be a good idea to elect a "nonpartisan" President who is neither a Democrat nor a Republican.
"You'd expect independent voters to want an independent President. But more than two out of every five Democrats and Republicans also say electing a nonpartisan President is a good idea," said Ron Faucheux, president of Clarus Research Group. "There is clearly potential for an independent candidate to do quite well in 2012."
Looking at 2012 match-ups, the Clarus Poll found that President Obama is leading 3-way races against GOP possibilities Romney and Palin with Michael Bloomberg running as an independent. Bloomberg does much better when Palin is the Republican candidate. Among GOP voters, former Massachusetts Gov. Mitt Romney, former Arkansas Mike Huckabee and former Alaska Gov. Sarah Palin are the leading presidential contenders.
The poll was conducted by Clarus Research Group, a nonpartisan firm based in Washington, D.C. It was not paid for or sponsored by any client, candidate or political party.
The survey was conducted by live telephone interviews December 10-16, 2010 with a sample of 1,000 self-identified registered. It has a margin of error of +/- 3.1 percent. The sample of Republican voters polled was 365, with a margin of error +/- 5.1 percent. Results reported in this release include all questions asked that related to the 2012 presidential race.
Key findings from the Clarus Poll:
AMERICA IN DECLINE: 85 percent said they agreed with the statement, "In many ways America is in decline and we need strong, competent leadership to get us back on track." Though heavy majorities across the political spectrum agreed with the statement, Republicans (93 percent) were more likely to agree than Democrats (82 percent).
"The public mood is bigger than the sum of its parts," said Faucheux, president of Clarus Research Group. "Regardless of how voters feel about specific issues or personalities, there is a shared sense that the nation is in decline and needs strong, competent leadership to get it back on track. Large majorities of Republicans, Democrats and independents agree with this sentiment."
OBAMA-ROMNEY-BLOOMBERG TRIAL HEAT: In a three-way presidential race with Mitt Romney as the GOP candidate, President Obama posts a small 3-point lead over Romney, 39-36 percent. Running as an independent, Michael Bloomberg captures 13 percent of the vote with 12 percent undecided. "Twenty-percent of independents, 11 percent of Republicans and 8 percent of Democrats support Bloomberg, who does best in the Northeast where he gets 17 percent of the vote."
OBAMA-PALIN-BLOOMBERG TRIAL HEAT: In a three-way presidential race with Sarah Palin as the GOP candidate, Obama has an 11-point lead over Palin, 42-31 percent. Running as an independent, Bloomberg captures 18 percent of the vote with 9 percent undecided.
"In a three-way race with Palin as the Republican nominee, the GOP loses major support to an independent alternative," said Faucheux. "Against Obama and Palin, Bloomberg gets 24 percent of Republicans, 10 percent of Democrats, and 22 percent of independents."
The best showing made by an independent candidate in modern times was 1992, when Ross Perot captured nearly 19 percent of the vote.
REPUBLICAN PRESIDENTIAL NOMINATION: Current preference among Republican voters:
Mitt Romney
Mike Huckabee
Sarah Palin
Newt Gingrich
Chris Christie
Marco Rubio
Ron Paul
Bobby Jindal
Tim Pawlenty
Haley Barbour
John Thune
Mitch Daniels
"Romney, Huckabee, and Palin are the early top tier candidates," said Faucheux, "but the other possible candidates capture a total of 41 percent of the vote, indicating that this race is wide open."
"In addition to the top three, Gingrich shows substantial strength and Christie does very well given his limited nationwide recognition. Though other candidates are generally not well known now, there is plenty of room for one or more of them to emerge as major contenders," said Faucheux. "Of course, all 12 of the names we tested are not likely to run. As the field develops and the campaign gets underway, expect to see numbers change."
WHAT REPUBLICANS WANT IN A PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE: Republicans prefer a presidential candidate who:
has management experience as a governor (65 percent) over someone with legislative experience in Congress (15 percent)––10 percent volunteered that a candidate should have both.
has experience in private business (53 percent) over someone with experience in government (28 percent)––11 percent volunteered that a candidate should have both.
is known for being intelligent and competent (49 percent) over someone who is known for clear and consistent philosophical principles (37 percent)––10 percent volunteered that a candidate should have both.
is a moderate, pragmatic conservative with a good chance to beat Obama (61 percent) over someone who is a staunch, outspoken conservative who has only a fair chance of beating Obama (29 percent).
CANDIDATE YOUTH: Twenty-percent of Republicans said "early 40s" is too young to be President while 76 percent said it is not too young. Two potential prospects for the GOP presidential or vice presidential nominations will be 41 in 2012, Marco Rubio and Bobby Jindal.
OBAMA VS. BILL CLINTON: Among all voters, 45 percent said they'd rather have former President Clinton in the White House while 29 percent said they'd rather have Obama. Twenty-six percent were undecided. Obama carried Democrats 48-40 percent in this hypothetical match-up. But Clinton carried independents 45-21 percent and Republicans 49-15 percent.
OBAMA VS. GEORGE W. BUSH: Among all voters, 48 percent said they'd prefer Obama be President and 44 percent said they'd prefer Bush. Eight percent were undecided. Obama carried Democrats 89-7 percent and independents 40-34 percent, but Bush carried Republicans 85-10 percent.
QUESTIONS ASKED IN NATIONWIDE CLARUS POLL:
I am now going to read to you a couple of statements about government and politics… please tell me whether you agree or disagree with each one––
DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER
In many ways, America is in decline and we need strong, competent leadership to get us back on track
It would be good for the country to elect a nonpartisan President who is neither a Democrat nor a Republican
Turning to the 2012 election for a moment…
What if the candidates for President in the next election were (ROTATE NAME ORDER) Barack Obama, the Democrat, Mitt Romney, the Republican, and Michael Bloomberg, the independent…which one would you most likely vote for?
1. Obama 39%
2. Romney 36%
3. Bloomberg 13%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) Undecided/don't know 12%
What if the candidates for President were (ROTATE NAME ORDER) Barack Obama, the Democrat, Sarah Palin, the Republican, and Michael Bloomberg, the independent…which one would you most likely vote for?
1. Obama 42%
2. Palin 31%
3. Bloomberg 18%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) Undecided/don't know 9%
Because of term limits, Bill Clinton cannot run for President again. But, just suppose for a moment, that he could run again––in that case, would you prefer (ROTATE NAME ORDER) Barack Obama or Bill Clinton to be elected President?
1. Obama 29%
2. Clinton 45%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Undecided/don't know 26%
Even though the President before Obama––George W. Bush––also cannot run for president again because of term limits, just suppose for a moment that he could run again––in that case, would you prefer (ROTATE NAME ORDER) Barack Obama or George W. Bush to be elected President?
1. Obama 48%
2. Bush 44%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Undecided/don't know 8%
THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS WERE ASKED ONLY OF REPUBLICANS...
As you may know, there are a number of Republicans who are considering running for president in 2012. Please tell me which ONE of the following would you most likely vote for if the presidential primary were held today… (ROTATE NAME ORDER) Mitt Romney, Sarah Palin, Mike Huckabee, Newt Gingrich, Chris Christie, John Thune, Haley Barbour, Tim Pawlenty, Ron Paul, Bobby Jindal, Marco Rubio, or Mitch Daniels…
Mitt Romney
Mike Huckabee
Sarah Palin
Newt Gingrich
Chris Christie
Marco Rubio
Ron Paul
Bobby Jindal
Tim Pawlenty
Haley Barbour
John Thune
Mitch Daniels
Thinking more about the 2012 election…
Would you prefer the next Republican presidential candidate be someone with legislative experience in Congress …or… someone with management experience as a governor?
1. Legislative experience/Congress 15%
2. Management experience/governor 65%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Should have both 10%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) Neither 3%
5. (VOLUNTEERED) DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER 7%
If you had to pick between the two––would you prefer the next Republican presidential candidate be someone with experience in government …or… someone with experience in private business?
1. Experience in government 28%
2. Experience in private business 53%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Should have both 11%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) Neither 2%
5. (VOLUNTEERED) DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER 6%
If you had to pick between the two––would you prefer the next Republican presidential candidate be someone known for clear and consistent philosophical principles …or… someone known to be intelligent and competent?
1. Someone with clear and consistent philosophical principles 37%
2. Someone who is intelligent and competent 49%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Should have both 10%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) Neither 1%
5. (VOLUNTEERED) DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER 4%
If you had to pick between the two––would you prefer the next Republican presidential candidate be a moderate conservative who has a good chance of beating Barack Obama …or… someone who is an outspoken conservative who has only a fair chance of beating Barack Obama?
1. A moderate, pragmatic conservative 61%
2. A staunch, outspoken conservative 29%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) Should have both 4%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER 5%
Do you think someone in his or her early 40s is too young to be President?
1. Yes 20%
2. No 76%
3. (VOLUNTEERED) DEPENDS 3%
4. (VOLUNTEERED) DON'T KNOW/NO ANSWER 1%

description.hltext_display: Katar & Co. Staatsfonds auf Einkaufstour
description.content:
Nachdem die Milliarden-Fonds mit Bank-Investments viel Geld verloren haben, kaufen sie wieder Industrieunternehmen – wie Hochtief und Areva. Wo sie investieren, was Anleger ihnen nachmachen können.
Bild vergrößern Blick auf Doha, die Hauptstadt von Katar. Der Staatsfonds von Katar tauscht Ölgelder in Aktien von Hochtief, VW, Porsche und Londoner Börse REUTERS
Es sind keine schlechten Zeiten für die Beziehungen zwischen Deutschland und den Emiraten am Persischen Golf. Erst holt Sebastian Vettel auf der Wüstenrennstrecke von Abu Dhabi die Formel-1-Weltmeisterschaft, dann schwingt sich Katar zum Retter von Hochtief auf: Das Emirat kauft sich über seinen Staatsfonds mit 9,1 Prozent der Aktien beim Baukonzern Hochtief ein, der von der spanischen ACS-Gruppe bedrängt wird. Und Katar will nachlegen. Am vergangenen Donnerstag traf sich Katars Finanzminister Yousef Hussain Kamal mit Bundeswirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle (FDP). Das Emirat soll nun auch ein Auge auf Unternehmen im deutschen Mittelstand und die IT-Branche geworfen haben. Brüderle habe vorgeschlagen, gemeinsam spezielle Bereiche auszumachen, hieß es nach dem Treffen.
Die Staatsfonds der Scheichs sind auch herzlich dazu eingeladen, den Euro zu retten: Sie sollen die europäischen Anleihen kaufen, mit denen der Euro-Rettungsfonds EFSF Kredite für Irland finanziert. EFSF-Chef Klaus Regling jedenfalls berichtete gerade, Staatsfonds seien „sehr interessiert" an seiner ersten, fünf Milliarden Euro schweren Anleihe, die im Januar kommen soll. Kamal stellte ein Engagement in den angeschlagenen Euro-Ländern Irland und Portugal in Aussicht. "Wir haben etwas in der Pipeline, aber es ist noch nicht spruchreif", so der Katarische Finanzminister vergangene Woche.
Ob die Araber die Euro-Rettungsanleihe wirklich kaufen werden, ist unklar. Das Investment bei Hochtief passt besser in die Strategie der großen Staatsfonds. Nach milliardenschweren Missgriffen mit Finanzkrisen-Engagements bei Banken kaufen sich die Staatsfondsmanager inzwischen wieder lieber in der Realwirtschaft ein.
„Der Finanzsektor, der vor der Krise ein starkes Übergewicht hatte, ist kein wesentliches Thema mehr“, sagt Steffen Kern, Spezialist für Staatsfonds bei der Deutschen Bank in Frankfurt: „Vielmehr versuchen die Staatsfonds im Aktienbereich über alle Branchen hinweg ausgewogen zu investieren. Rohstoffe, High-Tech und Infrastruktur sind besonders beliebt.“
Staatsfonds (Sovereign Wealth Funds, kurz SWF), in denen Staaten ihre Einnahmen aus dem Ölgeschäft oder Rücklagen für Pensionen von Staatsbediensteten bunkern, steigerten ihr Vermögen seit Beginn der Finanzkrise von September 2007 bis September 2010 von 3190 auf 3938 Milliarden Dollar. Damit zählen sie zu den großen Spielern im weltweiten Börsen-Poker, nach Versicherern, Investmentfonds für Privat- und Großanleger und Pensionsfonds, die vier bis sechs Mal so viel Geld managen.
Bild vergrößern Wie viel Kapital Staatsfonds seit 1995 investierten, wo sie ihr Geld anlegen, welche Branchen sie bevorzugen (Klicken Sie auf die Grafik für eine vergrößerte Ansicht)
Viele Staatsfonds haben noch keine zehn Jahre auf dem Buckel. Die fehlende Erfahrung hatte in den vergangenen Jahren zu Fehlinvestments geführt. Inzwischen „stellen sie professionelle Fondsmanager ein, um ihr Portfolio noch besser zu managen“, sagt Deutsche-Bank-Experte Kern. Die versuchen jetzt, Fehler der Vergangenheit nicht zu wiederholen, und erzielen neue Erfolge.
Anleger, die beobachten, wie die Manager der Staatsfonds ticken, wie sie investieren und welchen Einfluss sie auf die Börse haben, gewinnen wertvolle Hinweise für ihre eigene Anlagestrategie.
Viel Geld zu verteilen
Staatsfonds sind gern gesehene Ankeraktionäre, weil sie lange bei der Stange bleiben und sich nur einmischen, wenn Vorstände wirklich kapitale Fehler machen. Westliche Regierungen lieben sie auch dafür, dass sie ihnen ihre Staatsanleihen abkaufen. Um politischen Ärger zu vermeiden, halten sich die Investoren aus sensiblen Bereichen wie Energieversorgung, Häfen und Rüstung lieber heraus. Großinvestoren aus den Ölstaaten kaufen vor allem Industrieunternehmen, China investiert bevorzugt in Rohstoffe.
Für Hochtief-Aktionäre etwa zahlt sich das Engagement von Katar schon jetzt aus. Der Kurs sprang binnen zwei Tagen nach Bekanntgabe des Einstiegs um zwölf Prozent. Vorteil: Hochtief-Anteilseigner müssen nicht befürchten, dass ihnen die Politik noch einen Strich durch die Rechnung machen wird und Katar abzuwehren versucht. Bundeswirtschaftsminister Brüderle etwa begrüßt den Einstieg: „Wir haben goldrichtig damit gelegen, dass sich der Staat auch bei Hochtief zurückgehalten und nicht eingemischt hat.“ Konflikte auf politischer Ebene wollen Staatsfonds möglichst vermeiden. Sie investieren deshalb gern als Retter in der Not: in der Finanzkrise in strauchelnde US-Banken, aktuell in Hochtief, die einen Verbündeten im Kampf gegen ACS suchen. Tabu sind Unternehmen, in denen Politiker mitfingern, zum Beispiel Energieversorger. Deutsche Kraftwerke in arabischer oder chinesischer Hand wären für Politiker ein Albtraum.
Private Anleger fahren ebenfalls besser, wenn sie in Unternehmen investieren, die möglichst geringem politischem Einfluss unterliegen. Im Dax etwa liegt die Kursentwicklung von Aktien wie BASF, BMW oder Linde weit vor derjenigen politisch dominierter Versorger und teilstaatlicher Konzerne wie Deutscher Telekom, Deutscher Post oder Commerzbank.
Schlagworte zum Thema
Sensible Ziele sind tabu
Die Staatsfonds selbst wissen spätestens seit dem Jahr 2006, dass sensible Ziele politischen Ärger bringen können. Damals übernahm Dubai Ports World, eine Staatsgesellschaft der Vereinigten Arabischen Emirate, die britische P&O. Die betrieb unter anderem wichtige US-Seehäfen. Die Vorstellung, dass ausgerechnet Araber für die Kontrolle der ins Land kommenden Container zuständig sein könnten, brachte die Politiker in Washington auf die Barrikaden. Kritische Investitionen ausländischer Gesellschaften in den USA werden dort vom Committee on Foreign Investments unter die Lupe genommen, das ein Urteil darüber abgibt, ob ein Investment die nationale Sicherheit gefährdet oder gegen Anti-Trust-Gesetze verstößt. Obwohl sich 2006 sogar der damalige US-Präsident George W. Bush vehement für die Araber einsetzte, musste P&O letztendlich die Beteiligungen an US-Häfen abgeben.
Keine Vorbehalte hatten die Amerikaner gegen Geldspritzen der SWF, als mitten in der Finanzkrise große US-Banken verzweifelt nach frischem Kapital lechzten. Insbesondere die Früheinsteiger unter den Staatsfonds haben sich mit diesen Investments die Finger verbrannt. Die Singapurer Temasek etwa beteiligte sich im Dezember 2007 an der Investmentbank Merrill Lynch. Nach einem Jahr stieg Temasek aus – und verlor laut „Wall Street Journal“ rund 4,6 Milliarden Dollar. Auch die chinesische China Investment Corporation (CIC) musste mit ihrem ursprünglich 5,6 Milliarden Dollar starken Investment in Morgan Stanley 900 Millionen Dollar Lehrgeld zahlen. Der Fonds Government of Singapore Investment Corporation (GIC) stieg mitten in der Finanzkrise bei der angeschlagenen Schweizer UBS ein. Das Investment von elf Milliarden Schweizer Franken (8,3 Milliarden Euro) liegt derzeit mit 5,6 Milliarden Franken in den Miesen, nachdem die größte Schweizer Bank nur noch ein Drittel des Einstandspreises wert ist.
Seite 1 | 2 | 3weiterlesen

description.hltext_display: Tågproblem i Västsverige
description.author: Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content:
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet, med -36 grader i Idre, är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt i dag.
SMHI har utfärdat en klass 1-varning för att omkring en decimeter snö kan komma fram i Hälsingland under morgonen och förmiddagen.
Trafikverket har satt in extra resurser för att gårdagens snöproblem ska undvikas i dag. Trots det väntas kraftiga förseningar i Västsverige. På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna Halmstad-Göteborg och Halmstad-Malmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.
Även på sträckan Charlottenberg-Laxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.
Ett 20-tal tåg i Mälardalen kommer att ersättas av buss och en del passagerare har blivit ombokade till andra avgångar.
Flygtrafiken till och från London ska återupptas i nära nog normal omfattning i dag.
Situationen i London är fortfarande kaosartad, SAS har närmare 6 000 svenskar strandade där.
För att få hem så många som möjligt planerar SAS att byta till större flygplan.
SAS har kallat in extra personal för att svara på frågor och sköta ombokningar för alla de som drabbats, men väntetiderna har varit mycket långa.
Snöröjningen på Londonflygplatsen Heathrow har fått mycket hård kritik.
När det gäller Paris, Amsterdam och Frankfurt är man i stort sett i kapp med strandade passagerare eftersom trafiken har kunnat upprätthållas, om än med förseningar och inställda flyg.

description.hltext_display: “天时人事日相催，冬至阳生春又来”——冬至节诗话
description.content:
——冬至节诗话
“天时人事日相催，冬至阳生春又来。” 这两句诗，是唐代著名诗人杜甫所写的《小至》诗中的诗句。杜甫所写的《小至》全诗是：
小 至
（唐）杜甫
天时人事日相催，冬至阳生春又来。
刺绣五纹添弱线，吹葭六管动飞灰。
岸容待腊将舒柳，山意冲寒欲放梅。
云物不殊乡国异，教儿且覆掌中杯。
这首诗，是诗人大历元年(公元766年)在夔州写的。那个时候，杜甫生活比较安定，心情也比较舒畅。《小至》是写冬至前后的时令变化，不仅用刺绣添线写出了白昼增长，还用河边柳树即将泛绿，山上梅花冲寒欲放，生动地写出了冬天里孕育着春天的景象。诗的末二句，是写他由眼前景物唤起了对故乡的回忆。虽然他身处异乡，但云物不殊。所以，诗人就教儿斟酒，举杯痛饮。这举动，和诗中所写冬天里孕育着春天气氛的基调，都完全是一致的。它反映出了诗人难得的舒适心情。
由于冬至特定的节气和自然环境，诗人墨客们都会感叹时光与人生，感叹岁末与寒冬，讴歌冬至节。诗圣杜甫《小至》诗中的“小至”，是指冬至日的第二天。全诗紧紧围绕“小至”的时令，叙事、写景、抒感，充满着浓厚的生活情趣，切而不泛。开篇二句：“天时人事日相催，冬至阳生春又来”，是说冬至后白昼渐长，阳气渐舒，冬至既到，春天也就不远了。作者以咏叹笔调点明“阳生春来”与冬至的诗题紧扣，作为总起。中间两联：“刺绣五纹添弱线，吹葭六管动飞灰。岸容待腊将舒柳，山意冲寒欲放梅”，是分承：颔联，直承首联“冬至”的自然节令特征；颈联，直承冬去春来的景物特征；最后是尾联：“云物不殊乡国异，教儿且覆掌中杯”，它以抒情作结。在这无可奈何的情景下，就让儿子取酒来尽饮吧！“事”、“景”、“感”三者烘托，我们从中可自然地悟出诗人写的只能是“小至”时令，而断非其他什么节候，这正是诗人感受敏锐，立意高远，选材典型，热爱生活的不俗体现，正是：“莫思身外无穷事，且尽生前有限杯”了。
冬至，是我国农历中一个非常重要的节气，也是一个传统节日。冬至，俗称为：“冬节”、“长至节”、“亚岁”等。早在二千五百多年前的春秋时代，我国已经用土圭观测太阳测定出冬至来了。它是二十四节气中，最早制订出的一个。时间是在每年的阳历12月22日或23日之间。时光流逝，岁月催人，转眼之间，冬至又到了。2010年的冬至，为12月22日星期三。
在我国古代对冬至很重视，冬至被当作一个较大节日，曾有“冬至大如年”的说法，而且有庆贺冬至的习俗。《汉书》中说：“冬至阳气起，君道长，故贺。”人们认为：过了冬至，白昼一天比一天长，阳气回升，是一个节气循环的开始，也是一个吉日，应该庆贺。《晋书》上记载有“魏晋冬至日受万国及百僚称贺……其仪亚于正旦。”说明古代对冬至日的重视。
现在，一些地方还把冬至，作为一个节日来过。北方地区，有冬至宰羊、吃饺子、吃馄饨的习俗。南方地区，在这一天，就有吃冬至米团、冬至长线面的习惯。各个地区，在冬至这一天，还有祭天祭祖的习俗。
对于过冬至节，在我国还有着许多民间的各种传说。
冬至传说之一
过去，老北京有“冬至馄饨夏至面”的说法。相传汉朝时，北方匈奴经常骚扰边疆，百姓不得安宁。当时，在匈奴部落中，有浑氏和屯氏两个首领，十分凶残。百姓对他们恨之入骨。于是，就用肉馅包成角儿，取“浑”与“屯”之音，呼作：“馄饨”。恨以食之，并求平息战乱，能过上太平日子。因为最初制成的馄饨，是在冬至这一天。所以，以后就在冬至这一天，家家户户就有了吃馄饨的习俗。
吃“捏冻耳朵”，是冬至河南人吃饺子的俗称。为什么河南人有这种食俗呢？相传南阳医圣张仲景，曾在长沙为官。在他告老还乡那时，正逢到大雪纷飞的冬天，寒风刺骨。他看见南阳白河两岸的乡亲，个个都衣不遮体。还有不少人的耳朵，已被冻烂了。他看到了这个情景，心里非常难过。于是，他就叫他的弟子，在南阳关东搭起了医棚，并用羊肉、辣椒和一些驱寒药材，放在锅里煮熟，捞出来剁碎，用面皮包成像耳朵的样子，再放下锅里煮熟，做成一种叫“驱寒矫耳汤”的药物，施舍给老百姓们吃。乡亲们服食以后，他们的耳朵都给治好了。后来，每逢冬至，人们便模仿做着吃。所以，河南人就形成了“捏冻耳朵”这种习俗。这样，以后人们就称它为：“饺子。也有的人，称它为“扁食”和“烫面饺”。人们还纷纷传说，吃了冬至的饺子不冻人。
冬至传说之二
冬至吃狗肉的习俗，据说是从汉代开始的。相传，汉高祖刘邦，在冬至这一天，吃了樊哙煮的狗肉，觉得味道特别鲜美，赞不绝口。从此，在民间也就形成了冬至吃狗肉的习俗。现在的人们，纷纷在冬至这一天，吃狗肉、羊肉以及各种滋补食品，以求来年有一个好兆头。
冬至传说之三
在江南水乡，有在冬至之夜，全家欢聚一堂，共吃赤豆糯米饭的习俗。相传，有一位叫共工氏的人，他的儿子不成才，作恶多端，死于冬至这一天。死后就变成了疫鬼，继续残害百姓。但是，这个疫鬼，生性最怕赤豆。于是，人们就在冬至这一天，煮吃赤豆饭，用以驱避疫鬼，防灾祛病。
冬至经过数千年的发展，已经在我国民间形成了独特的节令食文化。比如馄饨、饺子、汤圆、赤豆粥、黍米糕等，都可作为年节食品。曾经比较时兴的“冬至亚岁宴”的名目也很多，如吃冬至肉、献冬至盘、供冬至团、馄饨拜冬等。如今，我国各地的风俗民情，虽然各有差别，但是冬至的过法，大致是相同的。
（2010年12月20日）
冬 至-1
中国传统节日——冬至-2
旧俗冬至节吴地小辈要到长辈处“拜冬”。（资料图）-3
冬至吃饺子-4
上饺子喽，呵呵！-5
自己动手，大家不要客气！-6
晕倒，饺子也可以这样包-7

description.hltext_display: 9.Portal Highlights Various Designs of Quilts
description.content:
The word Quilt is nothing but just a synonym for the term bedspread. Bedspreads that have designs in the patterns of different forms of wedding rings are named as wedding ring quilts, and in fact, they are highly popular as items gifted to the couple, on the day of wedding.
The very fact that you are now beginning to read this content, emphasizes that, indeed, you are on a lookout for the diverse patterns of quilts! And after you finish reading the entire contents of this write-up, you yourself would strongly opine that there is just one option for all the seekers of varied designs of quilts entering the website http://weddingringquilt.org!
Yes! This website has been designed and developed to provide detailed information about both the wedding ring quilts and also the quilt wall hangings! The information therein also encompasses links that lead you to other online locations, where even more vital details become accessible by you, with not the least among them being locations of various outlets that sell diverse makes of quilts, the most lucrative deals offered, to name a few. As a matter of fact, one particular link takes you to a site where elaboration on numerous attractive models of wedding rings is present! And if the wedding of yours or someone close to you is round the corner, then, accessing this link on wedding rings is tantamount to the best thing that can be done by you, in relation to the oncoming happy event! description.hltext_display: KISIA "내년 보안인력 양성에 집중한다"
description.content:
지석정보보안산업협회(회장 이득춘, 이하 KISIA)가 2011년의 주요 사업계획은 '회원사 해외 사업지원'과 '정보보안인력양성'이라고 밝혔다.
이득춘 회장은 22일 강남에서 가진 기자 간담회를 통해 이같이 밝히고, 분야별 세부계획을 설명했다.
먼저 회원사 해외사업 지원을 위해 지경부와 협의해 내년도 해외 지원 예산을 올해 대비 3배이상 늘릴 예정이다. 현재 일본과 동남아 중심의 진출시장을 차후 중동·남미·유럽시장까지 확대할 방침이다.
이와함께 정보보안 신생기업부터 중견기업까지 회원사 규모와 실적에 따라 맞춤형 지원을 펼칠 계획이라고 밝혔다.
해외진출 초년기업은 해외시장에서의 홍보, 마케팅, 전시회 참여 등 전반적인 인지도 향상을 지원할 방침이고, 해외에 진출한 기업에는 실질적인 수출 성과 증대를 위한 방향으로 혜택을 부여할 예정이다.
KISIA는 정보보안인력의 양성에도 적극 나서기로 했다.
이를 위해 그동안 사설자격증이었던 정보보호전문가(SIS)자격증을 2012년부터 국가공인 자격증으로 격상시킨다. 또 내년 초 기무사와의 협의를 통해 군에서 사이버 전쟁관련 훈련을 경험한 인력들의 산업계 진출을 도울 방침이다.
이득춘 회장은 "앞으로 5년내에 IT시장의 빅뱅이 올 것이고 이를 위해 보안업체도 적극 대응해야 한다"고 말했다.
그는 "유일한 대응책은 해외시장 진출이며 이를 위해 협회차원에서도 경쟁력 향상을 위해 지원을 아끼지 않을 것"이라고 포부를 밝혔다.

description.hltext_display: Vetropack Holding: 1400 Euro-Marke überschritten
description.content:
Vetropack Holding überschreitet die 1400 Euro Marke. Prognose für Vetropack Holding am Mittwoch den 29. Dezember bei 1437,32 Euro.
© 2010 HappyYuppie.de
Klicken Sie hier, um weitere aktuelle Nachrichten zum Unternehmen zu finden:
VETROPACK HOLDING News
Risikohinweis:
HappyYuppie.de bietet Vorhersagen von Kursentwicklungen von Aktien an, welche ausschließlich auf den Kursen dieser Wertpapiere in der Vergangenheit basieren. Diese Nachrichten basieren auf Prognosen, welche automatisch von einem Computerprogramm erstellt werden. Obwohl ein mathematische Modell ein nützliches Hilfsmittel sein kann, um zu versuchen, die Möglichkeit für zukünftige Preisentwicklungen mit Hilfe der vergangenen Performance zu bestimmen, so unterliegen solche Entwicklungen doch einer Vielzahl von verschiedenen Einflüssen. Daher sind zukünftige Kurse von Aktien nicht vorhersehbar. Die Zukunftsprognosen stellen somit keine Empfehlungen für den Kauf, ein Halten oder den Verkauf eines Wertpapiers dar und können sehr stark von einer Einschätzung auf Basis der Fundamentaldaten abweichen. Daher sollten alle Anlageentscheidungen nicht alleine von diesen Computer-Vorhersagen abhängig gemacht werden. Diese sollten vielmehr von verschiedenen anlage- und anlegerspezifischen Kriterien abhängen. Es kann keine Garantie für die Richtigkeit der gemachten Vorhersagen übernommen werden. Auch wenn das System in der Vergangenheit zuverlässige Prognosen gemacht haben sollte, gibt es keine Garantie für die Zuverlässigkeit dieser Angaben in der Zukunft.

description.hltext_display: Nissan, NEC e Sumitomo insieme per ricaricare le auto elettriche
description.author: Giuliano Daniele
description.content: Nissan, NEC e Sumitomo uniscono le proprie tecnologie per realizzare una rete di stazioni di ricarica per veicoli elettrici, pensata per il Giappone. Per sostenere il crescente interesse che l’auto elettrica sta suscitando in tutto mondo, le aziende automotive puntano ora sul potenziamento delle infrastrutture necessarie a rifornire di energia le vetture. La capillarit� e la flessibilit� della distribuzione delle colonnine sar� l’elemento chiave per far diffondere il nuovo tipo di trazione, e il progetto giapponese avr� la caratteristica di offrire un servizio non-stop e garantire l’assistenza per sostiuire le batterie fuoriuso, il tutto offerto all’utente sotto forma di abbonamento. La praticit� per l’automobilista sar� facilitata dalla progettazione differenziata delle colonnine: le isole per la ricarica rapida, infatti, saranno posizionate in aree della stazione adatte ad ospitare un elevato flusso di veicoli, così come saranno specifiche le soluzioni studiate per le utenze residenziali, i parcheggi-ricarica e gli accesi rapidi all’energia elettrica riservati ai veicoli plug-in. Nello specifico, i tre partner coinvolti nell’iniziativa metteranno a disposizione le proprie competenze: Sumitomo garantir� la necessaria consulenza per ottimizzare i processi di carica e scarica delle batterie ioni-litio; Nissan continuer� lo sviluppo dei veicoli ZEV con l’obiettivo di facilitare l’interazione tra auto e infrastruttura; NEC si far� carico della gestione informatica dei servizi di ricarica e dell’accesso capillare al sistema. Autore: Giuliano Daniele Data: 22 dicembre 2010 Tags: Curiosit� , Nissan, auto elettrica, infrastrutture Stazioni di servizio non-stop, con la formula dell’abbonamento

description.hltext_display: 如何享有我们的言论自由
description.content:
中华人民共和国公民有言论、出版、集会、结社、游行、示威的自由。这是《宪法》赋予我们的神圣权利。但如何行使好这种权利，如何充分地享有这种自由，却是需要整个社会和我们每一个公民去身体力行，去努力推进的。
改革开放以来，中国公民的言论自由在很大程度上得到了有效保障。“言者无罪，闻者足戒”已经从理论层面走向了现实。这些年因言获罪的已经没有，大家尽可以在各种场合敞开自己的心扉，畅所欲言。至于话说多了“得罪人”，那是另一个问题。此罪非彼罪，怕得罪人我们就只能生活在真空里。
越来越宽松的言论自由的环境，让我们开始思索一些更深层次的问题。那就是公民如何才能更加充分地享有自己的言论自由。许多人对于言论自由的理解过于偏颇，以为在手机上随便发点段子，在网络上匿名发表点意见，那就是言论自由。或者说是以这种虚拟的自由去填充内心深处的言论自由的欲望。但仔细想一想，如果言论自由仅仅满足于匿名发帖、未注册手机发段子，那是没有更多实际意义的。这不叫言论自由，因为话不是“你”说的，代表的也未必是你真正的观点和见解。
一个人，只有在正式的场合，发出自己的声音，表达自己真实的想法，那才叫言论自由。也只有用真实的名字行使言论自由的权利，你的话语权、你的诉求才能表达得更充分、更具体，更便于与受话方及时交流沟通，最终解决问题。而使用匿名，你只能描述性地说话，不能直陈哪是自己的个人权益和现实利益，哪些需要得到更充分的保障。涉及别人的话题，则可能信手拈来，不加推敲，没有更多的责任心做保障。手机段子和网络信息的失真就是一个明显的例证。目前，手机已经逐渐走向实名制，而网络IP走向实名制的路子也很近了。有人感觉这要受到更多制约，其实这正是社会进步的表现。要营造一个言论自由的社会，必须从每个人真正敢于说话、敢于为自己说过的话负责做起。
以个人的名义发表对事、对人的观点，这并不难。目前来看，许多大网站的博客、论坛都要求实名登记注册。尽管许多人依旧在用网名说话，但注册材料还是相对真实的。与此同时，各大网站实名上网的人也已经越来越多，其优越性还是很明显的。可以看出，涉及个人诉求的主帖和博文，用实名是很有必要的。而评论国家政策、部门措施、外地事件和公众人物的，使用实名也无多少妨碍。多少有些不便的，也许就是讨论本地一些政策措施和身边熟悉的人物。但这时候考验的已经不是实名发言的可行性，而是言论者的勇气和担当。 (中国青年报/薄文军）
愚夫愚见：由衷钦佩薄先生的勇气与担当。但对真正的弱势群体而言，在当前形势下，太多的愤懑与不平如果真名实说，恐怕需要比搀扶摔倒老人更大的勇气，更多的牺牲精神。所以，我们一方面要赞扬并保护薄先生一类的敢于真言直言正言之士，另一方面对“穿着马甲”说话的匿名群体也要暂时予以宽容与理解。当然，我们像薄先生一样期待“每个人真正敢于说话、敢于为自己说过的话负责”那样一个真正言者无惧的民主而文明的社会 。

Ahmed Ossama, Managing Director of TE Data will join the TE management team as VP for Telephony & . The company also promoted Mohamed Abdel Rehim to Senior Vice President or SVP and Chief Technology Officer or CTO.
Mohamed Elnawawy is promoted to SVP and Chief Strategy Officer or CSO, while Emad Elazhary is promoted to SVP and Group Chief Commercial Officer or CCO.

description.hltext_display: Opnieuw sneeuw op komst
description.content:
Vanmiddag is het somber en mistig, maar het blijft overwegend droog. Er waait een zwakke noordoostenwind en de middagtemperatuur schommelt rond 1 graad. Vanavond valt er lichte sneeuw of aanvriezende regen over de zuidoostelijke helft van het land.
Vannacht sneeuwt het op vele plaatsen behalve in een strook dicht bij de kust. In de zuidoostelijke landshelft valt de neerslag enige tijd onder de vorm van aanvriezende regen. Bij temperaturen van rond of net onder het vriespunt kan het dus glad worden op de weg.
Morgen is het zwaarbewolkt met af en toe sneeuw. Aan zee en in het westen valt weinig neerslag. Ten zuiden van de Ardennen valt eerst nog aanvriezende regen die nadien overgaat in sneeuw. Er waait een matige, aan de kust een krachtige noordoostenwind. De middagtemperatuur schommelt rond het vriespunt.
Vrijdag is het zwaarbewolkt met lichte sneeuwval. Er waait een gure noordoostenwind bij een middagtemperatuur rond het vriespunt. Op beide kerstdagen en ook begin volgende week is het droog met opklaringen en wolkenvelden. Overdag vriest het licht en 's nachts komt matige, plaatselijk strenge vorst voor. (belga/adv)

description.hltext_display: Todo listo para el comienzo del Sorteo
description.content:
En torno a las 8.00 horas se han abierto las puertas para las personas que acuden a ver el sorteo en el salón, y que hacían cola frente a la puerta desde la madrugada, pudieran entrar. Como ya es tradicional, parte del público ha llegado vestido de todo tipo de disfraces, desde grupos de Papa Noel hasta un hombre disfrazado de Belén Esteban.
Poco después llegaron al edificio de Loterías y los niños del colegio de San Ildefonso, encargados de repartir la suerte, que han desayunado en una sala del propio Palacio de Congresos.
Posteriormente, se procedió a la presentación de liras al público, para que los espectadores menos 'confiados' pudieran comprobar de forma efectiva, previa petición, que la bola con su número estará en el bombo.
A las 8.58 horas se comenzaron a volcar las bolas de los números en la tolva para ser traspasada a su respectivo bombo, y posteriormente, a las 9.09 horas, comenzó a procederse al llenado de los bombos, operación que duró apenas cuatro minutos.
Luego, las bolas de los premios de pedrea y los premios mayores fueron proclamadas según categorías por un funcionario del LAE ante la mesa que preside el sorteo antes de introducirlas tras varias comprobaciones en el bombo pequeño, escena que fue seguida con creciente expectación por el público.
A las 9.17 se concluía esta labor entre la creciente expectación del público y aparecían los niños de San Ildefonso para comenzar de inmediato el sorteo.Un año más, pasadas las nueve de la mañana del 22 de diciembre, se ultimaban los detalles en el nueva sede del en el para la celebración del sorteo.

description.hltext_display: IT기업들, 데이터센터 효율화 전략 공개
description.content:
IT 대표 기업들의 그린 IT 실현을 위한 데이터센터 효율화 전략이 공개됐다.
한국IT서비스산업협회(회장 김신배)는 지식경제부와 공동으로 '그린 컴퓨팅 서밋 2010(Green Computing Summit 2010)을 22일 개최했다.
이번 행사는 '차세대 그린IT 기술과 데이터센터 효율화 전략'을 주제로 산학연 관계자 300명이 참석해 의견을 나눴다. 특히 그린 IT 신기술을 통한 데이터센터의 전기절감, 그린화 방안, 신기술에 대한 사례가 소개돼 눈길을 끌었다.
이날 인텔, 오라클, IBM, EMC, 데이터크래프트, 롯데정보통신, 팔콘스토어, 디디에스 등 IT 기업들은 자사의 그린 IT구현 방안을 소개하고 성공 사례를 공유했다.
가장 먼저 인텔코리아의 백남기 이사는 '스마트워크 구현을 위한 인텔의 그린IT 전략'을 주제로 스마트한 IT 인프라 구축에 대한 방안을 발표했다.
백남기 이사는 "다양한 기업 업무에 맞춘 최적화된 컴퓨팅 디바이스와 기존 인프라 환경의 컨버전스가 본격 궤도에 오를 것"이라며 "기존 IT 자산을 최대한 활용하면서 미래 비즈니스를 위한 스마트한 IT 인프라 구축이 필요하다"고 말했다.
이어진 순서에서는 한국오라클의 김상현 상무가 '오라클의 데이터센터를 통해서 바라본 그린 컴퓨팅 전략을 발표했으며, 한국IBM 김연광 차장은 '데이터센터 에너지 효율화 방안'에서 서버룸 상면 사용 및 전력밀도 현황, 전력효율지수, 직류사용 등을 통해 전기/냉각 부문의 에너지 효율화를 높일 수 있다고 강조했다.
이와 함께 IBM이 운영 중인 데이터센터의 전기/냉각 에너지의 효율화 사례를 통해 이를 토대로 그린 데이터센터 구축 과정을 설명했다.
데이터크래프트 문규영 이사는 "클라우드 환경에서 데이터센터는 더 이상 부동산으로서의 가치나 멋진 환경을 제공하는 장소가 아닌 쉽고 빠르게 구축하고, 안정적인 서비스를 제공할 수 있도록 하는 기반 인프라로서 역할을 해야한다"며 "클라우드 컴퓨팅의 등장으로 변화되는 데이터센터의 역할과 고효율 데이터센터 구성을 위해 클라우드 컴퓨팅 환경에 적합한 요소(Power System, Space, Cooling System)를 고민해야 한다"고 말했다.
이 밖에도 EMC 황정식 이사는 '클라우드 컴퓨팅 가속화를 위한 비즈니스 및 기술적인 접근'을 주제로 클라우드 컴퓨팅을 통한 비용투자 효율성을 제시했으며 롯데정보통신 윤덕상 센터장은 롯데대전연구소의 적용기술 및 에너지 관리 체계를 통해 '차세대 그린 데이터센터 구현 사례'를 설명했다.

description.hltext_display: 为地铁文明“给力”（三十四）
description.content:
今天雅媛又带来一位新博友——niuniu（左一）。niuniu是雅媛所在社区的居委干部。
红黄绿 构成的一道地铁风景
从左至右：山林、山而乐、沐月轩、元元、乡下老太、非凡、幸运草、紫薇、niuniu、雅媛。
虽然是周末，地铁内依然是人潮汹涌。原来近日是扫墓高峰，又恰逢冬至的最后一个周末，再加上中国馆重新开放，所以外出的人特别多。好在今天来了十位博友为地铁文明“给力”，大家分成三组分布在人流最多的2号线和4号线电梯旁和候车区。红马甲紧张繁忙的两个小时开始了！
依然是耐心地指路引路、依然是不停地“请先下后上”的疏导、依然是那重复了万千次的“请左行右立”的文明乘梯宣传……，大家都非常明白：文明习惯的养成，要靠大家无数次的提醒。面对南来北往的乘客，每天都有许多人第一次接触到这种宣传提醒，所以我们每天的无数重复，意味着每天都才开始迈出第一步。任重而道远哦！
尽管还会遇到白眼讽刺、尽管还会看到抵触的行动，但志愿者们更多地看到的是乘客电梯中自觉的配合、互相提醒的细节动作和那回眸一笑的赞许。不光是地铁志愿者，其实大家都在为地铁文明“给力”，这是对我们的最大鼓舞鞭策哦！
发段视频上来，让志愿者们的行动说话吧:

description.hltext_display: Prime Minister asks Ministries to bring down onion prices
description.content:
Pawar attributes the rise in prices of onions to unseasonal rains in Nasik in Maharashtra With the Union government refusing to play Santa Claus and regulate market forces, the merciless rise in onion prices threatens to mar Christmas, New Year and Makar Sankrantri festivities.
With several markets reporting a further rise in prices to about Rs.85 a kg, intervened, by directing the Ministries of Agriculture and Consumer Affairs to take steps to bring its prices to affordable levels.
According to sources, the Prime Minister, in his letter, wanted the two Ministries to monitor the situation on a day-to-day basis to bring the prices of onions down. However, the fact was that the common man would not get to sport a smile for at least three more weeks. This was underlined by Union Agriculture Minister Sharad Pawar who declared that the prices of onions would continue to scorch the kitchens as of now.
He ruled out any intervention through imports and expressed his dependence on the next batch of arrivals of onions, which continued to command a stiff price of Rs.70 plus a kg, without any let-up in retail markets of Delhi and other cities.
The Agriculture Minister said that onion prices would remain high for at least the next two to three weeks. He attributed the rise in prices of onions to unseasonal rains in Nasik in Maharashtra damaging onions on a major scale, and said that the prices would come down when the bulbs arrive from Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat and Uttar Pradesh in the next two to three weeks. Asked if the government intended importing onions to meet the demand and bring its prices down, Mr. Pawar said that there was no such proposal under consideration as of date.
He, however, hoped that the government's action of suspending exports till January 15 and doubling export price would help reduce the prices of onion.
On the other hand, Union Finance Minister Pranab Mukherjee described the rise in onion prices as unfortunate and said that he would be talking to ministries concerned to ensure adequate supply of onions in the market.
Stressing on the mismatch in demand and supply, Mr. Mukherjee hoped that appropriate steps would be taken to remove the bottlenecks to bring the prices down.
The Union Agriculture Ministry claimed that wholesale prices of onions in Nasik in Maharashtra and Azadpur market declined by 35 per cent and 13 percent respectively on Tuesday, following the decision of the Price Fixation Advisory Committee to voluntarily suspend issuance of no-objection certificates for export of onion.
Communist Party of India MP Gurudas Dasgupta said that the rise in prices of essential food items and that of onion was due to excessive liberalisation of the market without any required safeguard, excessive export, forward trading and stockpiling, with generous bank advances and hoarding by unscrupulous manipulators of the market.

description.hltext_display: 7.Home Automation Services Maryland
description.content: What if we could just tell the ATM $20 please or have one device to control all the other devices and that device could be any device? Its certainly a possibility in the future, and near future at that.Sophisticated technology is everywhere, touching all aspects of our lives. The integration of several electronic systems into one is automation. Dotomotics is home automation that integrates all the electrical systems in a house to form one high-speed connection with every device sharing information with the other. Home automation is also known as smart home systems. What Can Be Automated?Virtually anything can be automated. Televisions that adjust screen and speaker specifics according to surrounding light intensity and screen content, and washing machines that adjust time and cycles according to load and dirt are common. Some of the things on offer now are smart fridges that generate shopping lists; remote access to the home computer; water plants and feed the pet from your office; automatic temperature regulation according to the weather and activity; and various volume settings in different parts of the house. Control of all this is combined into a single device and into your cell phone or computer. Home automation can also quite directly affect your life by saving it. In case of fire, the smoke detector triggers the television and stereo to stop playing and broadcast this emergency while at the same time inform the closest fire station. Home security systems also work in the same manner.Lighting Control SystemsDotomotics has transformed the lighting systems of a house. It allows mood lighting in various parts of the house and even in different parts of the same room. Dimmers and motion sensors that vary light intensity in a room according to the amount of activity, time of day, and season, and timers control lights and adjust blinds and curtains.Global Custom Integrations, Inc.Website: http://www.gcintegrations.com/hospitalityName: Daniel HongAddress:1511 Route 22Brewster, NY 10509E-mail: dhong@gcintegrations.comPhone: (914) 886-8640

description.hltext_display: Colisão entre caminhão e carreta provoca bloqueio parcial na RS-122 em Farroupilha
description.content:
Não há feridos e o movimento é lento no trecho perto da curva da Morte
Um caminhão e uma carreta colidiram hoje, na altura do quilômetro 45 da RS-122, perto da curva da Morte, no distrito de Sete Colônias, em Farroupilha. Não há feridos, porém uma das faixas está bloqueada, e o tráfego é alternado na outra. O movimento é lento no trecho, segundo o Comando Rodoviário da Brigada Militar.

description.hltext_display: Christmas Tree for Needy breaks record â again
description.content:
Christmas Tree for Needy breaks record — again
Local News
For several years in a row, the Christmas Tree for the Needy at the Vulcan Senior Centre has continued to break record numbers of donations.
Last year, just more than 600 items were received and donated to the Vulcan County Food Bank, the Calgary Mustard Seed and the Lethbridge Harbour House.
The year before last, some 500 items had been rounded up.
When the Advocate spoke with Florence Sokvitne, who's organized the Christmas Tree for the Needy for several years, she said that there were more than 770 items.
"It's terrific, just terrific," she said.
Items donated ranged from toques and mitts to socks and sweaters, Sokvitne said.
People who didn't know how to knit or crochet went out and bought some items, while others brought in large hauls of yarn, which was then picked up by others who turned the yarn into something new, Sokvitne said.
Vulcan County Food Bank got first pick — as always — and ended up receiving 200 items, with the rest being distributed to the Mustard Seed and Harbour House.
Plans for next year include making toques for cancer patients, as well as making miniature toques for premature babies, Sokvitne said.
Small toques have been prepared in the past for the Vulcan Community Health Centre, and Sokvitne thought it would be worth doing again.
The Christmas Tree for the Needy is up year round at the Vulcan Senior Centre. Donations for this year have wrapped up, but the tree is still in the back at the senior centre, and volunteers are already accepting contributions for next year.
Sokvitne said she was grateful to all the community for its support, and hopes that the Christmas Tree for the Needy will be just as successful next year.

description.hltext_display: Formation of tourism society still under discussion
description.content:
Discussion on the decision to move forward with turning Vulcan Tourism into its own society resumed at Town council's Dec. 13 meeting.
Although no one on council was against creating the society, there remained a difference of opinion regarding whether a Town councillor should be assigned as a representative on the society's board.
"My problem is not with the society," said Mayor Howard Dirks. "My problem is simply the composition."
When a councillor is the member of a society as a town representative, he or she has the responsibility of looking out for that society's best interests, he said.
"You're not acting as a representative of the town, you are a member of that society and everything that you do should be for that society," Dirks said. "Then, when you come back into council chambers here, you virtually have to take that hat off, set it aside, because your fiduciary responsibility then is to the taxpayers and the town."
In the end, that puts the councillor in a bad position, he said.
"What is good for the society certainly may not be good for the ratepayers of this town," Dirks said. "That's the conflict that I see in having a councillor or councillors sit on a society."
Dirks suggestion was to have a society formed completely independently from the town and the county under a contract for a pre-determined budget and number of years. Local business owners, who have a more directly vested interest in tourism than the Town, could form that society, he said.
"I'm not against the society, but I just think it could be handled in a way that it wouldn't put councillors in an awkward position," he said.
But not all the councillors agreed with Dirks' position.
Coun. John Seaman said that the Town does have a directly vested interest in tourism.
"It's a great benefit to our town," he said, adding that council, which is made up of community leaders, should have representation on the tourism society.
"If we're giving the amount of money that we're going to be giving to the society and we don't have somebody sitting on that society, I think we're not doing our proper" due diligence, Seaman said. "I do think it's possible to wear the two hats."
Coun. Harold Lewis agreed, and said when the town's tax dollars are involved, so should council. He went on to say the proposed formation of the society was meant to lower costs, not for the society to split off as its own entity.
Lewis went on to say he has heard concerns that the new town council was no longer interested in tourism, or supporting it.
"I'm not a Trek fan, by any shape or form, but it's working for the town," he said. "We've got to stand behind it."
After further talk — it was one of the most in-depth discussions at the Dec. 13 meeting, which ran on for more than four hours — council went on to make some amendments to the tourism society's act application, the draft bylaw and the draft commercial lease agreement for the tourism centre.
Those amendments were carried and submitted to Vulcan County council for its Dec. 15 meeting. County councillors had a concern with that lease agreement.
"I want to make it clear that Vulcan County will not be sending money over there to upgrade or maintain that building," said Reeve Dave Schneider, adding that he believes he speaks for all of council on this matter.
Coun. Gord Nelson said the society would need stable funding for several years to start off with, and from there the society might be able to secure outside sources of funding for itself.
The Town and County of Vulcan would each put up 50 per cent of the funding to start with. Under the proposed agreement, the Town and County would each have two representatives on the society's board, and three members at large — one from the town, one from the county and one from the chamber of commerce — would be appointed, said Coun. Merle Wyatt.
County council's proposed changes to the society act application and the draft bylaw and draft commercial lease agreement for the tourism centre will be brought back before Town council at a future meeting.

description.hltext_display: Pietersen says Aussie sledgers can't top Warne
description.author: WILLIAM WEST
description.content: England's Kevin Pietersen said on Wednesday that Australia's current team could not out-sledge Test greats Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath, dismissing a sharp rise in verbal clashes during the Ashes series. Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" during England's last tour of Australia, when the legendary bowlers were still playing, but had seen nothing unusual in this year's Tests. Both teams have acknowledged raised temperatures during the home team's series-levelling win in Perth, with England's James Anderson and Matthew Prior in the thick of it along with Australia's Mitchell Johnson and Peter Siddle. "There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series," said the South Africa-born batsman. "Blokes get a bit of red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams. You're playing for a little urn. It's historic. It's huge. But there's nothing that's been overboard." Australia had not won a Test since July until they wrapped up the big 267-run win on Sunday in a performance marked by a return to their traditional aggression. The series is poised 1-1 going into Sunday's penultimate Test. Australia were ordered to tone down their sledging after the notorious 2008 Sydney Test against India, when alleged racial remarks prompted an angry public backlash against a team dubbed the "Unloveables". 'The team's performance has been affected' But Australian Cricketers' Association chief executive Paul Marsh said the softer approach had hindered the side, which was toppled from the top Test ranking last year and has since fallen as low as fifth. "I think there's no doubt the team's performance has been affected," Marsh told the Sydney Morning Herald. "Hard aggressive cricket is in the Australian team's DNA and unfortunately the players started second-guessing their natural instincts in the heat of battle for fear of reprisal from CA [Cricket Australia] or a public backlash from the vocal minority." Cricket Australia spokesperson Peter Young admitted that the team went through a "period of introspection" after the 2008 backlash. "But the public has consistently told us since then, through three years of research, that they are totally comfortable with on-field aggression as long as it is hard but fair cricket," he told the Herald. "What the public saw in Perth, from my understanding of the public mood, was completely acceptable." Meanwhile, Pietersen was also confident that England spearhead Anderson would be fit for the hotly anticipated Boxing Day Test despite a side strain. Cricket Australia says 91 000 people could pack the cavernous Melbourne Cricket Ground for day one on Sunday, outstripping the 90 800 who flocked there in 1961 for the fifth Test against the West Indies. -- AFP

description.hltext_display: Companies file returns for Ft 161 billion in crisis tax, in line with target
description.content:
Companies filed returns to pay almost HUF 161bn in crisis tax by the deadline on Monday, the National Economy Ministry said on Tuesday.
Companies made advance payments on the tax of HUF 151bn by December 20, the ministry said. They have until the 150th day of 2011 to pay the rest.
The ministry acknowledged the companies' "significant contribution to creating the opportunity to stabilise Hungary's fiscal position, start reducing the level of taxation and create a stable economic foundation for investors or businesses that want to invest in the country."

description.hltext_display: Britain 'trained tainted police'
description.content:
The British government trained an elite police force in Bangladesh accused of extra-judicial killings and human rights violations, according to the latest cables revealed by WikiLeaks.
Members of paramilitary group the Rapid Action Battalion (RAB) were trained by British authorities in "investigative interviewing techniques" and "rules of engagement", according to wires from US ambassador to Dhaka James Moriarty.In a cable dating from May 2009 published by the Guardian, Mr Moriarty writes: "The US and UK representatives reviewed our ongoing training to make the RAB a more transparent, accountable and human-rights compliant paramilitary force."The British have been training RAB for 18 months in areas such as investigative interviewing techniques and rules of engagement. They said that the training had been widely disseminated within RAB and that they were undertaking an assessment of its effectiveness."The latest revelations from the cache of US embassy cables also revealed British police provided training to members of the RAB to address the allegations of human rights abuses.The National Policing Improvement Agency (NPIA) said it had provided courses to the RAB from serving police officers. Two officers from West Mercia Police organised two crime scene management courses for the Bangladesh Police and the RAB, while an associate tutor and an officer from Humberside Police ran a two-week major investigation course for the RAB.An NPIA spokesman told the Guardian: "The NPIA has given limited support to the Bangladeshi Police and the RAB in technical areas of policing such as forensic awareness, management of crime scenes and recovery of evidence."Throughout the training we have emphasised the importance of respecting the human rights of witnesses, suspects and victims." He added the courses had been approved by the Government and the Association of Chief Police Officers (ACPO).US authorities were legally restricted in the training they could provide because of the RAB's past record, which included "reports of abuses and a pattern of misrepresentation by the RAB regarding so-called 'encounter/crossfire killings'", the US cables said.The Foreign Office said: "We do not discuss the detail of operational counter-terrorism co-operation. Counter-terrorism assistance is fully in line with our laws and values."

event_or_fact.property: The US and UK representatives reviewed our ongoing training to make the RAB a more transparent, accountable and human-rights compliant paramilitary force.

description.hltext_display: Escola Santa Catarina disputa na noite desta quarta-feira final do Estadual feminino
description.content:
Equipe recebe o Chimarrão, às 20h30min, no Enxutão
As caxienses da Escola Santa Catarina disputam na noite desta quarta-feira a final do Campeonato Gaúcho Feminino de Futsal. O time recebe o Chimarrão, de Estância Velha, na segunda partida decisiva do Estadual. O confronto começa às 20h30min, no Ginásio do Enxutão. Não haverá cobrança de ingressos.
Como perdeu o jogo de ida, no último domingo, por 5 a 0, as atletas do Santa precisam vencer para levar a decisão para a prorrogação. Não há saldo de gols. No tempo extra de 10 minutos, o time do técnico Lairton Zandonai terá a vantagem do empate, em função de ter ficado em primeiro lugar na fase classificatória.
— As meninas são experientes, estão acostumadas a disputar jogos decisivos e têm consciência do que a gente precisa — avalia o treinador.

description.hltext_display: How to create a professional image for your business
description.content:
(ARA) - Clean storefront? Check. Friendly and helpful service? Check. Outstanding products? Check. While all these things help establish a professional image for your business, is it possible you might be missing something?
Developing a professional image for your business lies partly in the details. Everything that comes into contact with your customers and business associates should illustrate that you take your work seriously.
As you focus on creating that image, a great place to start is with a custom logo that will make your business more identifiable and convey a sense of professionalism. While it may be tempting to develop a logo yourself, business logo design firms can help you incorporate your ideas while offering expertise that will result in a polished and professional design.
Developing a professional logo can be less expensive than you think, as logo design professionals such as Logo Mojo offer reasonably priced packages for businesses that need to design or refresh their logos. Once you've developed your logo, displaying it on items that regularly come into contact with your customers and associates is a great way to advance the professional image of your business. Some of those items include:
Business forms: Nothing states that you approach your business dealings in a professional manner more than customized business forms.
Shopping bags: Customizing your shopping bags with your logo is a great way to advertise for free, as your customers will be carrying them around town as they complete other errands that day. It's also a great way to remain in the memories of those customers and keep them coming back.
Office supplies: If possible, feature your logo on anything your customers and business partners might come into contact with. Think stationery, envelopes, pens and letterhead.
In the virtual world: Your logo should also feature prominently on your company's website, as well as in e-mail correspondence and social networking. Any communication with a logo attached to it will carry more weight.
By establishing a more professional image, you'll inspire confidence in both your customers and business associates, allowing you to reach your business goals.

description.hltext_display: Price rise will be contained soon: Rahul
description.content:
Asserting that the priceline would be contained soon, Congress leader Rahul Gandhi [ Images ]� said on Wednesday� that Prime Minister Manmohan Singh [ Images ] would fix the problem.
"We are going to make sure prices are lowered. Leave it to the Prime Minister," he said while interacting with Congress members in Tamil Nadu.
In response to Gandhi's advise to party members to work more at the panchayat level and be close to the people, one of them told him that people were bothered by the price rise, including skyrocketing prices of onion, and said they were asking Congressmen what steps are being taken to control the spiral.
"The Prime Minister will fix the problem. . . .You don't worry about it. You worry about working at the panchayat level," Gandhi advised the party worker.
Earlier, in his address to newly elected youth Congress members in Tamil Nadu, Gandhi asked them to 'slowly and systematically' work to build the party and bring it back to where it once belonged.
He said if youth Congress members worked hard and ensured that the party, which has been out of power for nearly three decades grew into a strong one, 'a day will come when one from this group can become the chief minister.'
However, he hastened to add that there were senior Congress leaders who could reach the top post.

description.hltext_display: El descanso del amo no es el estrés del perro
description.content:
SI POR VACACIONES va a salir de viaje asegúrese dejar a su mascota en un lugar que le garantice no solo la estadía sino también servicios como el de un veterinario.
Mientras su propietario está de vacaciones Agatha tendrá varios cachorros, que recibirán atención como si estuvieran en casa.
La labradora chocolate, de dos años y medio, no solo recibirá el servicio veterinario para su parto, también gozará de los ofrecidos en la guardería de La Casa del Granjero.
Por esta temporada la demanda por el servicio de guarderías aumenta en la ciudad, y los propietarios buscan la mejor opción para el cuidado de sus caninos.
Dentro del paquete, se incluye la asistencia veterinaria en caso de que, como Agatha, los caninos requieran atención médica.
En los centros especializados se reciben animales por días, semanas o de meses de cuidado, como será para esta labradora.
Son muchas las opciones que le garantizarán diversión a su mascota. Piscina, recorridos y hasta una pista de agility, que en La Casa del Granjero está en montaje.
En algunos lugares como Emergencias Veterinarias Inmediatas (EVI), el costo del día incluye la alimentación del can, según informó Milena Agudelo.
En otros como en La Casa del Granjero, el propietario debe dejar el cuido o indicar cuál producto desea se le suministre al animal.
"No todos los animales requieren el mismo tipo de concentrado", dijo Juan Carlos Tobón, el gerente comercial.
Si le preocupa que durante su estadía su mascota adquiera alguna enfermedad o pueda ser lastimado por otro animal vaya tranquilo, todas estas posibilidades ya han sido contempladas por los expertos.
Para ingresar y según la edad, el animal debe contar con todo el plan de vacunación y debe estar al día en la desparasitación y control de pulgas.
Al propietario se le exige además la vacuna contra la tos de perrera que se aplica cuando va a estar en contacto con otros perros.
Con una capacidad que va desde los 30 hasta los 80 perros cada animal queda ubicado según su tamaño: raza pequeña, mediana y grande.
También, contó Tobón, deben pasar por una consulta etológica con el adiestrador para identificar las conductas y comportamientos del animal y así determinar su ingreso o no.
Además hay condiciones para aceptar un perro en la guardería: solo mayores de siete meses y perras que no estén en calor.
Si ese es su caso y no sabe que hacer con su animal recuerde que en el mercado se ofrecen dispensadores que conservan el cuido fresco.
Con el dispensador, sin embargo, el perro no se va a controlar mucho en la dieta por lo que se recomienda solo en casos de un par de días.
Si dentro de sus opciones está llevarse con usted el animal las diferentes aerolíneas le ofrecen el servicio de transporte en cabina o en bodega.
Para llevarlo en cabina entre el animal y el guacal el peso no debe superar los ocho kilogramos, debe cumplir unas dimensiones específicas y las rutas no deben ser de muchas horas.
En bodega, y hasta los 25 kilos, el animal tiene un costo de 80 dólares, según información de la línea del servicio al cliente de Avianca.

description.hltext_display: 美國新規首次允許聯邦政府調控網絡流量
description.content:
美國聯邦通訊委員會12月22日出臺新規，首次授予聯邦政府對網絡流量進行適當調控的權限，盡管聯邦政府予以調控的力度和時間長度尚不明確。綜合媒體12月22日� �導，美國聯邦通訊委員會(Federal Communications Commission,FCC)五位委員22日以3比2的投票通過新的互聯網流量監管規則，新規則要求網絡服務提供商不得屏蔽合法內容，但仍允許其對網絡流量進行適當的調控。目的是為了保持互聯網的開放和透明以擴大消費者選擇、以及保護網絡言論自由、用戶控制、互聯網競爭以及創新自由等。
該委員會稱，網絡消費者和創新者在使用網絡開啟新技術、新業務、聯系朋友或共享個人觀點前，不用尋求許可。� 為，網絡自由和開放已經使得其空前發展，應該具備公平競爭的環境，這樣也有利於提升用戶的投資與創新，這正是新規定的中心目標。
所以，FCC認為，有必要為網絡寬帶供應商設置某種必要的基本標準，以確保互聯網的持續公開性，使消費者、創新者、投資商以及寬帶供應商有效管理自己的網絡。新規要求所有寬帶供應商公開其網絡管理措施，限制寬帶供應商對網絡內容和申請進行屏蔽，禁止供應商在合法網絡流量傳輸方面的歧視性行為。
新規則規定，康卡斯特（Comcast Corp）和弗萊森電訊（Verizon Communications Inc）等高速互聯網提供商可以適當管理網絡，或� �據消費者網絡使用量收取費用。該規定還要求網絡服務商給用戶提供互聯網服務和網速方面的信息。新規定還禁止網絡服務商對競爭方的網絡流量、有線和無線網絡服務進行不合理歧視。新規定的目的是平衡網絡服務提供商、內容� 商和消費者之間的利益，但部分業內人士認為這些規定有可能遭遇上訴。其中一個問題是，監管者是否需要保證所有利益相關方繼續能� 接入互聯網，這一原則被稱為網絡中立，以及互聯網是否不應該被監管。這一新規源於FCC主席� �納考斯基(Julius Genachowski)的提案。該提案要求賦予FCC阻止網絡寬帶供應商選擇性地屏蔽網絡內容，它得到了民主黨人考普斯(Michael Copps)和翁克萊(Mignon Clyburn)的支持。� �納考斯基稱，這是首次為保持網絡自由和開放性而出臺的可執行規則。他認為，在保護網絡自由和開放性以及促進強勁創新與投資方面，新規定提供了一個強大而又明智的框架。不過，一些批評人士認為，� �納考斯基所提出的保持網絡開放開放與自由實則與新規則中的管理權限相違背。批評人士稱，提案給予了互聯網服務提供商太大的權力，反而會損害消費者利益，扼殺創新，不可逆轉地割裂互聯網，違背了互聯網的開放理念。該規定有望在2011年初付諸實施。但是，它也面臨國會方面的挑戰，有可能被訴訟。參議院少數黨� �袖、資深共和黨人麥康奈爾（Mitch McConnell）稱新規有缺陷，認為國會議員在2011年新國會年有機會阻礙該規定的實施。
(黃治金 編譯)
免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: INTERVIEW/Chinesischer Lkw von MAN und Sinotruk rollt erst ab 2012
description.content:
DJ MÜNCHEN (Dow Jones)--Der neue Lkw des Lastwagenbauers MAN und seines Partners Sinotruk für den boomenden chinesischen Markt wird voraussichtlich erst 2012 auf die Straße rollen. "Verkaufsbereit ist die neue Marke erst, wenn die Qualität stimmt", sagte Qing Pan, Vorstandsmitglied von Sinotruk, in München in einem Interview mit Dow Jones Newswires. Das werde voraussichtlich erst 2012 der Fall sein.
Die auf Qualitäts-Lkw spezialisierten Münchener hatten sich im vergangenen Jahr für gut eine halbe Mrd EUR mit 25% plus einer Aktie bei den auf günstige Schwerlaster fokussierten Chinesen eingekauft, um mit einem Lkw im mittleren Preis- und Qualitätsbereich auf dem stark wachsenden Markt Fuß zu fassen. Sinotruk baut dazu MANs robusten Schwerlaster TGA in Lizenz. Der ist für den Einsatz auf schlechten Straßen, unter extremen Klimabedingungen sowie für in China häufige Überladungen konzipiert und werde nun an die lokalen Kundenwünsche angepasst, sagte Pan. Sichere und komfortable Lkw westlicher Bauart gelten hier als viel zu teuer.
Bevor das neue Modell, dessen Namen MAN und Sinotruk auf der Automesse in Schanghai verraten wollen, an die ersten Kunden ausgeliefert werde, müssten die Lkw umfangreiche Qualitätsprüfungen über sich ergehen lassen, sagte Pan. Ein Vorgehen, das in China nicht unbedingt Standard ist. "Wir dürfen die Tests nicht auf Kundenseite durchführen", sagte Pan, der in Berlin studiert hat und seine Karriere bei Daimler und Volkswagen begonnen hatte.
Mindestens 50.000 der neuen schweren Lkw wolle Sinotruk nach dem Start der Produktion jährlich allein in China verkaufen und weitere 50.000 in andere asiatische Länder, nach Afrika, Russland oder in den mittleren Osten exportieren, sagte Pan. Derzeit verkaufen die Chinesen nur ein Zehntel ihrer Lkw außerhalb des Landes.
Indem weit mehr als 90% der Teile direkt in der Volksrepublik gefertigt würden, solle der neue Lkw im Reich der Mitte nur etwa ein Drittel eines europäischen Lastwagens von rund 90.000 EUR kosten, sagte Pan. Anders als in Europa oder den USA, wo die Lkw-Kunden vor allem auf die Gesamtkosten, also auch den Verbrauch oder Wartungskosten achten, zähle für chinesische Käufer vor allem der Kaufpreis, erläuterte Pan. "Innerhalb von zwei Jahren muss sich der Lkw für den Kunden amortisiert haben." Dann werde ein neuer gekauft. Pan schätzt, dass chinesische Lastwagen im Schnitt nur fünf Jahre im Einsatz sind.
Große Infrastrukturprojekte und der Wiederaufbau nach den Naturkatastrophen haben in diesem Jahr laut Pan die Verkäufe in China um rund 60% auf rund eine Million Laster über 14 Tonnen steigen lassen, was die Volksrepublik zum größten Markt der Welt mache.
Davon profitiere auch Sinotruks Muttergesellschaft, die China National Heavy Duty Truck Group Corp (CNHTC), die in diesem Jahr 195.000 schwere Lkw verkaufen werde, sagte Pan. Dabei erwirtschafte die mit einer Marge von mehr als 5% profitable Sinotruk den Großteil der Ergebnisse: Die an der Hongkonger Börse notierte Tochter werde mehr als 150.000 Laster an die Kunden bringen, rund 60% mehr als im Vorjahr, sagte Pan. "Ich bin mir sicher, dass Sinotruk damit in diesem Jahr den zweiten Platz unter den chinesischen Herstellern für schwere Lkw zurückerobert." Sinotruk würde dann den Rivalen Dongfeng überholen und hätte unter den heimischen Herstellern nur noch den Volkswagen-Partner FAW vor sich. Weltweite Nummer eins ist Daimler. Langfristig wolle sich Sinotruk weltweit unter den Top fünf behaupten, sagte Pan.
Im kommenden Jahr rechnet Pan angesichts zahlreicher Infrastrukturprojekte mit einer ähnlich hohen Nachfrage nach schweren Lkw in China, auch wenn die knappen Rohstoffe und die gestiegenen Preise den Herstellern zu schaffen machten. "Sinotruk versucht, auch im nächsten Jahr ein gesundes Wachstum zu erreichen", sagte Pan. Ein so gewaltiger Sprung wie 2010 sei jedoch unrealistisch, das Plus werde eher im einstelligen Prozentbereich liegen. Das Ergebnis dürfte angesichts der neuen Produkte und der eingesetzten MAN-Technik 2011 jedoch noch besser ausfallen als 2010, fügte er an.
Neben dem Konzernumbau - Sinotruk strebt eine Mehrmarkenstruktur wie Volkswagen an, mit einer chinesischen Premium-, einer mittleren und einer günstigen Marke sowie Spezialmarken wie leichten Lkw - kommt dem Konzern auch eine aktive industriepolitische Rolle in der Volksrepublik zu. Die Zentralregierung in Peking fordert die Konsolidierung der stark zersplitterten heimischen Autobranche in die "großen Vier" und die "kleinen Vier", um die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit der lokalen Industrie gegenüber der etablierten ausländischen Konkurrenz zu stärken. Sinotruks staatliche Muttergesellschaft ist dabei als einziger reiner Hersteller schwerer Lkw unter den "kleinen Vier" vorgesehen. CNHTC habe im laufenden Jahr bereits zwei Unternehmen aufgekauft, sagte Pan.
MAN sucht seit Jahren nach Wegen, an dem rasanten Wachstum in China teilzuhaben. Die Partnersuche im Reich der Mitte, zumeist in Form eines Gemeinschaftsunternehmens, gestaltet sich für die deutschen Hersteller jedoch meist als schwierig. Nach jahrelangen Verhandlungen und zahlreichen Rückschlägen hat Peking erst kürzlich die bereits vor zwei Jahren vereinbarte Koproduktion zwischen Daimler und dem chinesischen Hersteller Beiqi Foton Motor abgesegnet.
MAN hat nach ersten Enttäuschungen - etwa mit der zuvor anvisierten Zusammenarbeit mit Weichai - mit der direkten Beteiligung an Sinotruk einen anderen Weg gewählt. Alleine in den ersten neun Monaten 2010 trug dieses Engagement 69 Mio EUR zum Konzerngewinn der Münchener bei. MAN ist auch auf anderen Wachstumsmärkten aktiv: 2009 hatte der DAX-Konzern das Lateinamerikageschäft von Großaktionär Volkswagen übernommen. Zudem arbeiten die Münchener seit 2006 in Indien mit Force Motors zusammen.
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
December 22, 2010 03:00 ET (08:00 GMT)
Copyright (c) 2010 Dow Jones&Company, Inc.

description.hltext_display: Luego de 24 horas, las azafatas de LAN levantaron el paro
description.content:
Así lo dio a conocer el ministro de Trabajo, Carlos Tomada, y lo confirmó la presidenta del gremio que agrupa a los tripulantes de cabina, Paula Marconi, tras un acuerdo alcanzado con la empresa LAN.
1 de n
Azafatas de la LAN mantenían ayer un paro por conflictos gremiales en Ezeiza y aeroparque. (DyN)
Azafatas de la LAN mantenían ayer un paro por conflictos gremiales en Ezeiza y aeroparque. (DyN)

Azafatas de la LAN mantenían ayer un paro por conflictos gremiales en Ezeiza y aeroparque. (DyN)
“Si el Ministerio de Trabajo nos saca la inscripción, sería anti sindical”, dijo la delegada Paula Marconi. (TN)
Galerías
Fotos.
Etiquetas
Para poder reproducir este contenido necesita tener instalado el reproductor Adobe Flash Player (Obtener Flash), y tener habilitada la ejecución de Javascript de su navegador.
Audio Insultos y quejas de pasajeros a los trabajadores de LAN. Por María Noel Scanarotti, desde Aeroparque.
Luego de 24 horas de paro, el gremio de las azafatas y los comisarios de a bordo de la aerolínea LAN Argentina levantaron la huelga esta madrugada, tras llegar a un acuerdo con la empresa, de acuerdo con información del Ministerio de Trabajo.
Pasadas las 4 de la mañana un portavoz de la cartera laboral, por instrucción del ministro Carlos Tomada, anunció que "hubo acuerdo. Se levanta el paro". Esto incluye el levantamiento de la huelga que había dispuesto la Asociación de Tripulantes de Cabina de Pasajeros de Empresas Aerocomerciales (ATCPEA).
La secretaria general de la ATCPEA, Paula Marconi confirmó, al salir del Ministerio de Trabajo, que la medida de fuerza había cesado, y que "los tripulantes ya están disponibles para volar".
El arreglo fija 60 horas aseguradas para las azafatas y tripulantes de a bordo que realizan vuelos de cabotaje y 65 para los que hacen destinos internacionales.
Para este miércoles se tienen programados los primeros vuelos de la empresa LAN desde las 5.45 a Tucumán y diez minutos después a San Pablo, ambos desde Aeroparque y de las 6.30 a Santiago de Chile desde Ezeiza.
El paro comenzó a la madrugada de este martes cuando las azafatas se negaron a tomar servicio, lo que obligó a la cancelación de la totalidad de los vuelos y dejó a miles de pasajeros varados en las terminales aéreas de Aeroparque y Ezeiza.
En Aeroparque, pasadas las 16 del martes, había unos 30 vuelos cancelados entre arribos y partidas y cuatro demorados. En Ezeiza, la medida afectaba a unos cinco vuelos.
En paralelo, se acrecentaba el malhumor, el cansancio y las quejas de los cientos de pasajeros que tuvieron que esperar que se arreglara el conflicto. “No nos dan una solución”, se indignaba una mujer mientras empujaba el carrito en el que llevaba a su bebé y con quien iba a viajar a Bariloche para pasar las Fiestas con su familia.
La negociación para intentar destrabar el conflicto se encontraba empantanada, ya que luego de que el ministerio dictara una nueva conciliación obligatoria en el conflicto entre la empresa y ATCPEA, los trabajadores advirtieron que "no" la acatarían al considerarla "ilegal". Tras la negativa, la cartera intimó a los trabajadores a que levanten la huelga bajo amenaza de quitarle la entidad gremial, pero los empleados se mantuvieron firmes en su postura de no claudicar.
La situación se canalizó en la reunión que conducida por el ministro Carlos Tomada, y en la que participaban la secretaria general de la ATCPEA Paula Marconi, y el presidente de LAN.
El martes, la dirigente había explicado que "la acción gremial fue decidida luego del fracaso de las negociaciones, no obstante haberse cumplido todos los términos y agotado las audiencias de la conciliación obligatoria dispuesta por Trabajo".
La gremialista aludía a una conciliación obligatoria anterior dispuesta por la autoridad laboral en noviembre, que se agotó sin alcanzar una solución al conflicto.
Los trabajadores acusaron a la compañía de violar los tiempos máximos de servicio en vuelo determinados por el convenio.
El paro fue cuestionado por la Asociación Argentina de Aeronavegantes (AAA), que también representa a azafatas y comisarios de a bordo.

The report provides information on development environment, productivity changes, competition and development of China's caustic soda industry.
