description.hltext_display: Flooding destroys 4 empty homes in Ariz.
description.content:
Wet weather causes havoc in western states
Share
FLAGSTAFF, Ariz. – Flood waters on Tuesday ripped through a retirement community in northwestern Arizona, washing away four unoccupied homes and threatening to destroy others.
Meanwhile, evacuation orders were lifted in a small Utah town about 60 miles away after a dam feared close to breaking was declared safe. But flood warnings and emergency orders remained in place in some Utah, Nevada and Arizona counties, and more rain was expected overnight.

description.hltext_display: Tim Džuda: Martijev izveštaj narušio kredibilitet Kosova
description.content:
Ugledni britanski publicista Tim Džuda ocenio je da je izveštaj specijalnog izvestioca Saveta Evrope Dika Martija o trgovini ljudskim organima zadao oštar udarac kredibilitetu kosovskog premijera Hašima Tačija i samog Kosova, kojem je otežana pozicija ne samo po pitanju priznanja nezavisnosti i napretka ka EU, već i na predstojećim razgovorima s Beogradom.
"Mislim da je izveštaj zadao izuzetno oštar udarac kredibilitetu Hašima Tačija, ali i Kosova, i to u momentu kada se bori da dobije priznanje širom sveta", rekao je Džuda u intervjuu radiju "Slobodna Evropa".
"Ne govorim o samom procesu priznanja, nego pre o nastojanju da se država uspostavi na takav način da može biti priznata od strane čitave međunarodne zajednice. Dakle, tu nisu najbitnije brojke nego verodostojnost, dignitet", kazao je on.
Na pitanje šta bi u ovakvoj atmosferi bio konstruktivan stav Srbije, Džuda je odgovorio da izjava Borisa Tadića da je spreman da razgovara s Tačijem sve dok se ne dokaže osnovanost optužbi protiv njega pokazuje da predsednik Srbije "zna šta radi" i da vodi "vrlo racionalnu i mudru politiku".
"Uostalom, Srbija je sada u poziciji sa koje i ne mora baš mnogo da se napreže. Svakako joj je u interesu da se dijalog sa Prištinom pokrene, ako ni zbog čega drugog, ono radi toga da ne bi bila vidjena kao strana koja ga opstruiše", rekao je Džuda.
Prema Džudinim rečima, Kosovu će zbog izveštaja biti otežan i put ka EU i biće mu teže da se dokaže kao kredibilna država.
Tači će se, kao premijer, suočiti s poteškoćama u organizovanju susreta sa stranim državnicima i poslovanju sa inostranim partnerima jer će svi izbegavati da budu s njim vidjeni, rekao je britanski publicista.
Kada je reč o dijalogu s Beogradom, za kosovsku stranu će, kako je ocenio Džuda, sada biti mnogo teže za kompromise na koje bude pristala dobije nešto više zauzvrat.
"Razume se, obe strane će morati da čine ustupke, ali će za kosovski pregovarački tim... biti teže da izdejstvuje kompromise druge strane ili Evropske unije", kazao je on i upozorio da bi Priština mogla da izgubi volju da uloži bilo kakve veće napore u taj dijalog.

description.hltext_display: Saudi king leaves hospital in good health - agency
description.content:
RIYADH, (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah has left a New York hospital in good health, the kingdom's state news agency said on Wednesday.
"King Abdullah left the Presbyterian Hospital on Tuesday evening...as God gave him good health," the Saudi Press Agency said.
"He moved to his place of residence in New York to recuperate and continue with physical therapy," the statement said but did not say when he might return to Saudi Arabia.
Earlier in December, the state news agency said the king, believed to be 86 or 87, had a successful second operation to stabilise vertebrae in his spinal column.
The second operation was the completion of earlier surgery after a blood clot complicated a slipped disc.
Crown Prince Sultan, who has health problems of his own, returned from abroad to govern the world's largest oil exporter while Abdullah is away.
King Abdullah, who came to power in 2005, is the sixth leader of the top OPEC exporter and U.S. ally, whose political stability is of regional and global concern.

description.hltext_display: Romance Was Born and Kate Rohde 'Renaissance Dinosaur' Concept Store
description.content:
While some obsessions are over as quickly as they started - nail decals, skater boys, keeping my room tidy, etc - some will always be at the centre of my (grossly immature) life, mainly my obsession with dinosaurs. So then, this latest venture by the Romance Was Born team gets a huge YES PLEASE from me: √√√.
Following the concept of their SS10/11 collection ‘Renaissance Dinosaur', the Romance Was Born duo have opened a store showcasing their kitsch creations, that are as finely tailored as they are clever. Melbourne artist Kate Rohde also features in the store, with six works that complement the RWB collection: a fluffy rave Triceratops, oversized dino figurines and a stunning crystalised menagerie.
Just as their hand-detailed features and avant-garde use of fabric, colour and materials not necessarily found in garments are what sets RWB in a league of their own, the same could be said for the store, with a creeping jungle surrounding the clothes, and Rohde's work set against a kitsch collection of furniture and ornaments. The store really showcases Romance Was Born's artisan capabilities and the match with Rohdes is on a Devito and Schwarzenegger level - perfect!
Location: Eastern Suburbs
Product Type: Fashion
Keywords: Romance Was Born, Kate Rohde, Paddington

description.hltext_display: Galaxy Shareholders Approve Plans To List On Hong Kong Stock Exchange In Q1
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Creat Resources Holdings Ltd. (CRHL.L) said that a General Meeting of Shareholders of Galaxy Resources Limited approved the company's plans to list on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange in the first quarter of 2011. Creat Resources Holdings has a 19.85% shareholding in Galaxy Resources.
Also, shareholders approved the issue of up to 21.58 million fully paid, ordinary shares in the Company to strategic investor Fengli Group (Hong Kong) Co., Ltd, at a price of A$1.39 per share.
The $260 million capital raising and Hong Kong listing is expected to offer the platform for Galaxy to become a vertically integrated company, from raw product lithium production through to chemical processing and battery manufacturing.
Funds from both the capital raising and the Fengli share issue would be used to repay Galaxy's US$105 million loan facility, to develop its lithium-ion battery project, to ramp-up Mt Cattlin project working capital; and potential lithium-related acquisitions.

description.hltext_display: Indian missile test 'successful'
description.content:
India claims to have successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, a senior official said.The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100lb (500kg).It has already been tested more than half a dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.India and long-time rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles - including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos - as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles, can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East.

description.hltext_display: 如此官场"宝贝",何不"兜底翻"?(怡然)
description.content:
这又是一个可以载入当代“官场现形记”的真人真事。
云南有一个玉溪市，玉溪有一个运政系统（不明白这是一个什么机构），运政系统有一个官员名唤陈有云。此人把持着全市运政系统的人事权和财权，还掌控着交通行业技能培训站的管理，通过“市场运作”，收取培训费用1700多万元，将其中的近500万元集体私分，自己个人分得17.8万元。同时还有其他营私舞弊的行为。在市纪委对陈有云实行“双规”时，他所写的交代材料，一百个字竟有数十个错别字。而当专案组要求其写对错误行为的认识时，这个据称有大学文凭的官员久久不能落笔，竟苦苦要求办案人员代笔。此人还大言不惭地说：“我是能说不能写，如果我真有文化，早就当副省长了！”
啼笑皆非之余，禁不住纳闷起来：这样一个官场“宝贝”究竟何许人也？百字错了数十个，还持有大学文凭，那么此人的大学文凭是怎么来的？是如何混入官场的？谁委以他重任拥有那么大的权力？还为什么口气如此之大？莫非真有可能当上“副省长”？
这个“官场新闻”出自云南省城昆明的一家报纸，一经报道立即被广泛转载、广泛议论。据说那个“错别字大王”的“事迹”是在玉溪市委召开的专门会议上披露的，市纪委领导在会上指出，要吸取深刻教训，切实增强从政为官的风险意识。不知这个“风险意识”与此案有什么直接关系，指的又是什么“风险”。但既然提到“切实增强从政为官的风险意识”，那也可以说，把不学无术的陈有云之流安排在官场里，且毫无监督，“风险”确实太大了。而这个“风险”是怎么形成的，需要追根寻源，来一个“兜底翻”。否则怎么“吸取深刻教训”呢？
“兜底翻”，就应该把此人的来龙去脉彻头彻尾地追查一番。比如，他的大学文凭是怎么来的??是在大学里弄虚作假混到手的，还是压根就是假文凭？为啥他自称“能说不能写”，文凭和官帽都是靠“说”骗来的吗？究竟是谁“引荐”他进官场的？
“兜底翻”，就应该把此人的为所欲为胆大妄为彻头彻尾追究一番。据他自己说，他在市交通运政管理处身兼几职，不但担任运政处处长，还兼任海事局局长、航务处处长、党支部书记，谁也不敢监督他。这又是为什么？纪检监察机构是在吃干饭吗？干部考察、提拔、任命机制和监督机制都是一纸空文？
“兜底翻”才能识“风险”、知“风险”，学会避“风险”，确立“风险意识”。其实，老老实实地从政为官，踏踏实实地执政为民，是无所谓“官场风险”的。而利欲熏心，以权谋私，则就必然会有“风险”。而在用人问题上违规违纪，在对官员的监督上缺位失责，也是会担“风险”的。因此，与其对陈有云之类的疑似文盲加流氓讪笑讥讽，不如严肃认真地来一个“兜底翻”，查明责任，寻求原因，这才可能把教训变成经验，纯洁各级干部队伍，健全各种监督机制，把反腐倡廉从口号化成扎实行动。

description.hltext_display: Nuevo censo abre más esperanzas a hispanos
description.content:
“Hemos visto un crecimiento de poder de la comunidad latina”, expresó Gloria Montaño, directora de la oficina en Washington de la Asociación Nacional de funcionarios elegidos y designados (Naleo, siglas en inglés).
Varios de los estados obtuvieron nuevas bancas en el Congreso con los resultados del censo divulgados ayer, como Texas, cuatro escaños, el que más obtuvo; Florida, dos; Arizona, uno, y Nevada, uno; son estados donde los hispanos representan un porcentaje significativo de la población estadounidense.
La Oficina del Censo de EE. UU. divulgó ayer sus primeras estadísticas del censo 2010: la población estadounidense alcanzó 308.7 millones de personas, con un crecimiento de 9.7 por ciento respecto de 10 años antes.
Pero será para febrero próximo cuando el Censo revele las estadísticas por grupos étnicos.
No obstante, el jefe de la Oficina del Censo, Robert Groves, puntualizó durante la presentación que 60 por ciento del crecimiento poblacional de Estados Unidos fue producto de los nacimientos y 40 por ciento por la migración.
El Censo contabilizó a todos los residentes de Estados Unidos, sin importar su estatus migratorio.
Según las últimas cifras de la Encuesta Comunitaria Estadounidense —otro instrumento del censo que permite analizar en mayor profundidad a la población— en Estados Unidos viven unos 48 millones de hispanos, lo que representa un 15 por ciento del total de sus habitantes.
Para estar representados adecuadamente, los hispanos deben contar con más de 60 legisladores de los 435 en la Cámara de Representantes, pero actualmente tienen menos de 30, explicó Montaño.
Por ello, los latinos necesitan participar más en el proceso político, para aprovechar la oportunidad de la nueva distribución de los escaños, citó Montaño.
El Congreso con esa nueva distribución empezará a sesionar en el 2013.
Ritmo lento
La población de Estados Unidos creció en la última década al ritmo más lento registrado desde la Gran Depresión. Según la primera entrega del censo, que se elabora cada 10 años, en el 2000 vivían en ese país 281.4 millones de personas.

description.hltext_display: Anelka and Henry stand firm on World Cup bonuses
description.content: Nicolas Anelka and Thierry Henry are the only players from the France squad that have yet to agree to relinquish their World Cup bonuses. Their teammates have all signed a document from the French federation (FFF) stipulating that the players will forego the bonuses totaling around R27-million. Communications director Francois Manardo told the Associated Press on Tuesday that the FFF have not heard from Anelka or Henry and do not know "whether they will sign". The Liberation newspaper claimed that Anelka was refusing to sign after being suspended for 18 games following his clash with former coach Raymond Domenech at the global showpiece. The report said Henry doesn't want to give up his bonuses to show his discontent at being used as a substitute in South Africa. -- www.football365.co.za

event_or_fact.property: the Associated Press on Tuesday that the FFF have not heard from Anelka or Henry and do not know "whether they will sign"
